story:
Allurette - the best care for 'hand wash only' clothes

Purchase now at myallurette.com, thescrubba.com.au (for Australian orders) or thescrubba.com for shipping straight away. 

In 2012 we revolutionised travel laundry by integrating a flexible washboard into a sealable, waterproof bag. The Scrubba wash bag, an ultra portable device for washing clothes on the go, was born. Now, in response to a large number of requests for a wash bag optimised for washing delicates and active wear at home, we have designed the Allurette washer. An incredibly compact device, the Allurette features  a specially engineered washboard for delicate items, and is able to achieve a machine quality wash in just minutes.  

Who is the Allurette washer for?

The Allurette washer is for women who are seeking a better way to safely, quickly, and effectively wash their 'hand wash only' items, from lingerie to active wear. The increasing number of delicate garments in the fashion industry highlights the need for an effective washing method that, unlike even the gentlest cycle on many washing machines, cares for our clothes without exposing them to irreparable damage. 

The Allurette washer has been designed to make the hand washing process easy, fast, and mess-free. Small loads can be gently and effectively washed in just minutes. It is perfect for fashion-lovers, parents who need to wash baby clothes, active women, the environmentally-conscious, and travellers. 

The Allurette gentle washer will help you:

  • Save time: Small loads can be washed in the Allurette washer in just a few minutes.  No more messy soaking or waiting for the washing machine, which is often too harsh on clothes anyway.

  • Avoid mess: Allurette is self-contained, preventing you from having to mop up any soapy spills - ideal for anyone who avoids hand washing because the clean-up takes longer than the washing process itself. The Allurette washer can also be compactly stored after use.

  • Be organised:  Using the Allurette washer means no more soaking clothes in the sink or in buckets. The Allurette washer can also be used as a laundry bag for storing your delicates pre-wash, keeping them separate from the rest of your laundry. 

  • Extend the life of your clothes: The Allurette washer is gentle on clothes, keeping them looking clean, vibrant, and fresh, many washes in.

  • Save money: Longer lasting clothes means less money spent on their replacement or restoration. The Allurette washer is also electricity free and uses minimal water. As an added benefit, travellers can avoid hotel laundry fees by taking this highly portable wash bag along on their adventures. 

  • Protect your skin: Hand washing exposes you to harsh chemicals that can, over time, dry out your skin, leaving it cracked and worn. This makes hand washing a truly problematic task, especially for those who suffer from sensitive skin or conditions such as eczema.  As clothes are rubbed from the outside of the Allurette washer, however, hands remain dry, with minimal exposure to potentially damaging liquid detergents.

  • Care for the environment: Because the Allurette washer requires no electricity, uses minimal water, and enables grey water to be disposed of away from the water source, you can enjoy using your Allurette anywhere, confident in the knowledge that you’re respecting the environment and helping to maintain the beautiful planet that we all share.

Perfect for sensitive skin and delicate garments, Allurette allows you to prolong the life of your clothes in just a few quick, simple steps. Now you can care for the clothes you love with minimal time and effort, and look exactly how you want, no cares, no concerns, no compromises.  

What is it about the Allurette washer that makes washing easy?

It is our combination of old washboard technology and new materials and manufacturing processes, that has enabled us to create the most efficient, electricity-free way to care for 'hand wash only' items. By rolling the effectiveness of a machine wash and the gentleness of a hand wash together in one portable, self-contained bag, we have combined the best elements from everyday laundry methods to create a new device that makes it easier than ever to care for the clothes you love. 

The Allurette washer is lightweight (112g or < 4oz.), yet incredibly durable, allowing it to be used over and over again. Key features include:

- the specially designed washboard for gentle and effective washing;

- soft waterproof nylon fabric that feels great;

- a simple to use roll down clip seal;

- an improved twist valve to easily remove air from the sealed bag;

- a transparent window so you can monitor the washing process;

- a non-slip backing to prevent the Allurette from sliding during the washing process.

How does it work?

With the Allurette washer, you can gently care for clothes in 6 simple steps (printed at the top of the bag for easy reference). To wash clothes, simply add water and cleaning liquid, roll down the top and seal the wash bag, remove air through the valve, and rub for 30 seconds to 3 minutes. After a quick rinse, clothing is ready to dry.

This video shows the key features and functionality of the Allurette washer and Allurette towel from our large scale production, which is ready to ship now:

This image shows Allurette washers being shipped to backers:
Plus more ready to go:
and even more in our warehouse, ready for shipping:
 

What can be washed in the Allurette washer:

    How do I care for specific fabrics?

    The following tables are a quick reference guide for washing specific fabrics in the Allurette washer. Always consult the care instruction label on individual garments before washing.

    The Allurette gentle towel

    As part of our mission to provide the easiest, gentle care for the clothes you love to wear, we’ve worked to simplify not only the washing, but also the drying, process. We understand that drying clothes takes time, not to mention the frustrating challenge of safely and effectively drying items too delicate for clotheslines and coat hangers. We sought to overcome this tiresome problem and so developed the Allurette gentle towel, the easiest, safest way to ‘par-dry’ your favourite ‘hand wash only’ items.   

    The ultra-soft Allurette gentle towel is the ideal device for ‘par-drying’ your delicates in order to expedite the drying process. Specially engineered to provide a soft, gentle environment that won’t snag or tear your clothing, it even folds down into its own portable carry-case. The Allurette gentle towel matches the Allurette washer’s sleek white colour scheme and has been designed with the same level of care in mind, making it the perfect companion for your new wash bag!

    The Allurette gentle towel:

    • Measures 64x80cm (25x31in) when unfolded, and 18x15cm (7x6in) when folded in its packaging
    • Weighs 88g (3.1oz)
    • Is suitable for most types of clothes
    • Is highly absorbent
    • Is fast-drying
    • Is made of ultra-soft microfiber

    How does it work? 

    To par-dry, simply place the Allurette gentle towel on a flat surface with your wet clothes on top, then fold the towel over your garments and carefully press together. The towel’s highly absorbent microfiber material will quickly remove a large quantity of moisture from your clothes, reducing the overall amount of time required to dry them. We recommend pressing each item individually to achieve the best results.

    The Allurette gentle towel is also a great way to dry those items that are just too delicate for clotheslines or hangers, as clothes can simply be spread to dry on top of the towel. Just remember to replace your towel if it becomes fully saturated, and to always consult the clothing care label on your garments to determine the safest and most appropriate drying method.

    Why microfiber?

    We love the high absorbency and quick-drying properties of microfiber, and especially appreciate its portability, as the fabric is highly lightweight, durable, and easily compressible, making it ideal for travel or even home storage. We have ensured that our Allurette towel is as light and portable as possible not only by using high quality microfiber, but also by scaling back the size in order to create the optimal environment for delicate, ‘hand wash only’ items. Although this smaller size makes the Allurette gentle towel inefficient for use as a bath towel, it remains the perfect tool for patting yourself dry at the pool or gym, and therefore makes a great addition to any day bag.

    Small, portable, highly absorbent, ultra-soft, and fast-drying, the Allurette gentle towel is the perfect companion for your new Allurette washer, and makes caring for your favourite clothes easier than ever!

    What We Need & What You Get 

    Thanks to initial feedback, we are confident that our electricity-free washer, optimised for delicates and active wear, brings innovation to tired laundry routines by simplifying the way we wash 'hand wash only' garments. However, we have brought the idea to IndieGoGo to see just how many of you love it! 

    We have already completed a successful, small-scale production run, and we are exceptionally happy with the finished product. So happy, in fact, that some of these products are available for backers to snap up in our Ship Now perks.

    We are hoping to raise $5000 from the campaign, which will go towards scaling up production. Tooling and all other components are ready to go, meaning we simply need to know how many Allurette washers to produce.  Even if we don't hit our goal, we guarantee that we will enter production to ensure all backers get their rewards. So feel free to jump on-board and give your clothes the care they deserve!

    Our other crowdfunded products

    We are 100% committed to making travel and life in general easier by developing lightweight, practical, environmentally-conscious, durable, and multi-functional products. We are also passionate about helping people live clean, light and free, as evidenced by our previous crowdfunding campaigns: 

    The Scrubba wash bag (2012): Crowdfunded on Indiegogo following founder and patent attorney Ash Newland's mission to overcome the difficulty of effectively washing clothes while hiking Mt Kilimanjaro, the Scrubba wash bag ultimately raised 22,525USD of its 2,500USD goal, and has today become a pack favourite for close to 100,000 travellers across the globe. Featured in Lonely Planet, presented on Shark Tank Australia, and listed as part of Gear Junkie’s greatest gear, the world's smallest washing machine weighs only 142g (~5oz) and remains an essential item for campers, hikers, travellers and backpackers. Read more about it here.

    The Scrubba W Pack (2015): Crowdfunded on Indiegogo, the Scrubba W pack was the outcome of Ash Newland's desire to further evolve his Scrubba wash bag vision by creating the world's most functional day pack. A backpack, wash bag and dry bag rolled into one, the W pack ultimately received 27,861USD, smashing its goal by 123%. It remains one of Scrubba's staple products and has helped innumerable hikers and travellers to see the sites and work up sweat, all while ending the day clean. See more here.

    The Scrubba weightless wallet (2016): Crowdfunded late last year with a final pledge result of 18,385AUD, this water- and sweat-resistant travel and active wallet is 100% upcycled using excess material from the Scrubba wash bag. Weighing only 7g (~0.25oz) and featuring tear-resistant and high-frequency welded seams for maximum durability, this wallet might just be the sturdiest available in its weight class. Finishing its Kickstarter run in early October 2016, all pledges had been fulfilled and shipped by early December. The wallet is now available on the Scrubba website.   

    Risks & Challenges

    This is our fourth crowdfunding campaign and, despite hurdles along the way, we successfully completed and fulfilled our previous three within a few months of the campaigns ending. We have learned from these experiences and have great confidence that we will be able to build upon them to ship most (if not all) Allurette orders within a month of the campaign's close.

    Because Allurette is similar to our Scrubba wash bag and Scrubba W pack, we are confident that we have sufficient experience in this area to navigate all potential issues, and therefore do not anticipate any substantial set backs or complications.  In fact, our small-scale trial production run was so successful that some of the products from this run are already available for shipping.

    We believe in honesty and great customer service, so in the unlikely event that a delay does pop up, we will let you know and will quickly provide our strategy for getting back on track.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Even if the Allurette  washer isn't for you, we still value your input and appreciate your support. That's why we'd love you to: 

    • Let your friends and family know about the Allurette
    • Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word online

    Media

    If you would like to write a feature or create other media about the Allurette gentle washer, we invite you to access our media kit and high-res images at: https://goo.gl/iNL1N1 

    Thanks in advance for spreading the word about our campaign, and please feel free to contact us at info@myallurette.com if you require further information. 

    Thanks so much for your support and enthusiasm.

    FAQ

    How does the Allurette washer differ from the Scrubba wash bag? 

    Although the Scrubba wash bag is suitable for most 'hand wash only' items, the more pronounced 'nobules' on its washboard have been engineered specifically for the tougher material of hiking, camping, and other outdoor wear. In this regard, the Scrubba wash bag is not the most suitable washing method for extremely delicate garments. The flatter, more rounded ridges that comprise Allurette's washboard, however, have been designed with the most delicate of items in mind, and therefore provide a gentler wash that is more suitable for fabrics such as lace and silk. The Allurette is also slightly smaller than the Scrubba wash bag, providing a gentle washing environment that is optimised for small laundry loads.

    What can be washed in the Allurette?

    The Allurette washer is great for most types of delicate and ‘hand wash only’ items, or indeed for any clothes that you don’t want to risk exposing to the washing machine, such as active wear, lace underwear, swimwear, and baby clothes. The Allurette washer is designed to make washing these items easy, providing an alternative to the harshness of a machine wash and to the time-consuming, messy, and skin-damaging process of hand washing.

    How much clothing can be washed in the Allurette at once?

    Generally, the Allurette is effective at cleaning a few delicate items at once, whether it be a couple of pairs of underwear, a bra and a camisole, or yoga pants and a sports bra. Although the Allurette can physically hold more clothing, the washing efficiency may be compromised if too much clothing is added.

    How big is the Allurette washer and how compactly can it be stored?

    When laid flat, the Allurette measures approximately 49 cm x 26 cm (19.3 x 10.2 inches). When conveniently rolled and clipped, the dimensions are 13 cm x 6 cm x 6 cm (5.1 x 2.4 x 2.4 inches).

    How long does a load take to wash in the Allurette washer?

    For a machine quality delicates wash, we recommend using a few drops of a specialised hand wash or delicate liquid detergent, and then gently rubbing the clothes for 2-3 minutes. For stubborn stains, the clothing may be gently rubbed for longer and/or allowed to soak in the Allurette washer prior to rubbing. Always consult the clothing care label to determine the most appropriate method of washing. If soaking clothing in the Allurette washer, ensure it is stored upright (e.g. seal facing upwards) to prevent water wicking through the seal.

    Can I use hot water in the Allurette washer?

    Due to the waterproof lining in the bag, we recommend that water no hotter than 50°C (122°F) be used. Simply put, if it is too hot for your hands, the water is too hot for the Allurette. It is important to read the care label on each clothing item carefully, as different fabrics require different water temperatures. Some fabrics need to be washed in cold water to prevent damage.

    What cleaning liquid should I use in the Allurette washer?

    We recommend the use of specialised hand wash or delicate liquid detergent. We've found the use of liquid detergents to be more efficient, as they, unlike solid detergents (powders, leaves etc.), do not require additional time to dissolve. Using a liquid also enables active suds immediately, reducing the overall time required for a wash. Mild baby shampoo (without conditioning additives that may add wax or oils) is a good choice for hand-washable silk fabrics, as it will clean the natural protein and revitalise the fibre. You can test for quantities of different cleaning products in the Allurette by checking the amount of suds visible through the clear section of the bag. If you still have suds after 30 seconds of rubbing, you can probably reduce the amount of detergent for the next load. Optimising the amount is not only better for the environment, but will also minimise the amount of rinsing required and reduce your washing costs over time. Avoid the use of detergents containing harsh chemicals, bleach, or ammonia, as these ingredients will not only damage your delicate clothing, but will reduce the Allurette’s longevity.

    Is the Allurette washer really gentle on my clothes?

    Our testing has shown that the Allurette is as effective as a washing machine and as gentle as a hand wash. If properly used, the Allurette will prolong the life of your clothes. The Allurette washer should not be used for dry clean only garments, and it is important that users always follow the washing instructions on their clothing.

    How do I dry my clothes after using the Allurette washer?

    After rinsing the clothing, gently squeeze the excess water from the garment. Do not twist or wring the item, as this may stretch the fibres and ruin the fabric. Lay your wet garment on a clean, dry towel, and pat it into shape. Roll up the towel, encasing the garment. Gently press on the rolled-up towel to encourage water absorption. Repeat with another clean, dry towel if the first one becomes saturated. Always follow the garment’s label directions for reshaping and drying. If no care label exists, lay the washed garment on a clean, dry, white towel spread over a flat surface that is moisture-resistant. Flip the garment over periodically, and replace the damp towel with a dry one as needed. Air-dry delicate lingerie on a drying rack. If the dry garment is wrinkled, check the care label for appropriate ironing temperature and, if necessary, press the garment gently to finish. If no care label exists, test in an inconspicuous area before pressing.

The Allurette gentle towel matches the Allurette washer’s sleek white colour scheme and has been designed with the same level of care in mind, making it the perfect companion for your new wash bag!


The Allurette gentle towel:

Measures 64x80cm (25x31in) when unfolded, and 18x15cm (7x6in) when folded in its packaging
Weighs 88g (3.1oz)
Is suitable for most types of clothes
Is highly absorbent
Is fast-drying
Is made of ultra-soft microfiber

How does it work? 
To par-dry, simply place the Allurette gentle towel on a flat surface with your wet clothes on top, then fold the towel over your garments and carefully press together. The towel’s highly absorbent microfiber material will quickly remove a large quantity of moisture from your clothes, reducing the overall amount of time required to dry them. We recommend pressing each item individually to achieve the best results.
The Allurette gentle towel is also a great way to dry those items that are just too delicate for clotheslines or hangers, as clothes can simply be spread to dry on top of the towel. Just remember to replace your towel if it becomes fully saturated, and to always consult the clothing care label on your garments to determine the safest and most appropriate drying method.


Why microfiber?
We love the high absorbency and quick-drying properties of microfiber, and especially appreciate its portability, as the fabric is highly lightweight, durable, and easily compressible, making it ideal for travel or even home storage. We have ensured that our Allurette towel is as light and portable as possible not only by using high quality microfiber, but also by scaling back the size in order to create the optimal environment for delicate, ‘hand wash only’ items. Although this smaller size makes the Allurette gentle towel inefficient for use as a bath towel, it remains the perfect tool for patting yourself dry at the pool or gym, and therefore makes a great addition to any day bag.
Small, portable, highly absorbent, ultra-soft, and fast-drying, the Allurette gentle towel is the perfect companion for your new Allurette washer, and makes caring for your favourite clothes easier than ever!

What We Need & What You Get 
Thanks to initial feedback, we are confident that our electricity-free washer, optimised for delicates and active wear, brings innovation to tired laundry routines by simplifying the way we wash 'hand wash only' garments. However, we have brought the idea to IndieGoGo to see just how many of you love it! 
We have already completed a successful, small-scale production run, and we are exceptionally happy with the finished product. So happy, in fact, that some of these products are available for backers to snap up in our Ship Now perks.
We are hoping to raise $5000 from the campaign, which will go towards scaling up production. Tooling and all other components are ready to go, meaning we simply need to know how many Allurette washers to produce.  Even if we don't hit our goal, we guarantee that we will enter production to ensure all backers get their rewards. So feel free to jump on-board and give your clothes the care they deserve!

Our other crowdfunded products
We are 100% committed to making travel and life in general easier by developing lightweight, practical, environmentally-conscious, durable, and multi-functional products. We are also passionate about helping people live clean, light and free, as evidenced by our previous crowdfunding campaigns: 
The Scrubba wash bag (2012): Crowdfunded on Indiegogo following founder and patent attorney Ash Newland's mission to overcome the difficulty of effectively washing clothes while hiking Mt Kilimanjaro, the Scrubba wash bag ultimately raised 22,525USD of its 2,500USD goal, and has today become a pack favourite for close to 100,000 travellers across the globe. Featured in Lonely Planet, presented on Shark Tank Australia, and listed as part of Gear Junkie’s greatest gear, the world's smallest washing machine weighs only 142g (~5oz) and remains an essential item for campers, hikers, travellers and backpackers. Read more about it here.
The Scrubba W Pack (2015): Crowdfunded on Indiegogo, the Scrubba W pack was the outcome of Ash Newland's desire to further evolve his Scrubba wash bag vision by creating the world's most functional day pack. A backpack, wash bag and dry bag rolled into one, the W pack ultimately received 27,861USD, smashing its goal by 123%. It remains one of Scrubba's staple products and has helped innumerable hikers and travellers to see the sites and work up sweat, all while ending the day clean. See more here.
The Scrubba weightless wallet (2016): Crowdfunded late last year with a final pledge result of 18,385AUD, this water- and sweat-resistant travel and active wallet is 100% upcycled using excess material from the Scrubba wash bag. Weighing only 7g (~0.25oz) and featuring tear-resistant and high-frequency welded seams for maximum durability, this wallet might just be the sturdiest available in its weight class. Finishing its Kickstarter run in early October 2016, all pledges had been fulfilled and shipped by early December. The wallet is now available on the Scrubba website.   

Risks & Challenges
This is our fourth crowdfunding campaign and, despite hurdles along the way, we successfully completed and fulfilled our previous three within a few months of the campaigns ending. We have learned from these experiences and have great confidence that we will be able to build upon them to ship most (if not all) Allurette orders within a month of the campaign's close.
Because Allurette is similar to our Scrubba wash bag and Scrubba W pack, we are confident that we have sufficient experience in this area to navigate all potential issues, and therefore do not anticipate any substantial set backs or complications.  In fact, our small-scale trial production run was so successful that some of the products from this run are already available for shipping.
We believe in honesty and great customer service, so in the unlikely event that a delay does pop up, we will let you know and will quickly provide our strategy for getting back on track.

Other Ways You Can Help
Even if the Allurette  washer isn't for you, we still value your input and appreciate your support. That's why we'd love you to: 

Let your friends and family know about the Allurette
Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word online

Media
If you would like to write a feature or create other media about the Allurette gentle washer, we invite you to access our media kit and high-res images at: https://goo.gl/iNL1N1 
Thanks in advance for spreading the word about our campaign, and please feel free to contact us at info@myallurette.com if you require further information. 
Thanks so much for your support and enthusiasm.
FAQ
How does the Allurette washer differ from the Scrubba wash bag? 
Although the Scrubba wash bag is suitable for most 'hand wash only' items, the more pronounced 'nobules' on its washboard have been engineered specifically for the tougher material of hiking, camping, and other outdoor wear. In this regard, the Scrubba wash bag is not the most suitable washing method for extremely delicate garments. The flatter, more rounded ridges that comprise Allurette's washboard, however, have been designed with the most delicate of items in mind, and therefore provide a gentler wash that is more suitable for fabrics such as lace and silk. The Allurette is also slightly smaller than the Scrubba wash bag, providing a gentle washing environment that is optimised for small laundry loads.
What can be washed in the Allurette? 
The Allurette washer is great for most types of delicate and ‘hand wash only’ items, or indeed for any clothes that you don’t want to risk exposing to the washing machine, such as active wear, lace underwear, swimwear, and baby clothes. The Allurette washer is designed to make washing these items easy, providing an alternative to the harshness of a machine wash and to the time-consuming, messy, and skin-damaging process of hand washing.
How much clothing can be washed in the Allurette at once? 
Generally, the Allurette is effective at cleaning a few delicate items at once, whether it be a couple of pairs of underwear, a bra and a camisole, or yoga pants and a sports bra. Although the Allurette can physically hold more clothing, the washing efficiency may be compromised if too much clothing is added.
How big is the Allurette washer and how compactly can it be stored? 
When laid flat, the Allurette measures approximately 49 cm x 26 cm (19.3 x 10.2 inches). When conveniently rolled and clipped, the dimensions are 13 cm x 6 cm x 6 cm (5.1 x 2.4 x 2.4 inches).
How long does a load take to wash in the Allurette washer?
For a machine quality delicates wash, we recommend using a few drops of a specialised hand wash or delicate liquid detergent, and then gently rubbing the clothes for 2-3 minutes. For stubborn stains, the clothing may be gently rubbed for longer and/or allowed to soak in the Allurette washer prior to rubbing. Always consult the clothing care label to determine the most appropriate method of washing. If soaking clothing in the Allurette washer, ensure it is stored upright (e.g. seal facing upwards) to prevent water wicking through the seal.
Can I use hot water in the Allurette washer?
Due to the waterproof lining in the bag, we recommend that water no hotter than 50°C (122°F) be used. Simply put, if it is too hot for your hands, the water is too hot for the Allurette. It is important to read the care label on each clothing item carefully, as different fabrics require different water temperatures. Some fabrics need to be washed in cold water to prevent damage.
What cleaning liquid should I use in the Allurette washer?
We recommend the use of specialised hand wash or delicate liquid detergent. We've found the use of liquid detergents to be more efficient, as they, unlike solid detergents (powders, leaves etc.), do not require additional time to dissolve. Using a liquid also enables active suds immediately, reducing the overall time required for a wash. Mild baby shampoo (without conditioning additives that may add wax or oils) is a good choice for hand-washable silk fabrics, as it will clean the natural protein and revitalise the fibre. You can test for quantities of different cleaning products in the Allurette by checking the amount of suds visible through the clear section of the bag. If you still have suds after 30 seconds of rubbing, you can probably reduce the amount of detergent for the next load. Optimising the amount is not only better for the environment, but will also minimise the amount of rinsing required and reduce your washing costs over time. Avoid the use of detergents containing harsh chemicals, bleach, or ammonia, as these ingredients will not only damage your delicate clothing, but will reduce the Allurette’s longevity.
Is the Allurette washer really gentle on my clothes?
Our testing has shown that the Allurette is as effective as a washing machine and as gentle as a hand wash. If properly used, the Allurette will prolong the life of your clothes. The Allurette washer should not be used for dry clean only garments, and it is important that users always follow the washing instructions on their clothing.
How do I dry my clothes after using the Allurette washer?
After rinsing the clothing, gently squeeze the excess water from the garment. Do not twist or wring the item, as this may stretch the fibres and ruin the fabric. Lay your wet garment on a clean, dry towel, and pat it into shape. Roll up the towel, encasing the garment. Gently press on the rolled-up towel to encourage water absorption. Repeat with another clean, dry towel if the first one becomes saturated. Always follow the garment’s label directions for reshaping and drying. If no care label exists, lay the washed garment on a clean, dry, white towel spread over a flat surface that is moisture-resistant. Flip the garment over periodically, and replace the damp towel with a dry one as needed. Air-dry delicate lingerie on a drying rack. If the dry garment is wrinkled, check the care label for appropriate ironing temperature and, if necessary, press the garment gently to finish. If no care label exists, test in an inconspicuous area before pressing.

story:
Welcome to Crowdfunding and our Valentimer™ campaign. A PERK, seen on the list to the right, is what is available from the Valentimer™ watch collection when you place an order for your Valentimer™ watch on our Indiegogo campaign.  

These advance purchases that are made on this site, are also known in the Crowdfunding world as 'contributions.'  Your purchase of our Valentimer™ watch is referred to as a contribution. The funds we are raising are to enable us to manufacturer the product, print the gift boxes, make counter displays, a small marketing budget...all so we can enter the retail market and make the Valentimer™ watch  available to everyone.

You can order a single Valentimer™ or a pair- one for you and one for your partner. You can choose the style that is right for you. See below for photographs, descriptions, unique ways to use your Valentimer™ and much more. Then click on the PERK to the right, and place your order.

Thank you for your support.

Ron Sharpe


                         Make any day a Valentine's Day with the Valentimer™

              Special Introductory Offer - 30% Discount off Anticipated Retail

                            PLUS FREE SHIPPING IN THE US on certain Perks.


        February 24th -- NEW -- Click on UPDATES (above) to read about the new RECTANGULAR face Valentimer™ design with our special introductory offer with your contribution.

             

Allow me to introduce myself. My name is Ron Sharpe (a "kangaroo," originally from Australia.) My claim-to-fame is being the Inventor of the VALENTIMER™ - the watch  that counts your thoughts. 


The VALENTIMER™  is a unique watch that not only tells the time, but is designed to record the times that you think of your SIGNIFICANT OTHER.  You can record these moments up to 30 times by just pushing the 'record' button on the right hand side of your watch. These times can be replayed at any time by pressing the 'replay' button. 


                         WHAT IS SO SPECIAL ABOUT THE VALENTIMER™ ?

A person may tell their loved one how much they think about them when not together, but there has never been a way to actually demonstrate how often this occurs. The VALENTIMER™ offers a romantic way for couples to show just how frequently the other person crosses their mind throughout the day.

The VALENTIMER™ memory not only retains the hours and the minutes but also the days and the months. The memory can be set back to zero at any time and you can start all over again thinking of your beloved!

The normal setting of your VALENTIMER™ displays the time and date, and functions as an attractive and practical watch you can wear day and night.


                                      STYLES AND COLORS TO CHOOSE FROM

There is a female and male version of the VALENTIMER™.  The female version has a pink face and is available with a leather or metal watch band. The male version has a blue face and is also available with either a leather or metal band.



                                                                 

     Your VALENTIMER™ comes in an attractive gift box that you can personalize.   


                                                                                         

                                        WANT TO BOOST YOUR MOOD?

       A new study says you should just think about your romantic partner.

In a recent study at the University of Western Ontario, researchers have shown that simply thinking of your partner during your day can actually put your 'blue mood' in check and energize you. 

Feeling down, stressed out and low on energy can do more harm than good to your well-being. The study suggests there is an easy way to put your blue mood in check and give your energy a nice boost --Simply think of your partner! 

New research finds that merely thinking about that special someone activates your body chemistry in a way that improves your mood.

Sarah Stanton, a psychology researcher at Western says, "We set out to look at whether or not just thinking about your partner was enough to kind of give us a physical and psychological energy boost."

What she found is that when people in the study thought about their romantic partner they got a boost in blood sugar - or glucose levels. The discovery is linked to something called eustress - or good, euphoric stress - which is the opposite of distress, or bad stress. And there's more good news. It wasn't just people in the early stages of romantic love who experienced the benefits. It was people in longer term relationships as well.          CTV News, London - Published August 22, 2014

We have invented the VALENTIMER™  that helps you do just that! The VALENTIMER™  counts your thoughts and records how many times you think of  your significant other. Give your energy a boost and get rid of those blue moods.

                                           

                      OTHER PRACTICAL USES FOR YOUR VALENTIMER™ 

How many times have you asked yourself, “Did I take my medicine today and if so, when?”  Your VALENTIMER™ may also be used for medical purposes to record the times of the day that you have taken your medication.  Maybe your doctor wants you to keep track of when and how many irregular heartbeats that you have each day. Perhaps you want to record the times you catch yourself doing or saying something throughout your day. If you are pregnant, imagine being able to time how far apart your contractions are and tell your partner and doctor with accuracy. 

With your VALENTIMER™  on your wrist, all these tasks are at the tip of your fingers. I am sure that you will find many other uses for your VALENTIMER™  once you start having fun and playing with it...that is when you are not using it to think of your partner!          

                                                   THE PERFECT GIFT

The VALENTIMER™ is the perfect gift for anyone, at any age - for birthday's, anniversaries, weddings, pregnant women, and of course, Valentine's Day* – or any time that two people wish to show their romantic connection.

                                                        

                                    WHICH WATCH IS RIGHT FOR YOU?

Choose the perfect style for you, and buy one for your partner too.  You can mix and match your styles in the "Perfect Duo VALENTIMER™" perk, or order individually. 

See the photos (above) for the style numbers. You will be contacted via email after you place your online purchase to tell us which VALENTIMER™ style/s you want to order.

                                FEMALE VALENTIMERS™ - STYLE NUMBERS

F-SL - Female Silver Case with White Leather Band

F-GL - Female Gold Case with Cream Leather Band

F-SMB - Female Silver Metal Band

F-GMB - Female Gold Metal Band


                            MALE VALENTIMERS™ - STYLE NUMBERS

M-SL - Male Silver Case with Black Leather Band

M-GL - Male Gold Case with Black Leather Band

M-SMB - Male Silver Metal Band

M-GMB - Male Gold Metal Steel 


                    EARLY BIRD SPECIAL - Savings off the retail price.

Help us by contributing to the VALENTIMER™ project and be the first to have a VALENTIMER™ watch. Check out the PERKS and see how you can save significantly by purchasing  your VALENTIMER™ for you and your partner today, before we expand into the retail market.

For questions, or special shipping rates for more than two VALENTIMER™ watches to the same address, please send us an email.


                  Make any day a Valentine's Day with the Valentimer™ 


*Although we will not be ready to deliver your VALENTIMER™ before June we will happily send you a certificate that you can give to your partner in anticipation of their upcoming gift from you.

story:
In case you don't already know who I am, my name is Colin Lynch - and I'm a cyclist with the Irish Paralympic Cycling team. If you'd like to see a quick video on who I am and what I do, just click on the photo of me at the top of the page and you'll see a YouTube clip of some of my highlights!


This may seem like an odd thing to be raising money for. What's the story?


I am a below-knee amputee and have been a Paralympic Cyclist since 2010. In that period I have won a lot of medals including the World Championships twice.


I went to the London 2012 Paralympic Games and I missed out on a medal by 1/10th of a second! I had hoped for a medal in several events but was always just off the podium. By the time the Games started, the equipment I used was already out of date and since then it has continued to decline. The leg I currently use for training does not fit well and causes me a lot of pain, making training difficult.


Since then the problems have continued, but with limited funds at my disposal, I have had to invest in training and bikes rather than a new cycling leg. But if I want to get to Rio 2016 and actually be competitive there, I need to invest in a new leg.

So I'm going public with my appeal. I would love the help and support of ANYONE that wants to help me win. You get me the new leg - I will do the rest!

People have donated everything from £1 to over £700. It all helps!

Lastly, for some of my musings, plus a lot more information about myself, please see my blog. I will update it soon!

http://637daystogo.blogspot.com

story:
The ENCORE RockMaster Headphone from Sonic Unity

Outstanding Sound Quality. Extreme Value.

 

Please visit us at www.sonicunity.com!

 

Sonic Unity presents the first in a series of new audio components offering both excellent sound quality and amazing value. Our factory direct pricing allows you to purchase audio products that perform well above their price point. We rely on crowdfunding for a single production and there is no guarantee that there will be subsequent retail sales of the same product. This approach allows us to bring you the very best price.

At Sonic Unity, we are passionate about music and want you to experience the very best sound quality at prices you can easily afford. The ENCORE RockMaster headphone does just that. Easily compared to headphones costing 4X as much, the RockMaster offers incredible sound quality and remarkable value. Choose over-ear or in-ear RockMaster headphones. Either way it will bring you closer to your favorite recording artists and the music they create.

 

 

The ENCORE RockMaster over-ear headphone from Sonic Unity pictured with the NuPrime uDSD and an Apple MacBook Air playing high-resolution, studio master recordings.

 

The ENCORE RockMaster in-ear headphone from Sonic Unity pictured with the NuPrime uDSD and an Apple MacBook Air playing high-resolution, studio master recordings.

The ENCORE polished clear acrylic headphone stand for only $10 with purchase of the ENCORE RockMaster OE headphone. May be purchased separately however, additional shipping cost will be required.

FREE OEM 600X With Every RockMaster IE or OE Purchase (Except 100-pack and other retailer bundles)

 

 

We have obtained a large surplus of the OEM version of the award winning NE-600X earphones and we want to give all buyers of the ENCORE RockMaster OE or IE headphones an amazing deal. Every buyer of the ENCORE RockMaster IE or OE headphone will receive a free OEM NE-600X (for example, if you purchase IE + OE bundle, you will receive two NE-600X earphones). The NE-600X was awarded Wired magazines top-3 (best earphone under $50) in 2012. See: http://www.wired.com/2012/10/nuforce-ne-600/

We can assure you that the RockMaster IE headphone is superior to the award winning OEM NE-600X in sound quality as our product reviews clearly show.

Help to spread the word about these amazing audio products. Please share with your friends on Facebook and Twitter and be sure to come back often as we will be offering more incredible audio products.  

 

Sonic Unity was formed in early 2015 as a collaboration between a group of music lovers, audio experts, musicians, and audiophiles. We wanted to offer the best possible sound, regardless of price, to everyone. Well designed, high performance  audio products that are simple to use. Products that offered the listener a real taste of high-end audio at a price anyone could afford. 

 

 

 

 

Sonic Unity CEO Rick Hopkins, together with Jason Lim, developed a worldwide on-line store, dedicated to offering unique high-quality audio products and unique portable audio devices.

 

 

 

 

 

 

With a background in music, concert design, consumer and pro audio, Rick's experience and passion for sound reproduction, is unique. As a designer, Rick has created concert events for Bryan Adams, Rush, Van Halen, Spinal Tap, Rod Stewart and The Rolling Stones. He has provided planning and site management for music festivals such a Lollapalooza featuring acts such as Primus, Alice in Chains, Tool, Rage Against the Machine, The Smashing Pumpkins, and Green Day. Rick has also worked with architect Mark Fisher, designer for U2, Genesis, Pink Floyd, The Rolling Stones and many others.

 

 

Now, Sonic Unity, together with our development team, will bring new high-performance audio products to market through crowdfunding and social media campaigns. We invite you to share in our goal of providing superior sounding, high quality audio products that perform well above their price point, to a greater number of people.

www.sonicunity.com

Factory Direct Products + Factory Direct Pricing

As our first of many crowdfunding projects, in association with leading industry audio experts, we have designed on-ear and in-ear headphones that we can offer direct from the manufacturing facility itself. This way, we can keep the costs of advertising and marketing low and provide audio products that perform well above their price. 

 

 

With the ENCORE RockMaster, you get the best sounding products direct from our design team and the people who manufacture them. Factory direct. No brand premium and marketing mark-up. Just high quality sound from people who know how to make a great sounding headphone.

 

Development Partner

 

Jason Lim is an established audio industry leader who co-founded NuForce and served as CEO from 2004 to 2013. NuForce is a well known audio brand that worked to reinvent high-end audio for the digital age. Featuring easy to use, well designed audio products, Jason and NuForce have been featured in Forbes magazine as well as Wired, Stereophile, c|net, The New York Times, The Absolute Sound, Hi-Fi+ and Sound and Vision.

 

 

 

 

Jason knows how to develop world class audio products. Among the top awards that NuForce gathered over the years were: 

• Two Editors Choice Awards for earphones by Wired magazine, with one being awarded the "Best Under $50"

• Two "Power Amp of The Year Awards" from audiophile magazines in the USA and Japan

 

 

 

After leaving NuForce in 2014, Jason Lim launched NuPrime and Celsus Sound. Each company offers the very best sound quality regardless of price and in 2015 received accolades from several professional audio magazines.

 

With a proven track record developing high-fidelity audio products, Jason Lim has the industry experience to deliver the products as promised.

Professional Reviews

The ENCORE RockMaster OE & IE Headphones
“…Upon first listen, I’d boosted up a bass heavy track…The bass and stage formation feel very much like how I recall the Vmoda M100 to sound”.  Fast forward a few weeks and after I snagged a brief listen to a loaner M100…and what do you know? It really does sound very similar in those two areas, but only in those two areas of listening.  I can safely say for this price, nothing I am aware exists that offers bass quality on par with the Rockmaster OE for $59, I’ve also not heard a sub $100 headphone outside of the JVC HARX700 that sounds this large and vast in stereo imaging…certainly, this headphone is “the headphone” to get if you are on a small budget and enjoy bass and a nice, aired out sense of appeal.  The low end is very tight and fast, considering the price this is an excellent deal and you can close up shop and go home right now, no need to read on…”, Headfoncis.com 
"...The IEM from Encore is actually the star of the show here, outclassing the OE in every way except the typical vastness that comes with an over ear vs an inner ear.  It is smooth, classy and enjoyable.  When you factor in the price of both together, this could be one of the better deals of the year that I’ve yet come across and it seems like that is the entire point behind Encores campaign on Indiegogo. This is going to be a great gift buy for family members or friends, so I absolutely will be purchasing a few sets of these for my peers and hiding them safely until the holiday season rolls in for 2015…I’ve not found a cheaper headphone in an over ear, or an IEM that sounded this nice for this type of a price...", Headfonics.com
"One of my very first big reviews on this site was a big comparison of DJ style headphones all in the ~$150-200 range, so I like to think I have a pretty good grasp on that market segment. I put on the Rockmaster for the first time and I immediately thought “ yup, fits right in with those guys... what, this is at a fifth of the price?" - "Armaegis", Headphoneus Supremus, head-fi.org -> read more
"Cohesive. That is the one word that I would use to describe the RockMaster IE. It is far far more than the sum of its parts. Each section on its own I could maybe find things to nag on, but taken as a whole all of that just disappears. The sound just comes at me and fills the space in my head without me finding things to fault. It's a rare occurrence for me with iems... maybe a first. Nothing feels glaring, nothing feels indistinct. Just simple sound and I'm not distracted by any others foibles." - "Armaegis", Headphoneus Supremus, head-fi.org -> read more
Encore’s OE headphone came in with a sound that was bassy, and if you’re one that loves that sound signature, $60 dollars isn’t much to pay for it. The over-ear model looks and feels great while comfort is of no issue. It isn’t the most perfect headphone out there, but it still holds a good value.  Overall Score ★★★★½, ifans.com -> read more
I have to say that Encore did a great job with the tuning of the IE in-ear monitors. Though driver flex does plague these IEMs, pretty much everything else is great with the IE. They offer a nice design with exceptional sound for their price. Overall Score ★★★★½, ifans.com -> read more

Outstanding Sound Quality

Many people have only experienced music through the low quality earphones that shipped with their mobile phone. We know there is so much more to experiencing music and a high quality headphone is an important first step.

 

 

 

We want you to offer you the very best entry level audiophile sound and allow you to enjoy your music the way it was meant to be heard.

 

The ENCORE RockMaster OE Headphone

The Encore RockMaster’s tight bass, crystal clear midrange, accurate highs and wide soundstage compete with headphones at four times the price.

 

The ENCORE RockMaster over-ear (OE) headphone and the ENCORE RockMaster in-ear (IE) headphone have been customized from OEM housing and speaker drivers after reviewing hundreds of models. By utilising existing OEM housing for customisation, we can keep the cost at the minimum while maximising performance. Together, these two headphones offer portable and desktop audio quality that far exceeds their price. Compared to headphones over $200, these provide audiophile sound quality at a price anyone can afford.

 

     

     

     

    Features

    • 50mm dynamic speaker driver
    • Soft and breathable memory foam ear pad and padded head band for exceptional comfort.
    • Replaceable braided fabric-jacket 3.5mm male-to-male headphone cable
    • Frequency Response: 20–20,000 Hz
    • Impedance: 32 ohm
    • Sensitivity: 107 dB

    The ENCORE RockMaster IE Headphone

     

     

     

    The ENCORE RockMaster in-ear (IE) headphone outperforms anything in it's price class and can compare to IE products costing 3-5X or more. It provides the listener with truly full-range sound with commanding bass and impressive frequency response. It's a high-performance, high efficiency IE headphone designed to work with your phone, your headphone DAC/amplifier or your portable music player. You will be blown away by the sound of the ENCORE RockMaster.

     

    Features

    • Balanced Armature and Dynamic Dual Driver earphones: BA driver Size: 7.9mm x 4.3mm x 2.97mm; Dynamic driver size: 9mm
    • Balanced Armature Driver delivers the speed and high frequency extension; Dynamic Driver produces deep bass and full mid range sound
    • Frequency range:  20~20KHZ
    • Impedance: 12 Ohms
    • SPL at 1KHZ: S103+-3db
    • Microphone & mute button
    • an assortment of rubber and foam ear inserts to provide a perfect, comfortable, custom fit

    The ENCORE Acrylic Headphone Stand

    When purchasing the ENCORE RockMaster headphone, as an additional perk, we are offering this acrylic headphone stand to display and store your new headphone when not in use. Just $10 more when purchasing the OE version. Please select the additional shipping option if purchasing the IE version with the headphone stand.

    Made from clear, polished acrylic, these headphone stands typically retail for $20 or more on Amazon. At half price, it's another example of our direct from factory pricing advantage.

     

    Combination Packages and Perks

    A pair of headphones. IE and OE headphone packages. A gorgeous polished acrylic headphone stand for display and storage. Multi-packs and bundles so you can share some with your friends. Even distributor packs and promotional packages that allow you to share with friends or hand them out to corporate clients as gifts! We want you to have it all!

    In this first Sonic Unity offering we have already secured funding for the design and have worked with audio experts to tune the headphones to our exact specifications. The prototypes have been fabricated and we are ready to produce our first line of crowdfunded audio products.

    Our goal is to preorder enough headphones and stands to provide everyone with a great audiophile product at a great price. Additional units will be made and offered at full retail price at Sonic Unity once the campaign is complete. MSLP $59 USD.

      We Have What It Takes

      With our team of audiophiles together with our experienced manufacturing partners, we have what it takes to make this happen. Our combined experience designing award winning audio products has resulted in numerous audio awards and industry accolades. 

      Jason manages a company called NUOEM that networks the best original equipment manufacturers (OEM's) to build and launch new audio brands for his clients and customers. OEM's are the electronics factories that design and  manufacture products for many other brands worldwide. By working with NUOEM, we are able to realize our vision; a very high standard in both sound and build quality that we demand for our customers. With our development partner Jason Lim and our OEM partners, we look forward to many many successful product launches.

       

       

      Factory Direct Products + World Class Performance

      Our manufacturing partners have been creating headphones for some of the worlds leading brands and they can make products to our exact specifications. The ENCORE RockMaster IE and OE headphones are an excellent example of this production capability.

       

       

      Why Direct From the Factory?

      The cost of most retail headphones is quite high. Consumers notice the advertisement on magazines, stylish retail store displays, events sponsorship, online promotion, and various multimedia product exposure and placement. These marketing expenses are extremely expensive and often double, triple or even quadruple the price of the product. 

       

      Then there's customized tooling for production and the necessary high volume production quantity required by the factory to run a production line and fully utilize the equipment. With factory direct products, we can remove that margin and those associated costs and offer a high quality product at an affordable price.

      You pay a premium for a major brand's familiar style and quality. But there is another way we can bring exceptional products to you that represent an incredible value - factory direct products + factory direct pricing.

      Does this business model work for everything?

      Obviously not. Some products contains technologies that require many years of research and development, such as the high-performance NuPrime Audio products that Sonic Unity retails. Other products consists of exquisite design and refined material that consumers appreciate. There are large categories of products however, that can be delivered to the consumer without the huge brand premium. 

       

       

        Risks & Challenges

        With Jason Lim on board, we have someone with a proven track record who has delivered consistently high quality audio products, regardless of price. Jason knows the industry and can get the job done. 

         

         

         

        Risks? Nothing we can't handle, so you can rest assured that your headphones will not only sound fantastic but they will be delivered without delay. We have the audio designers and the industry connections to create new, high-quality, custom OEM audio products that will really perform beyond anything else in their price range.

        Ways You Can Help Make It Happen

        We don't have an enormous marketing budget. If we did, the cost of these audio products would obviously be much higher! So, we need your help. Tell your friends about us. Share us on Facebook, Pinterest, Instagram, Twitter and other social media. Post on reddit and other audio forums like Head-Fi and Headphonics. Use the Indiegogo share tools to get the word out! 

        With your help, as one person posed on reddit, 'this will be the value headphone value product of the summer.'

         

         

         

        Visit the Sonic Unity on-line store and sign up for our newsletter. We will keep you informed every step of the way throughout the manufacturing process and as new products are developed, you will be among the first to hear about what we have planned next. Products like a new magnetic microphone that captures the tone of your guitar amplifier without using a diaphragm. Zero feedback. Zero distortion.

        Interested? Sign up and tell your friends about us. There is much more to come.

        What we have to offer is outstanding value but we can't depend on marketing dollars to get us there. Lend us a hand and together we can create a truly remarkable products that anyone can afford.

         

         

        The ENCORE RockMaster Headphone.

        Excellent sound quality. Affordable pricing. That's what we want to offer you.

        We are passionate about music.

        www.sonicunity.com

Products like a new magnetic microphone that captures the tone of your guitar amplifier without using a diaphragm. Zero feedback. Zero distortion.

What we have to offer is outstanding value but we can't depend on marketing dollars to get us there. Lend us a hand and together we can create a truly remarkable products that anyone can afford.
 

 

The ENCORE RockMaster Headphone.
Excellent sound quality. Affordable pricing. That's what we want to offer you.
We are passionate about music.
www.sonicunity.com

story:
BIO

    My name is Alicia Rancier, (ah-lee-see-yuh). I graduated from Coastal Carolina University with a BA in Graphic Design and Minor in Art Studio back in 2012. I'm a NPC Figure Competitor trying to go pro, Athlete, Graphic Designer, Realism Artist and Illustrator. I recently got my first print design on Threadless that is called "Aztec Madness", overly grateful!

    I was first bitten by the art bug when I was in high school, influenced by my Art High School Teacher, Kelly French. She nurtured a core desire within me to create and embrace the fine arts. Throughout my studies of Arts, I gained the knowledge to recognize and respect the influences of the great artists of history and their impact of how our world is depicted today. A great respect and admiration of artists in sculpture, pop art, and fashion influenced me to ever change my style and grow a catalog of pieces that, until now, stayed on paper/canvas and my portfolios. Before graduating from Coastal Carolina University, the Visual Arts Dept Seniors are required to produce an exhibition piece for the art gallery. Needing to incorporate almost all facets of my art talents, I created a faux clothing brand called "REBELZ CO". The brand emoted "Being yourself" and "Creating freely without fear of judgement". It was a huge success among my peers and many staff/admin personnel. This experience sparked what will become an entrepreneurial desire to share my visions and creations.



    NATIVES APPAREL

    Natives Apparel is free minded, adventurous streetwear and upcoming athletic wear with an indie twist. Everything is handmade and hand-printed on quality garments. This company is all about creating different styles and bringing them under one roof, from realism to illustrations.


    "Tie Dye Women's Hamsa Hand Tee"


    "Tie Dye Unisex Hamsa Hand Tee"


    "Natives Apparel Circle Logo Tee" 


    "Natives Apparel Wave Tee"


    "Vintage Skull Tee"


    "Third Eye Wolf Tee"


    "Vincent Price Zombie (Limited Edition) Tee"



    "Natives Apparel Arrow Tee"




    CAMPAIGN

    Untamed. You're wild and free, nothing can hold you back. I want to expand this concept into a fitness line for both men and women, including  boxy tops, sport bras, tank tops, performance leggings, shorts, and hoodies all in neutral/neon colors. My message is to empower people with their inner animal, inner strength, inner courage when doing any physical activity. I know how hard it is to lose weight, to stay on track, and to put every inch of effort into living a healthy lifestyle, especially if you are overweight. I believe that everyone should have the right to wear the type of athletic apparel and not be limited to certain sizes. I have noticed a lot of athletic companies that do not make larger sizes for bigger people. I want to give everyone the opportunity and inspiration that you can wear the same awesome workout clothes as everyone else without worrying if they carry larger sizes. Everyone wants to look good when they go workout and when you do, you perform better! #truth. 


    Prototypes


    "Untamed Women's Boxy Crop Top"



    "Lift Hungry Wolf Women's Leggings"


    What We Need:

    • Quality and Quantity Apparel
    • Expand sizes up to 4XL
    • Custom Plastisol Heat Transfers
    • Digital Garment Printer


      Other Ways You Can Help

      Just help us spread the word on Instagram, Tumblr, Facebook, Twitter, etc! Post it everywhere and anywhere! Any funding helps us getting the materials we need to get started and will be appreciated!

story:
State of the Art engraving machine, UT-50P.

"The goal was to create something that would embody art, creativity and self-expression." - Inka Olaogun, Founder/Creative Lead

 

The idea of personalization has always been the forefront, and a way to implement it was to introduce a "signature engraving plate" that would naturally compliment the design.

 

 

Billee Canning, Numa model

Tyler Dent, Numa model

Liliana Cortes, Model

 

Leah Planedin, Numa model

Parker Biletsky, Numa model

Special x Thank you's  

It has been a journey and it couldn't be possible without numerous people, who has made it special. We want thank each and everyone of our supporters and extend a special thank you to: 

  • Kurt Bugasto, Photography 
  • Lordski, Photography/video
  • Kuan Liu, Photography/video
  • Gadol Images, Photography
  • Evelina Developments, venue
  • Mercedes-Benz Heritage Valley, venue
  • Billee Canning, model
  • Tyler Dent, model
  • Leah Planedin, model
  • Netanya Cummings, model
  • Parker Biletsky, mode
  • Liliana Cortes, model

 For questions and inquiries contact us at: info@davincixxi.com 

Risks & Challenges

At this point, having finished design and prototyping process, we are at the very final stages of the project and are confident that we will be able to move on according to the schedule. We have a great manufacturer, who has been working with some world-leading brands for over 33 years and a strong support team working closely alongside us to ensure everything goes smoothly.

In case any unforeseeable issues arrive, transparency is key for us and we will be sure to communicate with all of our backers as soon as possible and keep you updated!

story:
RAISING FUNDS TO GO GREEN & SUSTAINABLE...

Welcome to my project, I hope you can support my brand to go green!

I want to make the change and switch to using 'sustainable fabrics' for my swimwear brand, using yarns that have been transformed from dumped plastics, ensuring it doesn't end up in our ocean. I have a team of skilled experts ready to make this project happen and built a great relationship with a sustainable fabric supplier and manufacturer.

With your support and backing I can produce a 'sustainable swimwear collection' and help protect our ocean!

As a ''Thank you'' for funding the project I have 'perks' to get you 'beach ready' for your next vacay! I have designed some cool microfibre quick dry towels that are super absorbent, lightweight and compact making them perfect for the gym, yoga, holidays and travelling! 

MAKING THE MOVE TO SUSTAINABILITY...

GIRL ALLIANCE VALUES...

A BIT ABOUT ME...

FOR FUNDING I HAVE AMAZING PERKS...

As well as the Microfibre towels, some great sustainable brands have kindly donated their products to the cause helping to get you vacay ready!!

THE BEACH DAY READY £100 *Eco glass bottle may arrive in a different colour

WEEKEND BEACH READY £150

THE ULTIMATE 'GET BEACH READY' £255

story:
Get a free pair of Seed sunglasses when you share this campaign with your friends! Details here

What are Seed Sunglasses?

1) Premium, stylish and sustainable sunglasses - High quality polarized lenses, frames made with 100% bamboo and steel spring hinges for a perfect and light fit

2) A clear message - Lets put an end to disposable and non-recyclable accessories - Materialism is out, make way for sustainable fashion!

3) Natural - The sunglasses are made from materials that are lightweight, pleasant and comfortable to wear

4) Sunglasses with a cause - With each pair of Seed sunglasses purchased, you donate to plant 5 new trees worldwide!

5) No middlemen - We are combining sustainable with affordable by cutting out all the middlemen and going straight from the manufacturers to your doorstep!

Campaign Prices

Seed Eyewear was featured in:



When we were smaller, most of us were thought to be friendly to the nature, to help our environment, to make our planet beautiful for our next generations. On our way, growing up, we sometimes forget what's it all about. We were fortunate enough to be surrounded by friends & family, who kept reminding us what really matters.

With our passion for design & fashion, we would not only like to give you something truly stylish & unique, but with a really high quality product, we would like to take care of your eyes AND of our planet!


The Frames

100 % handmade of bamboo, crafted with your measurements in mind, and light enough to follow you anywhere. Floatable on water and environment-friendly.

Light, but still very sturdy (without that cheap feeling in your hands), they won't leave any marks on your nose or behind the ears.

Why Bamboo?

Bamboo is one of the fastest growing plants in the world and is harvested only when the culms reach their greatest strength, and are mature. This ensures that the cultivation will have no impact on other species who rely on the Bamboo for nourishment. The Bamboo we typically use for our sunnies are Native to SouthEast Asia, and come in both natural and stained colors.

Bamboo can withstand a great deal of use without damage; in fact, it is stronger than oak, which is considered the most durable hardwood. Not only is bamboo strong and versatile, but it also possesses the renewable aspect. As wood has become more and more scarce, bamboo is being used as a renewable alternative. To produce a full-grown, hardwood tree can take up to sixty years, and then another sixty years time for a replacement. Species of bamboo equal to the height and width of a tree take as little as sixty days to mature completely. Bamboo is also easy to grow, because of its root systems, which produce several shoots at a time. Like all plants, it takes in greenhouse gasses and produces oxygen -- in fact, 35% more oxygen than an equivalent area of trees. Purchasing a pair of SEED Shades, you don't only get a fashionable trendy accessory, but also make a sustainable decision.

The Lenses

Premium double polarized lenses that will keep all the glare out of sight (literally!), together with lifelong bamboo frames & temples adjusted to the natural head shape, applied to the frames with steel spring hinges, form the best possible eye protection in the optimal frame shape!

But we wanted to go a step further...

We've combined it with the most simple & basic care of the Earth - by planting trees. Each year an estimated 3-6B of trees go down for different, usually unimportant, reasons. We know it's very difficult, almost impossible to stop that. But we know how we can help at least a little. 1 by 1, trees will form woods again, new life habitat & oxygen for all of us and our posterity. We're in contact with several tree-planting organizations that assured us your money will go to the right hands & seeds.

Finally, we've connected with some of them, which enabled us that each sunglasses will plant 5 trees throughout different areas worldwide. This is important to us just as much as sustainability in every part of our lives. We're learning about conservation & care of our planet each day, and we'd like us to learn together with you, contributing to the basics of our existence.


WHAT YOU CAN CHOOSE BETWEEN:

Here's the fun part! We have worked with over 100 fashion and lifestyle bloggers, local artists and creators to help us select the models and color combinations for the first Seed Eyewear collection.

You can initially choose between 3 different models and 2 different color variations. Don't worry, you can get all 3 models in both colors! You'll decide, which one, two, or more... you'd like to get your hands on after the campaign is over.

The Surfer

The Surfer is  fail-safe, timeless, effortless - the only pair of shades you'll ever need. 

You can go for the slightly more elegant black frame with blue reflective Revo lenses for that extra hint of glam-rock and a fresh, matt bamboo look, or go with the brown frame with red reflective Revo lenses if you prefer the more edgy, wooden look for going out there and hitting the waves.

The SEED Surfer has slightly larger lenses than conventional wayfarer style models, helping them to stand out even more & protect your eyes from glare.

With flexible German steel spring hinges, they will fit snuggly on every face and stay in place, making them perfect for everyday wear. UVA & UVB protection will serve you with the optimal eye care, while polarized lenses will elliminate any glare coming from back or front. Specially designed temples will sit behind your ears without causing any discomfort, even after wearing the sunnies for an entire day & help keep the sunglasses from moving even when doing a lot of jumping around, either at beach volley or a beach party.

The Jetsetter

With the Jetsetter you are getting a tear-drop shaped, slightly larger than average police model, high-quality, high-fashion and high-endurance sunglasses, made entirely of bamboo. Extremely light to wear, but firm and very durable, they will fit your nose during your travels, your sport activities, your fancying around over morning coffee or afternoon cocktails.

You can go for the darker Galaxy option, with black stained bamboo frame and blue/purple reflective Revo lenses, or the lighter Sunset, with brown stained bamboo frame with more visible wooden grain and red/yellow reflective lenses.

With flexible German steel spring hinges, they will fit snuggly on every face and stay in place, making them perfect for everyday wear. UVA & UVB protection will serve you with the optimal eye care, while polarized lenses will elliminate any glare coming from back or front. With an eye catching design and comfortable feel, these are bound to become THE pair of sunglasses that you have to have with you at all times, so... don't say we didn't warn you! ;)



The Hipster

Round Keyhole models are trending. If Wayfarers are eternal, these are of the moment. You won't pass unobserved with them - and thats cool!

With SEED Hipster you can go for the Black stained frames with dark grey gradient lenses - Mr. Holmes meets high-street fashion, a top-shelf look for your adventurous soul, or for Brown stained frames with warm brown/beige lenses to go for a bit softer, but still funky look and add that extra something to all your outfits.

With flexible German steel spring hinges, they will fit snuggly on every face and stay in place, making them perfect for everyday wear. UVA & UVB protection will serve you with the optimal eye care, while polarized lenses will elliminate any glare coming from back or front. Specially designed temples will sit behind your ears without causing any discomfort, even after wearing the sunnies for an entire day & help keep the sunglasses in place, even after an entire day of busy shopping and sightseeing in your favorite metropolis.



But to make all this happen, we need your help. We need a 100 of you that believe in sustainable fashion and are willing to support this project -this will allow us to begin the first production run of Seed sunglasses. Here's how you can support our campaign and be the first to get a pair of the freshest wooden sunglasses around!

1) Select a perk on the right hand side to start your pre-order. You can select either one pair or two pairs of Seed sunglasses at an early bird price as well as a few higher end perks.

2) Continue onto the next page to enter shipping information followed by payment details. Note; if you would like to contribute extra over and above the cost of the perk you have selected, you can change the figure above.

3) Complete payment via Paypal or using your credit/debit card. We will use these funds to make the first production run of Seed sunglasses and plant hundreds of trees worldwide, bringing this project to life.
