story:
Old stuffs are always fascinating to current generation, especially those who have the freedom to express themselves. 

Vintage, Retro, Old School, the 80’, the 90’, Classy, Lovely back then… It is like how some young people love listening to turntable, they will buy one if they can neglect all the technical complication.

Holga Digital is the same Concept with the new generation turntable! Just put the record on and spin the music. We bring the old good toy camera back to present! 

 

 

 We have design 4 different colors to fit all style!

Black, White, Pink and Mixed, there must be one fit your desired (You'll pick when campaign ends)

 

 

We designed the Holga Digital for everyone from the first-time Holga user to the photography enthusiast. You’ll be snapping beautiful images in a matter of seconds. You don’t have to fiddling around with shutter speed, aperture, IOS, or white balance. But it gives you the freedom to experience Holga unique image style; different lenses or you can even mount external flashes onto the build in hot shoes. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

One thing that made Holga so unique is due to it image quality produced. The Holga Digital is a high-quality glass optic with F2.8 and F8.0 aperture setting to fit different environment and situation. Unlike any other digital camera on the market by producing vivid color and dark corner by firmware, we create our image quality by the optics. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

With the new Holga Digital you can use your lens from the old Holga camera and pop them in by using a lens adaptor. This way you can share lens between your analog camera and the new Holga Digital.

 

 

 

 

 

 

We want to design a product that follows the great heritage of the Holga analog family. With no LCD, no extra setting you can enjoy the purity of photography. However, we know you like to share your work at a instant so the new Holga Digital can share photos in just a snap by using a WiFi SD card 

 

 

 

 

The most well recognizable Holga must be the Holga 120N, this analog camera shot 120mm film to create 1:1 ratio square photos. We have embedded this feature into the new Holga digital. Now you can switch between 4:3 or 1:1 ratio photograph without doing any post-editing and share with your friends right the way! 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We’re using Hong Kong local plastic and electronics suppliers to produce parts that meet our high-tolerances. The most crucial part—the final assembly—is handled by highly-trained electro-mechanical assembly engineers in Hong Kong. Each unit is thoroughly tested before being packaged and shipped out.

 

 

We’re working with all the local designer, engineer, and manufacturer in Hong Kong to create a truly Made in Hong Kong product. Redefine the Hong Kong spirit. The most crucial part—the final assembly—is done right in Hong Kong. Each unit is tested, packaged and shipped right from here 

We were inspired by classic Holga camera and wanted to recreate the magical experience of using a Holga with our loved ones. We were also convinced we could enhance this experience by digitalize the original Holga. 

 

 

The Holga Digital was conceived by our dedicated in-house development and design team; the entire project has been spearheaded by Holga founder Universal Electronics Industries Ltd. 

 

 

 

 

To the Press. Thank you for all of your posts, sharing the Holga Digital story, the amazing content you produce. Special Thanks to: 

GIZMODO, “Holga is Bringing Back Lo-Fi Photography With a Digital Twist”;  

Popular Photography, “The Iconic Holga Toy Camera Is Being Reborn In Digital”; 

Mashable, “Holga's digital toy camera lets you take Instagram pics IRL” 

PetaPixel, “Holga Digital: A Lo-Fi Toy Camera for the Digital World”;  

The Phoblographer, “A New Kickstarter Wants to Create the Holga Digital Read " and many more.

DigitalRev: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IqNkroLV5xk

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2Fa0566RZQk

WSJ: http://blogs.wsj.com/scene/2014/02/19/holgas-unlikely-story/

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

T.M. Lee - created the Holga. His vision was to inspire millions of Chinese to create lasting memories with this simple and affordable camera, at a time when photography was an expensive luxury in China that few could indulge in. Today, more than two decades later, the Holga has inspired millions throughout the world with the unique imagery it creates in the hands of the inspired artist. The Holga has become a classic.

 

 

Gray Leung - Maker and designer. 25 years experience in high-quality and functional home-ware and gadget. Bound by strong aesthetics and visionary views of design, he has created and brought high quality products to the market. He interprets and develops the products into modern design classics for your life and home.

 

 

Dennis Wong - Specialist in technology products for consumable customers. Strongly believe in transforming old stuff into new things. By creating high technology products from a normal product, 20 years in manufacturing experience of sound and music industry. His personal interests and developed system for data storage devices, consumer electronics tools and industrial products, but dedicated his career in making innovative products.

 

 

 

 

We need your help to get this product into manufacturing. We are looking for people who care about stylish design without compromise. People who want a product that doesn’t limit where and how you carry it. Your support will help us cover the costs of our first production run. If you can, help us spread the word!

Special Thank You

Thank you to our amazing producers Framework Creative help our finish all the art designs and video.

 

 

Thank you to our wonderful advisers CARBON help us finish the industry design of Holga Digital.

 

 

Thank you those excellent people who help us along the way for this project:

Anastasia Nevedrova, Ana Kosenko, Kaymen Wellham , Nick, Matt, Connor Rally Schmidt, Marissa Ritter , Emily Makowski, Vince Yue & his pretty wife , David Tse, Cherry Wu, Endy Lo, Terence Chan, Randy Cortes, Man, Joe Che & his Volkswagen, Ray Fung, Venus Lee, Dave HT Cheung, Ming Yeung, Mandy Lau, Christopher Tang, Isis Keung, 

Photo credit 

Phil Bebbington - Ice Cream is an Important Business, Bath Abbey Churchyard, Bath Somerset

Connor Lawless - http://moonjaguar.tumblr.com/

Sarah Sbk - http://pictures-thoughts-comments.blogspot.hk/2...

AWAKEMYSOUL - http://holgas.tumblr.com/post/87022037510/waiting

Pauline.Gailardo (soul-sweet) - http://soul-sweet.tumblr.com/

Dania Heller - satyricon

Perpetual Gaze - http://holgas.tumblr.com/post/88592218550

Adrian Douglas Gilliam - Short and Entertaining

Martin Briere - Holga wrestling

Steph Goralnick - for mona

Whatshisname - The dark side of Versailles 3, 

Paul Gallagher - holga 120 wpc family shot, 

Tinfoil Jesus(Felix) - Bless you, 

Jesse Kappmeyer(jkappmeyer) - Monster in Alley

Thank you to all of our family, Thank you to all of your inspiring ideas, we can not finish and launch Holga Digital without your help.

Most but not least, YOU!! Without your support, we simply cannot put this together so THANK YOU for supporting us!

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

We have worked extremely hard over the last few months to deliver a product you will love and we can be proud of.

The Main Challenges Ahead:

ENGINEERING

Creating Holga Digital requires engineering a complex system. To make sure we get this right, we have assembled an experienced team of engineers and designers. We have already built two generations of prototypes. Currently, we are producing the first batch to test with users.

MASS PRODUCTION

Taking prototypes to mass production involves sophisticated logistics and relationships with suppliers. To minimize these risks, we have been negotiating with suppliers (including backup suppliers), testing component quality, and building a team that can execute on our promises. Our plans are nearly in place, and we require the resources to ensure we achieve this.

Forecasting Risk

We’ve done our very best to forecast demand and create a solid production plan. We’ve learned a lot from the past, but sometimes forecasts don’t always hit the mark. Should we miss projections, we’ll let you know why and make it right as quickly as possible.

Supply Chain Risk

We’ve built a very capable team who have worked for all our products. However, component delays and unexpected shortages can occur. If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problem.

story:
“A game changing, disgustingly disruptive product.” 


What if there were one sports jacket that can give you multiple options to your style and personality? What if there were one sports jacket that can give you multiple options to your style from day to evening wear? What if there were one sports jacket that can give you the same look that all your other jackets have in your closet and more?. Look no further, we have the answer. 

The Gimono Exchange - The Gimono Exchange is a (patent pending 62/269,258) sports jacket that can change it’s lapel and collar off its jacket and replace it with another lapel and collar to the owner's liking. He can have a traditional jacket with a notch lapel and unzip it off to replace it with a shawl lapel of a different color, texture, width, or fabric. This allows the customer to be more fashionable and creative with his sports jacket. If he wants to go to a sports bar and watch his favorite team but still look distinguish and casual, he can exchange the lapel to a hoodie in his team colors all with the same jacket. Gene Gimono is also working on newly style looks to attach to the jacket to give the male customer a more fashionable presence. All with the same jacket.







Bio

Gene is a fashion designer in Atlanta that has serviced his customers for over 10 years with great quality and style in custom clothing. He started with menswear but his women's collection carried his business to a well known designer. He has  shown his collection in New York Fashion Week, Milan, Atlanta, and Charleston. Now he plans to revive his menswear with a brand new concept for men.


Get Creative With Your Blazer

Men’s fashion has start to change and more men are looking to be fashionable. The only problem is that women’s wear is the dominant industry so most designers get their ideas from  women’s trends and translate that into menswear. That direction has led to menswear looking more feminine than masculine. We have the jacket that will give you the style you want. 

The one style that hasn’t changed is the male suit. It is usually a tradition suit with different options like 2 or 3 button, single breast or double breast, notch or peak lapel, patch or welt pockets, different colors and fabrics, etc. The silhouette and patterns stay the same. In a nut shell, menswear is boring. There aren't many personalities to the suit or sports jacket, no texture and lack of creative patterns and design. Gene Gimono is looking for your support to help him change that.

 



How It Works

Simply unzip the collar and lapel from the inside of the jacket and replace it with another to give you a different style. 


What We Need & What You Get

We need $45,000 for product development with its manufacturer and marketing. There are other expenses that are included in the process.

  • pattern and sample development
  • fabric, trim and labeling
  • website development for online ordering and custom lapels
  • travel expenses to the factory in NYC to insure the development and quality of our garments
  •  Booth rental for MAGIC in LA and PROJECT in New York trade show to present and sell to retail stores. 
  • Factory cost to fill orders

When you support us you not only get some of our amazing perks, you also help the menswear movement for fashionable men to express themselves. Fashion trends may revolve in cycles but Gene Gimono is taking fashion forward literally. Be what everyone isn’t… you.

*all donators will receive updates on this project bi-weekly until we ship out perk orders and start selling in stores. Sponsors of $1000 or more will receive budget plans and expense report  every month as well. 

Our Perks  

  • $5 - Please accept our sincere thanks for telling us that you believe our product line should exist! We need these votes of confidence almost as much as we need funds to take the next step towards making Gimono Exchange a reality. Besides our thanks, you will get updates on the Gimono Exchange project progress and the opportunity to offer your input as the project proceeds.
  • $15 - Please accept our sincere thanks for telling us that you believe our  product line should exist! We need these votes of confidence almost as much as we need funds to take the next step towards making Gimono Exchange a reality. Besides our thanks, you will get updates on the Gimono Exchange project progress and the opportunity to offer your input as the project proceeds.
  • $25 - In addition to our sincere thanks for your vote of confidence and updates on Gimono Exchange project progress (as well as the opportunity to give us your input), you will receive a 10% discount on your future order of any single article of Gimono Gimono. *Estimated discounts are up to $100. *Discount valid and Expires 4-15-16/12-31-16

  • $50 - You will receive a Gene Gimono promotional t-shirt as a way of saying thank you for your support. sizes M/L/XL/XXL.  And updates on Gimono Exchange project progress as well as the opportunity to give us your input



  • $85 - Gene Gimono t-shirt - our sincere thanks and updates, a 10% discount on your next purchase from Gene Gimono. *Estimated discounts are up to $100. Discount valid and expires 4-15-16/12-31-16
  • $100 - Gene Gimono design consultation for your next custom design clothing. Gene will sit with you via the studio or Skype and help you design your outfit for a special event or casual outing. He will find the perfect fabrics for your design. The $100 will go towards the balance of your order. Menswear or womenswear. 
  • $250 -  Get a team jacket to sponsor the Gimono Exchange. A sports jacket designed by Gene Gimono in your favorite team colors. The jacket is made of cotton twill with jersey mesh on the side panels and sleeve.  *mesh colors are limited, sizes 38-48       .

Team Jacket Perk


  • $400 - The Gimono Exchange will sell for $500 in retail stores but you can preorder your jacket now for $400. That’s $100 off retail price 
  • $500 - The Gimono Exchange will sell for $500 in retail stores but you can preorder your jacket now for $400 plus $100 for 3 lapel exchanges. That’s 4 styles for the price of one sports jacket. A savings of $1200 if purchasing 4 high-end jackets from retail stores. 
  • $800 - gives you a custom tailored jacket to your size plus 4 custom attachments (shawl, hoodie, notch, mandarin) less than 3 month delivery depending on volume. Get to choose from 66 colors of 100% cotton twill or from unique prints in the Gene Gimono collection. The process starts as soon as you order. 15 available. 
  • $1000 - gives you a custom tailored Gimono Exchange suit (jacket and pant) to your size plus 4 custom attachments (shawl, hoodie, notch, mandarin) less than 3 month delivery depending on volume. Get to choose from 66 colors of 100% cotton twill or from unique prints in the Gene Gimono collection. And a photo shoot session with styling for the collection. The process starts as soon as you order. 15 available.

Fully Custom Tailored Sports Jacket Perk


*Custom tailored jackets come in 66 colors of your choice 


The Plan

Gene Gimono plan to develop its product with a well known men’s manufacturer in New York (made in the USA). After the samples are made and approved we plan to take our collection to market. To do that we will show our collection at MAGIC trade show in Vegas and the PROJECT show in New York, where retail buyers from all over the world come to look for new product and purchase for their stores. We will also have a website to take custom orders for those that want unique colors, fabrics and designs. We will have limited designs and custom designs submitted by you, the customer. You will get to send your own design and fabrics for a one of a kind lapel for your jacket  

You will receive your jackets before the retail stores get a chance to hang them on their rack. While others will only see them in a magazine you will actually have one. Be one of the first to change the way men wear fashion and their sports jackets. Be unique in your combinations.


Risks and Challenges 

Our factory partners are experienced in all things menswear. They have manufactured clothing for Kenneth Cole, Dockers, Ben Sherman and others. We believe in the quality of their work and the ability to have finished product on time. However, delays could occur because sometimes even experts run into snags on a newly product. We are prepared to promptly handle anything that comes between you, our favorite customers, and your sports jacket. If all else fails your jacket will be made locally in Atlanta and sent to you in a timely matter. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute financially? You can still help by sharing our campaign to a friend, family member, blogger or someone you think will find our product fashionable and right for them. 

Investments

We are also looking for investment opportunities in our product. The Gene Gimono Exchange is a patent pending design product and we are looking for financial partners to take this idea to mass market. 

 62/269,258
story_txt:
“A game changing, disgustingly disruptive product.” 

What if there were one sports jacket that can give you multiple options to your style and personality? What if there were one sports jacket that can give you multiple options to your style from day to evening wear? What if there were one sports jacket that can give you the same look that all your other jackets have in your closet and more?. Look no further, we have the answer. 
The Gimono Exchange - The Gimono Exchange is a (patent pending 62/269,258) sports jacket that can change it’s lapel and collar off its jacket and replace it with another lapel and collar to the owner's liking. He can have a traditional jacket with a notch lapel and unzip it off to replace it with a shawl lapel of a different color, texture, width, or fabric. This allows the customer to be more fashionable and creative with his sports jacket. If he wants to go to a sports bar and watch his favorite team but still look distinguish and casual, he can exchange the lapel to a hoodie in his team colors all with the same jacket. Gene Gimono is also working on newly style looks to attach to the jacket to give the male customer a more fashionable presence. All with the same jacket.
















Bio

Gene is a fashion designer in Atlanta that has serviced his customers for over 10 years with great quality and style in custom clothing. He started with menswear but his women's collection carried his business to a well known designer. He has  shown his collection in New York Fashion Week, Milan, Atlanta, and Charleston. Now he plans to revive his menswear with a brand new concept for men.

Get Creative With Your Blazer

Men’s fashion has start to change and more men are looking to be fashionable. The only problem is that women’s wear is the dominant industry so most designers get their ideas from  women’s trends and translate that into menswear. That direction has led to menswear looking more feminine than masculine. We have the jacket that will give you the style you want. 
The one style that hasn’t changed is the male suit. It is usually a tradition suit with different options like 2 or 3 button, single breast or double breast, notch or peak lapel, patch or welt pockets, different colors and fabrics, etc. The silhouette and patterns stay the same. In a nut shell, menswear is boring. There aren't many personalities to the suit or sports jacket, no texture and lack of creative patterns and design. Gene Gimono is looking for your support to help him change that.



 


How It Works
Simply unzip the collar and lapel from the inside of the jacket and replace it with another to give you a different style. 





What We Need & What You Get
We need $45,000 for product development with its manufacturer and marketing. There are other expenses that are included in the process.

pattern and sample development
fabric, trim and labeling
website development for online ordering and custom lapels
travel expenses to the factory in NYC to insure the development and quality of our garments
 Booth rental for MAGIC in LA and PROJECT in New York trade show to present and sell to retail stores. 
Factory cost to fill orders


When you support us you not only get some of our amazing perks, you also help the menswear movement for fashionable men to express themselves. Fashion trends may revolve in cycles but Gene Gimono is taking fashion forward literally. Be what everyone isn’t… you.
*all donators will receive updates on this project bi-weekly until we ship out perk orders and start selling in stores. Sponsors of $1000 or more will receive budget plans and expense report  every month as well. 

Our Perks

We need these votes of confidence almost as much as we need funds to take the next step towards making Gimono Exchange a reality. Besides our thanks, you will get updates on the Gimono Exchange project progress and the opportunity to offer your input as the project proceeds.

We need these votes of confidence almost as much as we need funds to take the next step towards making Gimono Exchange a reality. $50 - You will receive a Gene Gimono promotional t-shirt as a way of saying thank you for your support. sizes M/L/XL/XXL.  And updates on Gimono Exchange project progress as well as the opportunity to give us your input









$85 - Gene Gimono t-shirt - our sincere thanks and updates, a 10% discount on your next purchase from Gene Gimono. *Estimated discounts are up to $100. Discount valid and expires 4-15-16/12-31-16

story:
Short Summary of Jacquezel 

  • Our designer/maker is also our founder. We produce a collection of beautifully handcrafted  bags and accessories in small handmade batches. 
  • We are also firm believers of women empowerment. We inject these elements and characters into our brand.

WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP

Despite the fact that we are capable of producing these items by hand, we are out numbered by the orders that we receive and we would like to have some of the products made by our partnering manufacturers. We've picked out a couple of high-quality manufacturers that can produce the bags in large quantities but the upfront making costs for manufacturing are quite expensive. 

With your help and support, we'd love to expand the brand by acquiring better tools and materials to produce finer quality goods, and to have the products made by manufacturers.


WHAT YOU GET

 We are offering special discounts for our products on Indiegogo to encourage your help and support. Free shipping within Malaysia when you purchase MYR 150 above, and free worldwide shipping when you purchase US$ 200 above. 





















































Risks & Challenges

In simple words, bags and accessories are what we do daily, and we have an experienced team looking after this Indiegogo project. Once we have received the funds, we will start on production immediately. We want to minimize the risk and maximize the satisfaction for our backers but we are not perfect and unexpected hurdles are not uncommon in manufacturing. Nevertheless, we are still very much confident that we've set ourselves achievable targets and delivery dates. In the unlikely event that anything should not run to plan, we will be sure to provide updates and to keep backers fully informed as we progress. 

International shipping:

Shipping internationally can be costly and should rates fluctuate, we will notify immediately. 


Duty/VAT charges: 

If you live outside of Malaysia, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges.


Customs:

Some countries are known for being slow in customs, and we are sorry we won't be able to be much help in this area! 

 


FAQ

Q: How does Indiegogo detect my multiple purchases?

A: Free shipping worldwide is available for purchase above US$ 200, and within Malaysia for purchase above RM 150. We realize that the website doesn't automatically detect purchases for free shipping perks, therefore we will be doing everything manually. 

To enjoy the free shipping perks, 

Step 1: Purchase using one account / name

Step 2: E-mail us at info@jacquezel.com your multiple payment proofs

Step 3: We will return the shipping fees within 35 days via PayPal (for worldwide backers) and  via bank transfer (for Malaysian backers). 

Q: Are the leather synthetic or genuine?

A: We only work with real leathers.

Q: Can I purchase directly from www.jacquezel.com instead of Indiegogo?

A: Yes you may, but special discounts are only available on the Indiegogo campaign.

Q: When will my bags arrive? 

A: The bags will arrive at your doorstep by mid-September 



Other Ways You Can Help

It would mean so much to us if you could make some noise about this campaign via social media! You can share this campaign using Indiegogo share tools. Thank you in advance! Have a cake day, cheers! 

XXX, JQZ

story:
Smarter, Tougher, More Powerful

Meet the most powerful smartwatch on the planet.

 

FIT TO SURVIVE

We are back on Indiegogo with new features and advanced energy harvesting technology that improves on the original award-winning PowerWatch. Our second generation PowerWatch 2 uses body heat and light to power the most advanced smartwatch you never need to charge so you can keep doing what you do best without any interruptions.

 

 

Move to the Beat of Your Own Heart.

PowerWatch 2 is designed with improved thermoelectric generators and all-new solar-cell technology, constantly generating more than enough energy to operate the built-in intelligent heart rate monitor, wherever, whenever.

 

See Our True Colors Shining Through.

With more energy than ever before, PowerWatch 2 introduces the first full-color LCD display powered by thermoelectric and solar energy, adding color to the power of you.

 

Location. Location. Location.

Always-on onboard GPS makes PowerWatch 2 the ultimate tool for anyone mapping out their run, hike, ride, or swim with the PowerWatch 2 companion app.  It's packed with useful health and fitness metrics like pace, distance, steps, sleep, cadence, and more.

 

 

Introducing PowerWatch 2 Luxe Edition

The Luxe Edition comes with sapphire glass and a 22mm shark fin Milanese strap and quick release butterfly buckle.

 

Introducing PowerWatch 2 Premium Edition

The Premium Edition comes with sapphire glass and a 22mm stainless steel metal strap and quick release butterfly buckle.

 

Comparison Chart

Video of an Early Prototype

 

 

 

MATRIX Gemini Thermoelectric Generator

Our thermoelectric technology converts heat to electric power, the same technology used by NASA to power the Voyager Spacecraft and the Mars Rover. It is based on the Seebeck effect discovered in 1821. In the absence of an applied voltage gradient V, electric current, J, can still be generated if there is a temperature gradient, T. A thermoelectric material must have a low thermal conductivity and high electrical conductivity to function efficiently. These properties are not commonly found in nature.

In order to make a thermoelectric material efficient, one must use a semiconductor whose Fermi level is tuned correctly by doping. Too much doping, and the Seebeck coefficient decreases. Too little doping and the electrical conductivity decreases. In addition, the semiconductor should have some mechanism to scatter phonons frequently. MATRIX has developed a nano-structured semiconductor, the Gemini, that accomplishes these things.

 

MATRIX Mercury

A thermoelectric module is composed of many tiny semiconductor "legs" that when added together create a larger voltage than one individual leg alone. However, the voltage generated by body heat is on the order of 20 to 100mV, too small to operate electronics. A DC-DC boost converter is needed to boost this small voltage to 5V to run the electronics and charge a battery.  Current off-the-shelf boosters have terrible efficiency and large startup voltage. MATRIX has developed the world's most efficient booster with the lowest startup voltage on the market today. We call it the MATRIX Mercury.

 

Together the MATRIX Gemini and Mercury outperform any combination of thermoelectric and boost converter by 3X. To learn more, please visit www.matrixindustries.com

 

 

Matrix’s solar cell technology utilizes amorphous silicon that is superior to crystalline silicon when absorbing indirect and indoor light. The solar cell is laminated onto the display module for a seamless construction and optical clarity.

 

 

Matrix's team is composed of experts in thermoelectric material science, thermal engineering, and consumer product development and manufacturing. The core team consist of PhD graduates from Caltech, MIT, Harvard, and UCSD. Our manufacturing director has over 25 years of experience and has shipped millions of units for leading technology companies.

The team was responsible for the award-winning success of the original PowerWatch, which debuted on Indiegogo.  PowerWatch exceeded its original crowdfunding goal by 938% in January of 2017 and successfully shipped all orders by fall 2018. The amazing feedback the team received from Indiegogo customers motivated them to push forward to manufacture the world's most powerful smartwatch, PowerWatch 2.

story:
Rock-A-Bye Baby is a goal of this new mommy to give an avenue for stay at home moms to showcase their handmade children's items. From bows, to outfits, to invitations and more. This store will showcase all the talented stay at home moms around the country. 

With your support we will be raising the funds to do the build out and get the necessary start up supplies to not only build this shop and its merchandise, but to make it a must go to spot for all moms looking for those one of kind items for their children, both locally and online.

story:
" MORGAW seats embody the the needs of  sport & professional riders."

If you ask active riders ( road/mtb/enduro) what are they expecting from their saddle,usually you get a simple answer : " Comfort, light weight & the possibility of changing rails." Secondary responses are based around non-slip seat surface & compatibility. Their answers were not a big surprise to us as our team is built up from passionate riders who understand current issues with traditional saddle designs.



After extensive testing of standard saddles we came to the conclusion that the structure of standard saddles is very limited & does not allow other specific adaptations. Upon completion of our study program we began experimentation with new saddle structural designs & material compositions that could potentially unite the individual needs of riders from all categories on one platform.

Brand story

MORGAW® seats was established in 2008, founded by longtime friends Martin Moravcik (Slovakia) and Slawek Gawlik (Poland). Both of us, Martin & Slawek are former MTB pro riders. Since 2010 we have been producing ultra-light full carbon saddles (weight totaling 100 grams foam core with leather covering) from our small production facility in Slovakia.

From our customer service, manufacturing & riding experience, we have identified key deficiencies in design elements. By late 2010 our core focus shifted to New Product Development (NPD), concentrating on revolutionary compositions.

Since 2011 we started development on a new design which could potentially eliminate saddle deficiencies while at the same time met the needs of professional & active riders.

MORGAW® is a European company, head office based in Slovakia where all research & design innovations are developed with our international office based in Taiwan with our manufacturing facility.




SADDLE

The essential characteristics for a performance seat are comfort & light weight. Achieving comfort in the racing category for saddles wasn’t an easy task at all. The basic elements of comfort reside in ergonomic contour design, saddle width, foam density & shock absorption. 

Throughout our teams extensive testing & observations, we were able to identify another key element that allowed light movement in the saddle, making it more responsive to the rider’s body movement.

 Within our design we have developed a revolutionary patented saddle with a unique & self - supporting platform, which is based on shock absorbers.

The shock absorbers are high demanding in terms of the possibility to adapt various density suited to the weight of the rider, light weight saddle which creates riding comfort, stability & reliability.This unique platform combined with shock absorbers allows the saddle to be divided into two self - supporting entities: seat & undercarriage .The design has opened a new structure of possibilities which allow us to incorporate the key performance characteristics into our saddle. Shock absorbers will be sold in three stifnesses categories which are based on riders weight & compatibility. Soft 40kg - 70kg, Medium 70kg - 85kg & Hard 85kg -100kg.


 Active & professional riders understand the issues of crooked, cracked & broken rails, especially with carbon material. For conventional seats these issues often render the saddle useless & in many cases, expensive functional seats are discarded due to damaged rails. MORGAW® seat designs allow the rider to exchange every component when you need & as often as you like, including rails. All components will be available to buy as separate spare parts.

A key aspect of MORGAW® saddles functionality is compatibility & customization. Our patented design allows for MORGAW®i nterchangeable seats to be fitted to the same platform of rails & shock absorbers. With four (4)screws you may change the entire saddle for a different ergonomic design & shape without loosening the rails from the seat post. In practicality this means you can replace damaged saddles or alternatively swap the seat more efficiently while rails & shock absorbers remain intact. The seat component itself will be available in a very convenient price structure, same as the rails & other key components.


Aside from technical innovation we concentrated on achieving simplistic & stylish  design elements that were easily customized to accommodate his or hers color taste. You can futher customize your seat with the accessory color kit which will be available in ten (10) different colors.

MORGAW® saddles first release will be available in three skin color options: Black, White & Silver. Each seat has a specially designed non slip grip ,lightly embossed pattern created for additional hold in rainy conditions & is gentle to your lycra cycling shorts for road bike cyclists. 


All saddle designs by MORGAW® have passed EN tests & criteria. Your  MORGAW® saddle & products will be authenticated with EN certificate.

All MORGAW saddles are compatible with most of the seatposts, even a dropper ones. In case it's not, you may have to get a clamp kit for your seatpost to make it compatible.


MORGAW SEATPOST

Similar to the saddle, we identified seat post deficiencies & created a solution as saddle & seatposts combine for overall performance. We believe our design successfully embodies the needs of riders in our collection of MORGAW®seat posts. FOR MORE INFO AND DIAMETERS CHECK OUR GALLERY!


WHERE WE ARE NOW

After completion of the development stages we are now ready for major production. 


The challenges with new product design allowed us to experiment with many various material compositions & manufacturing techniques. Initially our project aim was to manufacture from our European HQ however after extensive analysis of materials & direction our company has taken, the evaluation of our production we decided to base our manufacturing in the centralized hub of Taiwan as our growth, capacity & international expansion is pivotal to the success of the company.

With all components manufactured in close proximity to our Taiwan offices, our team has been based in Taiwan for the past 12 months, overseeing the entire manufacturing processes to ensure our projects meet the high standards created during our research & development stages.


Background funding of our project

In the very beginning our project has been financed from our own private money & with assistance from our relatives. As our project expanded & evolved to it’s current position the demand for greater funding increased. At this point we have secured private financial investors that have allowed our team in Taiwan to finalize the production developments & implementation of initial prototyping.

Our final stage now is mass production which requires further funding. Therefore, we turn to you through indiegogo.com with a request to continue supporting our project.


OUR GOALS

Our project is split into three (3) following stages:

1st Stage: Development of saddle platform – completed.

2nd Stage: Implementation of product to mass production & sales strategizing – current 

3rd Stage: a, Expand MORGAW® racing saddle collection

  b, Launch City bike & Kids bike saddle collections into market

  c, Include full carbon saddles into our product range (carbon corpus)

  d, Finalize development of applications that evaluate real time riding (RTR) using compatible systems for android & iOS. Sequential sensors strategically positioned within the saddle transfers weight & distribution data of the rider via Bluetooth to your MORGAW® app on smartphone & tablet devices, evaluating precise body movement, shock absorption, etc. , recommending future refinements in saddle selection within the MORGAW® saddle products.






PROJECT PLAN

Oct. - Dec. 2013: Preparation of production molds for mass production.

January 2014: - First batch goes into production.

  - EN product certification, testing of first production batch.

March 2014: - Official retailers batch ready for delivery.

Our current position stands as 2nd Stage of our project is completed & we are ready to start with the 3rd stage. Ensuring we reach our timeline & goals is currently dependent on your generous support of our project & to our product developments.


RISKS & CHALLANGES

1) MORGAW® commitment to contributors:

·  We will inform our contributors about the progress that we are making.

·  This will include delivery scheduling updates – consisting of anticipated release timelines.

·  Forecasting & production lead times +/- expected completion dates .

·  Our communication will remain completely transparent & open to our contributors in the event of unforeseen & unexpected issues that may arise during manufacturing processes.

·  Immediate response & resolution to unexpected issues. 

2) Prototype stage:

MORGAW® saddles & seat posts have currently undergone a three (3) year development program. Recent analysis of MORGAW® saddles & seatposts has been conducted via laboratory testing while simultaneous field testing has been initiated with professional & active riders (road, mtb, enduro). Production of EVO OVAL™ rails (carbon & AL 2014 – T6 materials) & shock absorbers have passed extensive EN tests & demanding field testing carried out by professional athletes. The performance results certify our products are ready for mass production.

3) Manufacturing:

Prototype samples are currently being implemented into mass production with outstanding results. Current forecasts & modeling indicates we are progressing to plan.

4) Delivery time:

Our aim is to meet our target deadline & deliver the first batch of our products on schedule (late March 2014). Keeping our contributors updated for project completion & notification for project extension will be provided immediately upon request.

5) Warranty:

·  MORGAW® saddles offer a two (2) year manufacturing warranty for defective materials & workmanship.

·  The customer is responsible for returns expenses to MORGAW® .

·  All claims will be reviewed by an experienced MORGAW® representative where the representative reserves all rights in determining improper use & subsequent damages caused by the owner / user.

·  In the result that a warranty claim is accepted the MORGAW® product will be repaired or replaced at the expense of MORGAW® including return delivery.


                              For further information you can contact us at info@morgaw.com


                      Please help support our project & enjoy the freedom of your ride!

                                                                         THANK YOU!
story_txt:
" MORGAW seats embody the the needs of  sport & professional riders."
If you ask active riders ( road/mtb/enduro) what are they expecting from their saddle,usually you get a simple answer : " Comfort, light weight & the possibility of changing rails." Secondary responses are based around non-slip seat surface & compatibility. Their answers were not a big surprise to us as our team is built up from passionate riders who understand current issues with traditional saddle designs.




After extensive testing of standard saddles we came to the conclusion that the structure of standard saddles is very limited & does not allow other specific adaptations. Upon completion of our study program we began experimentation with new saddle structural designs & material compositions that could potentially unite the individual needs of riders from all categories on one platform. 

Brand story
MORGAW® seats was established in 2008,
founded by longtime friends Martin Moravcik (Slovakia)
and Slawek Gawlik (Poland).
Both of us, Martin & Slawek are former MTB pro riders. Since 2010 we have been producing ultra-light full
carbon saddles (weight totaling 100 grams foam core with leather covering) from our small production facility in Slovakia.
From our customer service,
manufacturing & riding experience, we have
identified key deficiencies
in design elements. By late 2010 our core focus
shifted to New Product Development (NPD), concentrating on revolutionary
compositions.
Since 2011 we started development on a
new design which could potentially eliminate saddle deficiencies while at the same time met the needs
of professional & active riders. 
MORGAW® is a
European company, head office based in Slovakia where
all research & design innovations are developed with our international office based in
Taiwan with our manufacturing facility.


SADDLEThe
essential characteristics for a performance
seat are comfort & light weight. Achieving
comfort in the racing category for saddles wasn’t an easy
task at all. The basic elements of comfort
reside in ergonomic contour design, saddle width, foam density & shock
absorption. 

Throughout our teams extensive testing
& observations, we were able to identify
another key element that allowed light movement in
the saddle, making it more responsive to the rider’s body movement.

Within our design we have developed a revolutionary patented saddle with a unique &
self - supporting platform, which is based on shock absorbers.
The shock absorbers are high demanding in terms of the possibility to adapt various density suited to the
weight of the rider, light weight saddle which creates riding
comfort, stability & reliability.This
unique platform combined with shock absorbers
allows the saddle
to be divided into two self - supporting entities: seat
& undercarriage .The design has opened a
new structure of possibilities which allow us
to incorporate the key performance characteristics into our saddle. Shock absorbers will be sold in three
stifnesses categories which are based on riders weight & compatibility.
Soft 40kg - 70kg, Medium 70kg - 85kg &
Hard 85kg -100kg.



Active & professional
riders understand the issues of crooked,
cracked & broken rails, especially with carbon material. For conventional
seats these issues often render the saddle useless & in many cases, expensive functional seats are discarded due to damaged rails. MORGAW® seat designs allow the rider to exchange every component when you need & as often as you like, including rails. All components
will be available to buy as separate spare parts.


A key aspect of MORGAW® saddles functionality is compatibility & customization. Our patented design allows for MORGAW®i nterchangeable seats to be fitted to the same
platform of rails
& shock absorbers. With four (4)screws you may change the entire saddle for a different ergonomic
design & shape without loosening the rails from the seat post. In practicality
this means you can replace damaged saddles or
alternatively swap the seat more efficiently
while rails & shock absorbers remain intact.
The seat component itself will
be available in a very
convenient price structure, same as the rails & other key components.


Aside
from technical innovation we concentrated on achieving simplistic & stylish  design
elements that were easily customized to accommodate his or hers color taste. You can futher customize your seat with the accessory color kit which will be available in ten (10) different colors.




MORGAW® saddles first release will
be available in three skin color options:
Black, White & Silver. Each seat has a specially
designed non slip grip ,lightly embossed pattern created for additional hold in rainy conditions & is
gentle to your lycra cycling shorts for road
bike cyclists. 


All saddle designs by MORGAW® have
passed EN tests & criteria. Your  MORGAW® saddle & products will be
authenticated with EN certificate.


All MORGAW saddles are compatible with most of the seatposts, even a dropper ones. In case it's not, you may have to get a clamp kit for your seatpost to make it compatible.MORGAW SEATPOSTSimilar to the saddle, we identified seat post deficiencies & created a solution as
saddle & seatposts combine for overall performance. We believe our design successfully embodies the needs of
riders in our collection of MORGAW®seat
posts. FOR MORE INFO AND DIAMETERS CHECK OUR GALLERY!










WHERE WE ARE NOW
After completion of the development stages we are now ready for major production. 


The challenges
with new product design allowed us to experiment with many various material
compositions & manufacturing techniques. Initially our project aim was to
manufacture from our European HQ however after extensive analysis of materials
& direction our company has taken, the evaluation of our production we
decided to base our manufacturing in the centralized hub of Taiwan as our
growth, capacity & international expansion is pivotal to the success of the
company.


 With all components manufactured in close proximity to our Taiwan
offices, our team has been based in Taiwan for the past 12 months, overseeing
the entire manufacturing processes to ensure our projects meet the high
standards created during our research & development stages.



Background funding of our project
In the very
beginning our project has been financed from
our own private money & with assistance from
our relatives. As our project expanded & evolved to it’s current position the demand for greater funding increased. At this point we have secured private financial
investors that have allowed our team in Taiwan to
finalize the production developments & implementation of initial
prototyping.
 Our final stage now is mass production which requires further
funding. Therefore, we turn

story:
It's hard to believe that I have been sailing for almost three years.  During these three years, I've had countless adventures with friends and families.

More times than you may believe, people have asked me questions like:  
"Do I need to bring any money?
"Can I give you money for gas?"
"How much will this trip cost?"    

As you know, I love sailing probably more than anyone else, so I have never charged anyone to go out.

As I look to my next level of sailing adventures, I am now asking for your help.  I have signed up for the July class to get my ASA 103/104 license. . .in other words, I'll finally be able to rent and sail the much larger 40-50 foot boats.  This means overnight trips!

I need your help to get this next license.  Any amount will help, but let me encourage you to donate at least $30.  At this level, you will get an awesome shirt.  Check out the gallery for a picture of the shirt design.

Thanks, in advance, for your help!  It means a lot to have you with me on this journey.

story:
Simple but significant!

I'm a graphic designer, shoe maker/designer and leather worker.  I've been noticing more and more, that there are good quality leather products in the web, but almost all the time they are not cheap, and almost can't tell them apart.  I want to add a very nice Guatemalan fabric to my products, and make them more unique!

Please help me, achieve a big dream of mine, of creating my own brand, and be a professional leather worker! and in the proccess you'll recieve a high-quality leather product.

you can't go wrong!

 

 

With your help we are going to:

SPECIFIC
  • Buy a leather sewing machine
  • Buy all the missing tools to make a great long-lasting product
  • Create a small workshop
  • Build a website
  • And start offering costum leather works, through the shop, and online!
General
  • Make more affordable GREAT leather products
  • Further down, start teaching the Leather working trade!

 

All these photos are my prototypes

story:
Short Summary

  • I am a young fashion designer from Ireland and I have just this month moved to America which has exhausted my funding. I have put everything I have into making my business successful, but taking this huge transatlantic step towards the 'American Dream' has been extremely expensive so far!
  • I really want to bring my designs for the 2015 collection to life, and I would greatly your help. I have been taking care of every aspect of my business myself since March 2012 - photography, sourcing, design, making, selling - so you would be my first partners!
  • You can see here some of my previously completed gowns from last year's collection. If any of you are interested in seeing sketches from my 2015 collection, please get in touch. I am just wary of publicly releasing all of my designs online before I've had a chance to make them myself!
  • I specialize in vintage-inspired and bohemian style gowns, but I also love to create modern twists on classic shapes as well as some very simple, streamlined elegant gowns. 
  •  Without your help, I cannot make my 2015 collection come to life. I need you!

What We Need & What You Get

  • I need funding to cover the fabrics and materials for 12 gowns. This breaks down to approximately $150-200 per sample gown to produce.
  •  I have worked for months on designing and editing the sketches and features of this collection and I am so excited to bring the gowns to life so that real brides can wear them. My previous collections can be found online or gracing the pages of a bridal magazine, so it's killing me not being able to bring my newest ideas to life.
  • Those who donate will receive huge discounts off any product across any of my collections. My gowns are custom-made from scratch, either one of my collection gowns or we can work together to design a one-of-a-kind gown for you. This will translate into a huge discount off your wedding gown, prom gown, bridesmaids dresses, etc. The perks are worth hundreds of dollars because to me, your help is invaluable.
  • If I do not reach my full funding goal for a 12 gown collection, I will proceed with as many gowns as my funding will cover. 
  • My collection will be completed within 2 months of the end of the campaign.

The Impact

  • I simply do not have the funds right now to begin ordering fabric to produce these gowns.
  • I would probably only be able to afford to produce 1 gown ever 1-2 months over the course of the year, but it would lack the impact of releasing a complete and cohesive collection which shows the full expanse of my vision.
  • I have never asked for help before, but I truly fear being set back years in my business, and I hope there are those out there who appreciate someone hustling and working non-stop to achieve their dream. 

Risks & Challenges

  • I have completed over 100 gowns in the last year alone, so I do not anticipate any difficulty in producing these gowns once I have the money to buy my materials! I work solely for myself on my business and I am 100% dedicated to my work. I have positive reviews from clients all around the world, from brides to debutantes to Grammy Award attendees.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you cannot donate, please please please talk to someone you know who might be interested in my work. 
  • Those who donate will get huge discounts off any gowns from across any of my collections, including 2015, so if you know someone who will be looking for a bridal gown or evening-wear, send them in my direction!
  • If you think my project is worthwhile, please share using the Indiegogo share tools!

*My gowns generally retail from $200-$800 so they are very reasonable!!

story:
BLACK ROSE BOOKS carries the LARGEST Collection of

African American Literature in the Pacific NW. 

With a Special Emphasis on CHILDREN'S and YOUNG ADULT Material.

Because I'm am not tied to brick and mortar, I can bring the Bookstore to you.

 I am able to tailor my titles to fit any event, be it CIVIC, CHURCH, AUTHOR/LITERARY, or SOCIAL.

The mission of Black Rose Books is a simple one. To put books into the hands of our children that let them Dream, Wish, and Explore the world, with characters that look like them.

I like to partner with EDUCATORS, MENTORS, AUTHORS and of course concerned PARENTS, to make that a REALITY.

I want to become your FIRST CHOICE for AfricanAmerican Literature.

Black Rose Books is working to put together the LARGEST African American BookExpo...the PacificNW has ever seen!!!

The NWBlackBookExpo...will be held in September of 2015!!!

We're looking to bring together Nationally known Authors...Local Authors...Black Vendors..Food...Music and MORE!!!

BUT I NEED YOUR HELP!!!

Any and All contributions will help...for more info...contact ME!!!

Michael J. Hicks 

 Black Roses Books  

 #971.533.6468

michael@BlackRoseBooksPDX.net

www.BlackRoseBooksPDX.net

THANK YOU!!!

story:
THE VISION

"Have you ever thought of a lock that could recognize you in less than a second, unlocking your door the moment you touch the handle?"

Other smart locks take longer than regular locks, even more than 30 seconds to take out your phone, connect to Bluetooth, and unlock your door. But is that really ‘progress'? 

Technology should make life easier, not more complicated. That’s why Ola has a fingerprint sensor integrated into the door handle. Register your fingerprint directly on the handle, and then forget about your keys and phone.

Ola is completely self-contained. All it needs is you.

The First

Ola is the first smart lock on the market to incorporate Bluetooth 4.0 connectivity and capacitive fingerprint technology, making Ola not only keyless but phoneless.


 The Fastest

The days of searching for keys or fumbling through smart phone apps are officially over. Ola has incorporated one of the best fingerprint sensors on the market (the FPC1020AM from Sweden) which means that you can unlock Ola in under a second.


The Longest

We test-opened Ola over 31,042 times with one set of 4 AA-batteries, which is the equivalent of two years of normal use. We also included a button that activates the back up AAA-battery. The backup uses Panasonic Evolta batteries that hold the Guinness world record for longest shelf life, and gives Ola a total battery life of about 7 years. In case of an emergency, you can power Ola with a micro USB.


Simplicity: Not only keyless, but phoneless

Our fingerprint technology liberates Ola from relying on other devices like a smart phone. No more lost keys and no more anxiety over dying phones. Ola doesn't need them. It only needs you and your fingerprint to unlock the door and get inside.
story_txt:
THE VISION"Have you ever thought of a lock that could 
recognize you in less than a second, unlocking your door the moment you 
touch the handle?"Other smart locks take longer than regular 
locks, even more than 30 seconds to take out your phone, connect to 
Bluetooth, and unlock your door. But is that really ‘progress'? Technology
 should make life easier, not more complicated. That’s why Ola has a 
fingerprint sensor integrated into the door handle. Register your 
fingerprint directly on the handle, and then forget about your keys and 
phone. Ola is completely self-contained. All it needs is you.The FirstOla
 is the first smart lock on the market to incorporate Bluetooth 4.0 
connectivity and capacitive fingerprint technology, making Ola not only 
keyless but phoneless.
 The FastestThe days of searching for keys or fumbling 
through smart phone apps are officially over. Ola has incorporated one 
of the best fingerprint sensors on the market (the FPC1020AM from 
Sweden) which means that you can unlock Ola in under a second.
The Longest
We test-opened Ola over 31,042 times with 
one set of 4 AA-batteries, which is the equivalent of two years of 
normal use. We also included a button that activates the back up 
AAA-battery. The backup uses Panasonic Evolta batteries that hold the 
Guinness world record for longest shelf life, and gives Ola a total 
battery life of about 7 years. In case of an emergency, you can power 
Ola with a micro USB.







Simplicity: Not only keyless, but phoneless
Our fingerprint technology liberates Ola from relying on other 
devices like a smart phone. No more lost keys and no more anxiety over 
dying phones. Ola doesn't need them. It only needs you and your 
fingerprint to unlock the door and get inside.




More efficient battery use
We paid special attention to Ola’s
 battery life. With only one set of 4 AA batteries, Ola test-opened more
 than 31,042 times via Bluetooth. Ola's extra set of 4 Panasonic Evolta 
AAA batteries also won the Guinness world record for longest shelf life.
 These features combine to give Ola a total battery life of 7 years, not
 to mention the emergency activation button on the bottom of Ola. It 
also has the micro USB port that connects to the power compartment and 
powers Ola with an external battery.




Security meets convenience
No keyhole means no lock bumping 
or lock picking. Ola can be installed in minutes with either a Mortise 
lock case for security, or a cylinder lock for convenience and 
easy installation.
Regular fingerprint sensors recognize users by 
scanning the ridges and valleys of their fingerprint, but that pattern 
is easily duplicated. Our sensor utilizes a radio frequency signal to 
scan the pattern under the surface of the skin. A fake fingerprint has 
no pattern under the surface, so our radio frequency technology saves 
you from worrying that someone may copy your fingerprints.
You can
 also share access to Ola with friends and family, either with a 
Bluetooth key or by registering their fingerprint. That means the ease 
of Ola isn't just for you, but everyone important to you.








Control at your fingertips… literally

Ola’s FPC1020 Capacitive Touch Fingerprint Sensor offers 
state-of-the-art fingerprint technology. That means efficient energy 
consumption, 256 grey scale values in every single pixel, and durability
 against wear and tear for 10 million cycles. Ola’s capacitive sensor 
can also read the arches, loops and whirls of your finger, even if 
covered or dirty. So when we say no more key and no more smart phone, we
 really mean it. Just register your fingerprint for the first time, then
 forget about your phone permanently.
Bluetooth 4.0 connectivity
Sharing

We also want Ola to bring comfort and ease to the people you 
care about. You can share access instantly with family and friends 
through Ola’s simple yet intelligent app. You can invite people with 4 
different settings:

Temporary: From 11/06 11.00 am to 21/06 21.00 pm 
Recurring: Every Sundays from 2 to 5 pm and every Wednesdays from 10 am to 2 pm
Permanent: All time access.
 Master: All time access + gives the right to invite people, keep open, rename or delete lock... 
 

And in 2 different ways: 

Bluetooth access: generates a link you can send via email or a QR code. 
 Fingerprint access: Fingerprint needs to be registered on Ola at the time of the invite.

Temporary Keys
We know not everyone is welcome all 
the time, though, so you can schedule temporary keys for visitors or 
guests. This makes it easy not only to give access, but to restrict it.


https://www.indiegogo.com/campaigns/ola-fingerprint-smart-lock/edit/#/storyThe Ola App
Ola's app is designed with the intention of 
minimizing your reliance on technology. The interface of the app is 
intuitive, and intentionally minimal, because we believe you should be 
spending time doing other things. We also made sure Ola is easy to open.
 Once you scanned your lock’s QR code and registered your fingerprint, 
you could forget your phone in another country and still get inside just
 as easily.


Lock performances and Tech Specs

Main PCB (front side)







Main PCB (back side)






Fingerprint module



Battery life, never be locked out again

As we mentioned before, Ola's backup battery pack can be 
activated with a single button, and the micro USB port can be used to 
power Ola with an external battery. Getting locked out because of dead 
batteries is almost impossible
Fingerprint sensor Tech Specs








Receiving your Ola  
Ola's box content:

1 Ola smart lock 
1 lockset: Choose between a Mortise lock set for security or  a 
Standard Latch bolt for convenience (or just use the lock already on 
your door to minimize the work!)  
1 Ola installation kit (screwdriver and screws) 
1 Ola installation guide


Installation

Ola is compatible with Mortise and the
 Standard Latch bolt lock sets and is installed like a regular lock. 59 
seconds is our engineer's record for replacing a regular door knob with 
Ola. 


All measurements are in mm




Hardware Sync
Using your phone to sync Ola and your 
fingerprint is very easy. First, each Ola has a QR code (in the user 
manual) that is unique to that Ola. Simply scan this QR code to identify
 yourself as the master user. Then you can register your fingerprints 
and those of others by placing your thumb on the handle.








We are a team of young entrepreneurs whose goal is to improve the 
domotica industry by inventing reliable and self-reliant home products. 
Today we have realized that dream. The world's first true smart lock, 
Ola, is here. Technologically advanced, and wirelessly connected, Ola’s 
fingerprint technology is completely self-contained. It can recognize 
approved users through a touch of the finger, or in the “old-fashioned” 
way through Bluetooth 4.0. These features, combined with an unrivaled 
battery life and reliable security features, marks Ola as the next step 
in the evolution of the lock.


WHY WE NEED YOU
The hard part is done. We invented Ola. 
Now we need your help in bringing Ola to the public. Of course funding 
is important, but we also want your feedback, your experiences, and your
 enthusiasm. We’ve had Ola installed on our door for months. We know it 
works. Other offices in our hallway have even started using it. But mass
 production is expensive and we need your support to realize our vision 
of sharing Ola with the world.
HELP US SPREAD THE NEWS


When we say we want Ola to change the world, we really mean it. 
The lock as an invention has remained the same for hundreds if not 
thousands of years. The time has come to bring this ancient but 
necessary piece of technology into the modern era. Smart technology not 
only makes the key obsolete, but makes our homes more secure. To back 
Ola is to step into the future. 

Risks and challenges
31 months after we began, Ola is finally ready for some attention. We
 spent a lot of our own money, but we believe in our vision, and have 
tirelessly refined Ola with the feedback of alpha-testers. Now we need 
you for the final stages. 
We have the energy to keep going, but the cost of producing 10 units 
is nothing compared to the cost of producing 500 units. Our real 
challenge is raising funds to manufacture in mass. Help us overcome this
 challenge by pledging and working together to achieve our goal of 
getting Ola on your block. Thank you!
service@olalocks.com

story:
What is the HushBrush?

The HushBrush is a retractable makeup brush. We are in the process of solidifying a design to be either manual or mechanical. The current prototype works with a two click mechanism. One click, the head of the brush is exposed, and with the second click, it is retracted back into the handle keeping your makeup brush clean and protected.

How you can help?

By backing my campaign I will send a personalized thank you email, as well as any PERK you purchase. The money I raise is going towards the following phases of my product:

We are in need of hiring an engineer to correctly design the inside mechanism of the brush, and then working with a product designer to create the ergonomic, functionality a makeup brush should offer.  By being an early backer, you will get access to be  the first to pre-order The HushBrush once available! 

Who am I?

My name is Kristy Fitzpatrick! Born and raised in Massachusetts, I went to a vocational high school where I studied Cosmetology while simultaneously getting my high school diploma. At the age of 18, I was a licensed Cosmetologist and Manicurist. Now I am currently studying Entrepreneurship with a minor in Marketing at Suffolk University in Boston, MA. I have a passion for the beauty industry, and I am following my dream of being a business women.

I have been an avid makeup lover for many years, doing makeup for everyday looks, proms, weddings, and for fun! I regularly use makeup brushes, and have realized how often my makeup brushes were falling apart and making an overall mess of my bag. The HushBrush is the solution to this problem.

Social Media 

Follow and share my social media!

Facebook @thehushbrush

Instagram @thehushbrush

Please feel free to contact me with any questions/suggestions!

Email: kristy@thehushbrush.com

story:
We are VOLGGER Studio - a Vienna based, young, Austrian gender equal fashion brand start-up. VOLGGER Studio was founded by Regina and Jasmin VOLGGER - two sisters who make up a fierce business team. VOLGGER Studio asks you for your support! Our goal is to raise 19,000 EUR. Your contribution will help VOLGGER Studio to finance the production of the first four looks of the CORE collection, that will be available in stores and online by September 2017. Help a young, Austrian eco-friendly and socially responsible label with a message to take the fashion market by storm!

 

What does VOLGGER Studio need your help for?

The money we aim to raise via this crowdfunding project will solely be used to finance the first production run of the CORE collection. VOLGGER Studio was founded in 2016. The last two years were filled with ups and downs of a start-up. VOLGGER Studio has invested all of it’s passion into a genderequal collection design, that is not only timeless but also ready to wear. We’ve created and refined our cuts, aiming for a perfect fit.  Regina and Jasmin toured around to establish a European supply chain. VOLGGER Studio maintains personal contact with all its business partners - from suppliers to manufacturers.

Another milestone has been the creation of a corporate identity that is not only the platform to convey the message and the principles VOLGGER Studio stands for, but also lays out a solid foundation for the future of the company.

We’ve come this far - help us to take VOLGGER Studio to the next level and bring our fashion to the people. In order to be able to start selling/reselling our collection, we need to pre-finance the first production run of the CORE collection. In detail we will use the raised money for financing the production of four looks of our CORE collection.


With your support we can :
- kick start the first production run of our CORE collection
- bridge the gap between collection design and sales
- help raise gender awareness
- make a greater impact in the lives of many

 

What does VOLGGER Studio stand for?

Gender equality, sustainability, transparency and quality – these are our guiding principles.

VOLGGER Studio convinces with superior quality fashion, that is not only timeless and rich in detail, but also gender equal. We use production facilities around Europe, such as Italy, Poland and Slovakia to produce high quality denim wear next to a fine selection of natural fabric based pieces. We source our fabrics only from European business partners and both aim for eco-friendly production standards and sustainability along the production chain. We do our best to live up to our business standards for every component of our fashion items - from zippers, to our sewing threads to our hang tags.

 

CORE collection and gender equality

An essential aspect of the VOLGGER Studio philosophy is addressing gender issues. The importance of gender equality and respectful treatment of people beyond gender stereotypes is reflected in the products of VOLGGER Studio. The CORE collection breaks with classical collection design approaches and moves beyond gender stereotypes as there is one single collection that focuses more on commonalities – the CORE – of both sexes than rather their differences. 

The CORE collection is ‚a year-round collection’, consisting of 12 looks: one look for each month a year. VOLGGER Studio’s core strength is the design of perfect fitting denim jeans, shirts, jackets/coats, tees & tops. However, the collection is rounded up by a selection of finest designed and produced knit items. Discreet color shades such as blue, black, grey, beige and white dominate the range of colors.

 

Ways to support VOLGGER Studio

The primary goal of our crowdfunding project is to raise 19,000 EUR for the first production run of the CORE collection. However, we appreciate any help. If you can’t financially support us, but do believe in our project - please help us raise awareness for our cause!


How to make some noise:
- share the campaign over social media (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter - the more, the better) 
- share the campaign link to with your friends who you think will love VOLGGER Studio via email
- help us to connect with people that you think could be supporting our project by emailing office@volgger-studio.com 
- follow us on social media www.facebook.com/volggerstudio and www.instagram.com/volggerstudio

We are grateful for your support - help us to bring our fashion and our message to the people!

Regina & Jasmin

 

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Every business endevaour is asocciated with a certain degree of risk. We aim to minimize the risk of the first production run of the CORE collection by maintaining in personal contact with all our suppliers and manufacturers. Nonetheless, every collection production is to some extent prone to difficulties such as  longer delivery or productions times. Our promise is, that we will do our best to avoid any inconveniences for our supporters & customers. In case we face unexpected troubles we'll be as transparent and honest in our communication as one can be and will immediately let you know if we need to adjust the timeline for the shippment of your perks.

 

 

FAQ

What is gender equal fashion?

The CORE collection breaks with classical collection design approaches and moves beyond gender stereotypes as there is one single collection that focuses more on commonalities – the CORE – of both sexes than rather their differences: 1 design – 2 cuts.

How much do your products cost?
Tees start from 99 EUR,  jeans from 349 EUR . Leather and cashmere garments start from 999 EUR.

How do you argue your prices?
All of our high quality materials and limited garments are responsibly made in small production companies within Europe. VOLGGER Studio stands for slow fashion and high quality design.

Why is there a shipping cost?
Your new garments are of high value, and we utilize shipping that guarantees the security of your order.  The shipping cost ensures your order gets to you safely.

If you have a general question or just want to say hello...
contact at us via office@volgger-studio.com

 

Don’t be a stranger on Facebook & Instagram, we appreciate your connection!

story:
Why Should I Contribute ? 

A motorcyclist is 5 times more likely to become injured in a crash. 

Over 60% of motorcycle accidents are caused by 

another vehicle hitting the motorcycle. 

 

 

 

Gear That Fits Protects! 

Female anatomy is different than male. 

Women need gear that fits our bodies.

 

Over 1.5 million women in the USA alone are riding. 

More women take it up everyday. Still, the gear choices for women are sparse. In a typical gear store, the women’s section is one rack. 

Imagine 

You bought your first bike, next you go buy a rad motorcycle jacket. 

The shop smells like leather, racing suits hang on the wall, bad ass riders grin at you from posters. Then it dawns in you, it’s all dudes.

There is one women’s rack, which someone vomited pastel pink flowers over.

Disappointing is an understatement. Buxom, bootylicious, over size six ? 

Forget about looking good and protection.  

 

Raven Rova Fixed That Problem. 

Five years ago my friend was in a serious crash, he survived. 

It was a wake up call. My husband and I went to buy ALL THE GEAR. 

I’d been riding my whole life with only my helmet. 

 

I was furious and disappointed by the lack of gear! 

Since then I’ve invested thousands of dollars and hours into R&D. 

 

My manufacturing team has been making motorcycle gear since 1969. 

I have been a fashion designer for over 10 years. 

What We Need & What You Get

Your contribution will kick start our production so we can make this gear available to all women.

 

You get amazing early bird deals on the gear! 

 

Pre-order your jacket, pants or both for 20% - 30% off! 

Get One Item, Add Pants For 30% Off!

 

Don’t Ride ?

Please contribute any dollar amount you are comfortable with. 

We need to raise 30K to buy materials and pay our production people. 

From this initial production run, we will supply the items that you pre-order here.

 

We need to get approximately 100 pre-orders to reach this goal.

 

Our manufacturing team is primed and ready. 

Once the campaign ends we’re submitting your orders. 

Then it will be ready in six to eight weeks. 

What Women Want

We Asked, You Answered

 

“Properly fitting gear that flatters my shape and isn't pink or ugly.”

 

“Please consider us ladies with athletic thighs and larger calves - I can’t wear most skinny jeans because my calves already barely fit in my boots, let alone with jeans on them!”

 

“I like to be able to pee easily and dont wanna have to bother with a suit.”

 

“Pants made for real women sizes, not just the small sizes.”

 

“Jackets that fit my boobs and allow me to move my arms and have a waist,

is that too much to ask?”

 

“More gear for women that move with our bodies. Our body shapes have such a wide range that it hard for anyone over a 12 to find flattering, comfortable gear in a decent price range.”

 

“Modern minimalist but sexy leather for riding moto!”

 

The Devil Is In The Details

 

 

Exceptional Quality

 

  • Designed only for female anatomy
  • Over 30 years experience making motorcycle gear. 
  • Our expert manufacturing team only makes motorcycle gear and leather goods. 
  • Sizes 6 to 20 available. We work with fit models sizes 8 to 18. 

 

 

 

Safe Protection

 

  • Built in armor CE level one, all interchangeable via internal pockets.
  • All our jackets come with a CE back protector. No other brands include this.
  • Made of Genuine Leather, 600 Denier Cordura, and stretch Kevlar (Keprotech) 
  • Leather of 100% genuine cowhide with semi-aniline coating for added durability 
  • All jacket zip to all pants for maximum protection
  • Sturdy YKK metal zippers 
  • Metal riveted snaps 

 

 

 

Optimized Comfort

 

  • Accordion style panels at crucial movement points; shoulders, back, knees, waist
  • Kevlar stretch (Keprotech) panels on inner arms, thighs, calves. Avoids impact zones. 
  • Pockets. At least two per style, jackets have an internal waterproof media pocket 
  • Jackets come with a detachable, thermal quilted liner for all season riding
  • Featherweight waterproof membrane on textile gear
  • Adjustable tabs and buckles at the waist to customize fit
  • Hygienic athletic mesh liner for comfort and function 
  • Ventilated with zipper vents to keep you cool
  • Boot zippers 

Thank You Very Much

XXOO

 

Please Share Our Campaign.

Order Your Gear For A Steal! 

 

Keep The Rubber Side Down.
