story:
The idea derives from our common passion for travel and sport.

NATIVE is a new generation thermal underwear made with 3D weaving  and it's completely seamless

NATIVE it's made with a AllSeason, Silver and Merino Wool thread

PRODUCTS:

We propose three types of jerseys and ankle socks, all made of the same material

A SHORT-SLEEVE, a LONG-SLEEVE and a LONG-SLEEVE WITH MASK seamless applied with 10% silver on front, to create a certified antibacterial product that protect both from bacteria and from bad weather and cold

USE & FEATURES:

NATIVE thermal underwear is absolutely versatile and can be used for outdoor activities, in the workplace and in everyday life

Every project comes from a vision!

Our vision is nourished by a great passion that is renewed day by day, with experience and the desire to innovate and so to progress, always.

NATIVE is our vision: Italian craftsmanship and know-how are the keystones of our project where innovation is the protagonist.

A material that underlies a wide range of possibilities and solutions. A new idea where tradition meets innovation pursued every day in our laboratories: a limitless, exciting and constantly evolving journey.

The NATIVE story is an all-Italian story!

It was born from a shared passion for travel, adventure and sport: NATIVE wear was conceived, designed and tested in extreme environments during adventure / solidarity trips undertaken with the cultural association "In Itinere".

"In Itinere" is a project that was born in 2013 after a road trip in the fascinating African desert. Back then we were just a group of friends, united by a passion for travel and adventure. The idea of creating our cultural association emerged from the desire to repeat this kind of experience.

The purpose of In Itinere is not only to promote the exchange of experiences among travellers but, beyond that, to encourage people who share a love for travel and for the knowledge of different cultures to come together.

We believe that journey is a synonym of knowledge. It is a formative path that leads us to discover new worlds and new perspectives, but above all ourselves. We called this project "In Itinere" precisely because it expresses the concepts of a journey in progress, of change and transformation.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

THANKS FOR YOUR HELP!

The production of NATIVE Thermal underwear employs a very advanced technique and therefore for the realization of this project we need all your support to make this product.

You can choose among different rewards that you will find on this page!

JOIN US in this project, and you will become part of the NATIVE world!

 

Web site - www.nativeproject.it

Instagram - native__project

Facebook - Native Project (@native.warming)

E-mail - info@nativeproject.it
story_txt: The idea derives from our common passion for travel and sport.NATIVE is a new generation thermal underwear made with 3D weaving  and it's completely seamlessNATIVE it's made with a AllSeason, Silver and Merino Wool threadPRODUCTS:We propose three types of jerseys and ankle socks, all made of the same materialA SHORT-SLEEVE, a LONG-SLEEVE and a LONG-SLEEVE WITH MASK seamless applied with 10% silver on front, to create a certified antibacterial product that protect both from bacteria and from bad weather and coldUSE & FEATURES:NATIVE thermal underwear is absolutely versatile and can be used for outdoor activities, in the workplace and in everyday lifeEvery project comes from a vision!Our vision is nourished by a great passion that is renewed day by day, with experience and the desire to innovate and so to progress, always.NATIVE is our vision: Italian craftsmanship and know-how are the keystones of our project where innovation is the protagonist.A material that underlies a wide range of possibilities and solutions. A new idea where tradition meets innovation pursued every day in our laboratories: a limitless, exciting and constantly evolving journey.The NATIVE story is an all-Italian story!It was born from a shared passion for travel, adventure and sport: NATIVE wear was conceived, designed and tested in extreme environments during adventure / solidarity trips undertaken with the cultural association "In Itinere"."In Itinere" is a project that was born in 2013 after a road trip in the fascinating African desert. Back then we were just a group of friends, united by a passion for travel and adventure. The idea of creating our cultural association emerged from the desire to repeat this kind of experience.The purpose of In Itinere is not only to promote the exchange of experiences among travellers but, beyond that, to encourage people who share a love for travel and for the knowledge of different cultures to come together.We believe that journey is a synonym of knowledge. It is a formative path that leads us to discover new worlds and new perspectives, but above all ourselves. We called this project "In Itinere" precisely because it expresses the concepts of a journey in progress, of change and transformation.----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------THANKS FOR YOUR HELP!The production of NATIVE Thermal underwear employs a very advanced technique and therefore for the realization of this project we need all your support to make this product.You can choose among different rewards that you will find on this page!JOIN US in this project, and you will become part of the NATIVE world! Web site - www.nativeproject.itInstagram - native__projectFacebook - Native Project (@native.warming)E-mail - info@nativeproject.it

story:
When you're done listening to your iPod or cell, what happens to your headphones?

My name is Peggy Rajski, and I use my headphones a lot. Putting them away should be simple and fast. But I was frustrated by how long it always took me to untangle them or find them in my purse or my house.  And I hated how much I spent replacing my headphones because I lost them or the wires shorted out!  That’s why I created OKIOTO. 

OKIOTO looks cool, is easy to use, and feels comfortable when you wear it.  It takes about 5 seconds to attach your headphones, then only seconds to wrap and unwrap them every single time you use them. 



Because your headphones always stay attached to OKIOTO, they're faster to wrap, easier to find, and way more fun to use.  Even better, it save your headphones a lot of wear and tear so they last longer!

It's simple.  Wear, wrap, store and repeat.  OKIOTO saves you time, saves you headaches and saves your headphones!


Why do we need money?  

For more than a year, I’ve been working with a mechanical engineer, manufacturers and 3-D prototypes to work out a ton of design details—height, weight, shape, feel, wrapping proportions, edge tapering, etc. —all the small but incredibly important things that make OKIOTO work as easily as it does.  After testing different materials and manufacturing approaches, we're finally ready to take OKIOTO into production!

Now we need $25,000 dollars to make it all happen. At that level, we'll have enough money to make the mold for the first design—the Butterfly in orange—and place the order for our first production run with the seasoned manufacturer we have lined up. We'll complete the packaging design and be able to start shipping OKIOTOs within 4-6 weeks of completing this campaign.

So we'd love to have your support!  And if you are able to contribute $20, you’ll get a limited edition OKIOTO Butterfly and be able to tell–and show!—people you were there first.

What's next?

Once we've reached our goal of launching the OKIOTO Butterfly in orange and are ready to stretch, everyone who pledges will be able to cast their vote for which color to offer next.  You, our Indiegogo backers, get to decide!


Like to support in other ways? 

If you like OKIOTO, please consider ‘like’-ing this IndieGoGo campaign and sharing it on your Facebook and Twitter!  Or visit us on Facebook and Twitter where we’ll keep you current on all the behind-the-scenes development!

And of course, be sure to check out OKIOTO if you haven't already.

Thank you for your time and your support.  We welcome it all--financial, vocal or spiritual!


About the Inventor

I’m an Oscar-winning producer, script and film consultant, and professor at NYU.  I love taking on challenges--big and small--and coming up with creative solutions.  I even created a very successful not-for-profit organization—The Trevor Project--from scratch to help address an important issue that was at the heart of my film TREVOR.  So problem-solving is in my nature.  And OKIOTO was the answer I came up with to a problem I found really vexing on a daily basis!

There's another thing about myself that relates to OKIOTO.  I really enjoy helping other people.  I’ve been a mentor or a teacher of sorts pretty much my whole life. Helping make things just a little bit easier for other people is one of the rewards I get out of doing this...and it's one I hope you'll enjoy too when you give your support!


FAQs

1.  Are headphones included with OKIOTO?  

OKIOTO is the headphone organizer itself and does not include a set of headphones.  You get to use your own favorite pair!

2.  Do I need to add the cost of shipping to my pledge?  

If you live in the US, shipping is free. For all other destinations, please add the amount indicated.  Wish we could do it for free but shipping has gotten pretty expensive!

3.  I contributed to a perk but I forgot to add the extra money for shipping.

Don't worry, we'll be in touch to sort it out.

4.  I can't get my payment to work in Paypal. What should I do?

Email the Indiegogo Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any issues.

5.  I'm curious about something else...

We'd love to hear from you whether you have a question about the product or the IndieGoGo campaign. Email us at askokioto@okioto.com.

story:
1) replace with your letters/numbers on max. 3 hour indexes

2) pick your color on the hr/min/sec hands

3) pick your case/dial/band  (mesh band or leather strap) 

What messages are you going to index?

38mm? or 42mm?

Print this pdf by selecting "print actual size", the image on your printout will be the actual size of the watch

When to register my choices on customization?

Pre-order first & we will contact you your choices on customization on or before the project deadline.

How backers tell us their preferences?

All backers will register their preferences at our online customizer at the date when the project closed. You can view the demo at the below YouTube:

 

 

One Click Change

All our bands equipped with One Click Change system. Swap your watch band in seconds!

 

 

Sapphire Glass

All Firays watches are using Sapphire Glass. You can't find a customized watch offering sapphire glass at this price, right?

 

 
Support Us
click below to follow us on the social media

 

Why FIRAYS?

In this new era, we all feel tired to buy a watch at the store with 7 times more markup, produced in mass volume which does not represent "YOU" on the design.

We team up here to summon your participation to induce a revolutionary change in the watch industry. FIRAYS is a watch brand providing customization that no one ever offered and dares to offer. To put your secret through customized indexes on the watch dial, we need your support to set up the line to produce it one by one. Each one is a unique piece carrying your own secret.

International Backers

We will ship worldwide, with the exception of some places that courier is too difficult or too expensive to reach. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees & taxes applicable to your region.

Shipping Terms

DDU – Delivered Duties Unpaid – Import duties & taxes are collected and paid by the customer upon delivery of goods when necessary. Customer assumes responsibility of any applicable fees.

Need help? We're here for you

Have questions at any time, please reach us at Indiegogo@firays-watch.com

story:
Watch Case: Stainless steel (grade 316L), 18k gold plated
Water resistant:10 ATM, 100 meters
Glass: Sapphire Crystal
Luminous: Coronation series hands (glowing white in the dark)
Case Diameter: 46 mm
Case Thickness: 14 mm
Strap Size: 28 mm
Movement: Selitta SW 200-1 Day/Date Automatic
Buckle: Butterfly folding clasp
Warranty: 10-year warranty







 

 


 

 



 

 


 

 

 

 

 


 

Watch Case: Stainless steel (grade 316L), 18k gold plated
Water resistant:10 ATM, 100 meters
Glass: Sapphire Crystal
Luminous: Coronation series hands (glowing white in the dark)
Case Diameter: 40 mm
Case Thickness: 8 mm
Strap Size: 20 mm
Movement: Selitta SW 200-1 Day/Date Automatic
Buckle: Butterfly folding clasp
Strap: Interchangeable Strap / Quick Release Strap
Available Straps: Croco | Classic - Full grain Italian leather, handcrafted | Mesh
Warranty: 10-year warranty





 
 
 
 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 



 

 


Hi, my Name is Aytunc and I am the Founder of Moonbronze. Moonbronze is a watch brand from Germany specialized in high-quality Swiss Made watches with exclusive design. I was fed up with the prices that most luxury watch retailers demanded, which I found overpriced. My vision was and is that everyone should have the opportunity to enjoy the look and feel of a luxury watch without having to pay thousands of euros for this privilege. That's why I set myself the goal of offering beautiful and luxurious timepieces for everyone at a fair price. Therefore, I founded Moonbronze and create since then the design for unique watches made from the best materials, of which now the first collection is available for you.
 

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We are very well prepared for the project successful crowdfunding on Kickstarter. For the project on Indiegogo, we have prepared for 11 months to cover all possible complications and to be able to offer a direct solution to any problems. In addition, we work with very experienced specialties that have years of experience in this industry, so that a smooth flow can be guaranteed. In a total of 19 months of pure development, we simulated a production in 4 months to know every detail of the process and to know exactly how much time is needed to give our supporters a binding time. For us, trust in our supporters comes first. We have prepared ourselves perfectly in 21 months.

 

- Indiegogo risk: for campaigns in InDemand, backers can request a refund from Indiegogo within 10 days of the transaction provided the InDemand page is live, the perk has not been fulfilled, and the funds have not been disbursed to the campaigner.

All contributions will be engaged in the manufacturing and the industrialization of KLOK-08. These funds will be committed for this purpose. As backers on Indiegogo, reimbursement for the pledge is only possible as mentioned above. Delays in deliveries or some changes in used materials like movement and other parts cannot be a reimbursement reason. In the Indiegogo context, the backers do accept these risks as they support a project under development.

story:
When you’re an urban warrior, life never stops. There are coffees to order, bars to attend, gym sessions to smash, good-looking people to impress. And let’s face it, most shorts just can’t handle the pace. We're sick of shorts that can’t take us where we want to go. We’re sick of them falling down and riding up. We’re sick of washing day. And most of all, we’re sick of having to get changed all the time. Surely getting dressed once a day is enough to expect of a man. But we didn’t want to whinge. We wanted a solution. That’s why we created the world's first Non-Stop Shorts.

 

Our Journey started two and half years ago when it dawned on us our friends didn’t like their shorts. The most common reason was that they fall down when you bend over (AKA: the dreaded plumber’s crack!). So, we set out on a mission to find a solution. After countless wearer trials and R&D, we discovered that shape and the waistband’s stretchability are key factors to a short’s staying power. We learnt: a curved waistband holds bit better when you’re standing still, but if you bend over or reach for the stars, your backside is left exposed. We worked with the world’s best manufacturers to create a one-of-a-kind, never seen before, five-piece waistband. Fast forward more than two years – after countless wearer trials, testing and plenty of prototypes, we’ve found a new solution… Introducing the AptGrip waistband, proudly making the dreaded plumber’s crack a thing of the past.

  

We worked with our manufacturers to engineer a 360-degree stretch premium fabric which infused with silver. Silver is naturally oligodynamic that eliminates bacteria (and BO). By fusing our fabric with silver, these antimicrobial properties are ingrained in the fabric and makes it odourless. But we didn't stop there, We created a brand new fabric infusing with Hydrophobic Nanotechnology. That makes our Non-stop shorts will stain resistant or any type of liquid will just roll off and dry faster than your regular shorts. That also means you can avoid laundry duty for up to 3 weeks (just don’t tell your girlfriend). 

Phone? Check. Keys? Check. Credit card? Check. With Non-slip self-sealing hidden pocket bags, there are places to put all your essentials. The fine details are the heart of our products and they are what we spend most of our time on. We designed the perfect solution to stash your stuff and you can be wallet free.

Sneaky phone pocket

 

 

Hidden card pocket

 

 

Handy key pocket

 

 

Emergency back pocket


Our shorts also come in two leg lengths. Because we'll never agree about which one's better. And who knows, you might even swing all the ways.

 

 

 

  

 

 


Our shorts come in four colours. 

Manson Black

This shady character shuns the limelight – choosing to sit on the sidelines instead. While easy going, there’s something mysterious about Manson: a hint of danger, a dark side, or a murky past.

Cobain Blue

Take a walk on the mild side with cool kid Cobain. Never a ruffled feather or a sharp word, this is one chilled character – light on small talk, but heavy on meaning. Blue waters run deep.

Redford Red

Never backwards in coming forward, Redford is a colourful character (and hard to miss in a crowd). Centre of attention, life of the party, king of the world – there’s never a dull moment when Red’s around.

Dark Grey

Chosen by the community of backers. 

 

 

 


Our shorts will be manufactured in sizes S-XL in both leg lengths, and will cover waist sizes 30"all the way to 38". The detailed size guide will be available when we send out the surveys.

 


What does Cobba mean?

Proudly designed in Sydney, Australia 

As Australians, we love adventures.We say when adventure comes your way, you want to be ready for anything. The only hard part: finding accessories that can keep up with you. A car that can go from Surry Hills to St. Kilda on a single tank. A mate who can get in everywhere (and get away with everything). A phone that never dies mid-swipe. And clothes that are just the right fit, for any occasion. That’s why Cobba was born. Taking cues from cutting edge technology, our experienced menswear design and production team created the world's first Non-Stop shorts that actually can fit in everywhere you go. 

Please support our campaign. Be one of the first to take Cobba to the streets, because Cobba shorts could change the way you live.

FAQ's
Does Cobba pay international customs duty, tax and fee?
For international contributors, an understanding of import fees is important. For all orders outside Australia, sometimes the customs department of your country can demand import duty. In this case- the duty would have to be taken care of by the contributor. It’s a good idea to contact your local customs office, so you don’t receive any unexpected fees.
Exchanges are processed as new orders, and the authorities may attempt to charge you again. If this occurs, inquire locally on how to request a refund on prior fees.
If you wish to refuse your delivery, you will still be held responsible for the status of your parcel and most of the couriers will only keep the parcel 14 days period maximum until import tax will be paid then the parcel will be destroyed.
Please note that we do not have any arrangements with couriers to get your parcel returned to us since the return fees exceed the amount of your order including shipping costs and their administration fees. 
 
How do I select my size, colour, and length ?
As soon as the Indiegogo confirms, we’ll send you a survey to complete where you can let us know your size, length and color preferences. Please make sure to follow our size charts and how to measure guide during the selection. 
 
What happens if I order the wrong size shorts? Can I return? Does Cobba accept exchanges?
Yes, we accept exchanges but need to check our stock availability at time of the exchange.
Your support on Indiegogo is designed to help us bring our product to life, and enables you early access to our new products at a discount. Because of this special arrangement, we do not accept returns of Indiegogo products for refunds.But, we will gladly exchange any unused items in original packages if we have an extra stock of your new selection. All we ask is that you cover the shipping cost of the return and replacement.
So we strongly recommend you to follow "our size charts" and "how to measure guide" during size selection. If you have trouble selecting correct size, please write to us directly. We will work with our sizing experts on picking the right size for you.

story:
A great coach makes fitness more motivating, fun, and effective. Shape is the first of its kind. A Digital Fitness Coach – a trainer that analyzes your daily activity, sleep, and fitness. 

Shape digests your daily routine to help you understand what’s working and how your training affects the future you. With every conversation, Shape gets smarter and better at creating bespoke workouts designed to help you reach your goals. 

While you’re working out, Shape speaks to you, helping you improve your form and pushing your intensity. In between workouts, chat with Shape like you text your favorite Personal Trainer. 

Shape is your 24/7 Digital Fitness Coach: with you the whole way to meet your fitness goals. Are you ready to beat yesterday’s you?

 

 

 

 

  

Too hard? Too easy? Not enough time? Just let Shape know. Never again ask yourself “What should I do today?” Shape’s here to guide you. 

  

 

Follow and track HIIT workouts that require no equipment. Each custom workout is designed to keep your heart rate up, activating anaerobic fitness levels to maximize your daily caloric burn in quick, energetic workouts.

For our first release, we’ll focus on creating a complete experience focused for activities that require no equipment like running, burpees, and sit-ups. We want to get Shape right for this sport before we stretch our coverage into the entire Atlas library. In subsequent releases, we’ll expand Shape’s capabilities into more activities and fitness styles.

 

Since Atlas was founded, our community has completed over 1.3 million sets. From running to calisthenics, CoachAI's intelligence leverages our ever growing experience and knowledge to find what workouts and goals work best to help everyone achieve greatness.

But it doesn't stop there, collectively we've blown past plateaus and achieved over 100,000 personal bests through progressive training. Here, an actual Atlas member continuously achieves new personal bests using Atlas technology: 

Our library continues to grow as we learn more about exercise form and details within physiology never seen before. Each exercise added is backed by hundreds of personal training hours designed to help CoachAI identify and help our members continue to improve form, reduce chance of strain, and optimize efficiency. 

 

 

Atlas Motion Tracking is back. Our bleeding-edge machine learning system is built based on our experience studying human motion and developing our fitness product lines. Shape leverages Motion Tracking to automatically track your workouts. It recognizes your specific exercise, counts reps, generates metrics, and logs when you rest. For example, if you’re doing jumping jacks when you should be doing push-ups. Shape knows. You’re not reaching up after your burpees. Shape knows. We’ve taken the best parts of the original Atlas Wristband exercise tracking and baked it into each and every Shape.

CoachAI is our latest innovation that brings the knowledge and experience from hundreds of thousands of workouts to your wrist. Shape considers over a dozen metrics from Atlas Motion Tracking, including your form and personal bests, to find the ideal workout to help you reach your goals.

Previously, understanding these elements required professional training and expensive technology. CoachAI distills this information down to simple, actionable feedback and knowledge through real-time suggestions. “Slow down your reps to burn fat more effectively.” And strategic planning, “Let’s do a recovery workout tomorrow, looks like you were over-exerting yourself.”

We didn’t stop there – we’ve added 24/7 Tracking features as well. Along with Atlas Motion Tracking, Shape monitors your fitness and activity throughout the day, sleep patterns at night, and heart rate throughout the day to measure your daily caloric expenditure. For the first time ever a truly comprehensive fitness tracking system is made possible by Atlas Motion Tracking. 

 

 

Fitness is a way of life, and Shape fits the mold. It’s waterproof up to 1 meter, packs a bright display for indoor/outdoor use, and an accurate wrist-based heart-rate.

Shape was founded on a simple and clean aesthetic that packs the full power of Atlas Motion Tracking. Its ergonomic, curved design fits comfortably on your wrist and slides easily under long sleeved shirts.

Shape is so powerful you’ll want to wear it all week long. That’s why we made sure we gave it a battery that lasts up to 5 days. 

 

 

 

See every stat, goal, insight and more from the convenience of your computer. Shape is compatible with the entire Atlas Wristband ecosystem so you can dive deeper into every stat the drives the decisions of your new artificial intelligence Coach.

 

 

 

 

 

Update March 7: As we pass 150% of our goal we're proud to announce our newest workout partner, MadBarz. With workout plans, tutorials, targeted exercises all compatible with Atlas Shape, you can track your progress automatically as you complete your first 10 pull ups or do the Human Flag!

 

Update March 1: With all of your support, a new generation of fitness trackers was born. We blew past our goal and are wanted to reward the community with our first partner, Physiclo. Together with their expertise we've created a Heart Rate Efficiency Workout Program to help you get even more out of your workouts.

I have a pair of the original Physiclo Resistance pants and they will really get your heart rate going, so we wanted to share our excitement in their gear and a Physiclo paired workout to help you get the most out of every workout.

Here you can see how progressive resistance training can drastically increase your results. Here we follow a user from December 2016 to February 2017. You'll notice that the user can now achieve a Training Volume of 20,250 with an average HR of 89 and a max of 121 bpm. 3 months ago, it took the user a heart rate average of 98 and a max of 128 bpm for only 17,049. That's a 42% gain of Strength per Calorie Burned! 

Training with Physiclo can help you get similar results and even accelerate you to workout smarter. Every Atlas Shape member gets access to Physiclo's Progression workout for an enhanced training experience FREE. Not only that, but every member is gets 25% off with code "ATLAS". 

 

 

We have locked in our manufacturing partner. Received and approved our Initial production samples. We are ready to go and just need YOU to kick us off! We are confident with our ship date and have a track record of successfully inventing, developing, and shipping multiple hardware products.

 

General Manager and Fitness Director Dennis Mathias spent 12 months developing the Atlas Weight Loss program. A 30 year veteran of the fitness industry he has seen or done it all and after 30 years has finally been able to prove that weight loss is nothing more than burning more calories than you eat. Using the original second generation Atlas Wristband 2, 3 to 5 times per week and following no nutrition guidelines or special supplements, Dennis was able to generate a 30 pound weight loss and a 5% drop in body fat when normal weight loss approaches would have generated no more than a 10 pound loss and a 2% body fat drop. Since then 20 members have enrolled in Dennis’ program and by following his program are recognizing the same dramatic results.

 

This is where it all started. Three years ago you supported our vision to make the world’s first true workout and fitness tracker. You blew us away with your support and kicked off a worldwide movement! We’re back to give you - the community who cares the most - an opportunity to support our vision for effective and efficient fitness and get exclusive access to our newest product.

story:
Now Shipping - Buy Magic Coin Pouch Today on the Indiegogo Marketplace!

 

SHORT

IN USE

 

 

 

available at www.paperwallet.com

 

Paperwallet was born out of desire to fuse function with design and comfort in our everyday carry accessories.  In 2015 we launched our first Kickstarter campaign for the Slim Wallet followed by the Magic Coin Pouch.  Thanks to our amazing backers and supporters, over 100,000 people worldwide are enjoying our products everyday.

We’ve listened closely to what our customers were missing and what they wanted - and designed the Magic Coin Pouch to be the ultimate minimalist solution for coin and cash. Here is what our customers are saying about the Magic Coin Pouch and Slim Wallet.

story:
iovado represents a revolution in the custom hand-crafted production for the fashion industry starting with a timeless shoe.

iovado shoe is an ultra-luxury mocassino shoe, handcrafted in Italy, created to fit the exact shape of your foot, using biometric scanning and 3D technology for 240€.

iovado shoes are manufactured locally by the same hands that create top brand luxury shoes and combine Italian craftsmanship tradition with technology for a new level of comfort that we call "personal comfort".
The result is a special shoe that fits like a glove, enveloped in finest soft calf leather.

 

Male Mocassino Shoe

 

  • "Sacchetto bolognese" construction method for a glove-like fit
  • Premium calf leather with a specific thickness
  • Leather outsole brushed vintage and hand-polished
  • Cushioned Leather insole
  • 1.5 cm / 0.6 inch heel
  • Handcrafted in Italy
  • Dotted line branded
     

 

 

Female Mocassino Shoe

  • "Sacchetto bolognese" construction method for a glove-like fit
  • Premium calf leather with a specific thickness
  • Leather outsole brushed vintage and hand-polished
  • Cushioned Leather insole
  • 1.5 cm / 0.6 inch heel
  • Handcrafted in Italy
  • Dotted line branded
     

 

We use your mobile as biometric scanner and 3D printing technologies.

  • The biometric scan allows us to get an accurate 3D model of your foot, wherever you are in just 10 minutes.
     
  •  The 3D printing technology allows us to reduce costs and production time so we can pass these savings to you.
     


No standard sized shoe fits your foot exactly.

Why would you buy something that doesn’t perfectly fit your feet?
 

As seen on:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

You will be able to choose the add-ons at the end of the campaign, when we will send out the survey.
 

 


 

1) Download the app

First you need to download the iOS or Android app on your mobile. We will send you the link to download the app at the end of the campagin. If you don't have a mobile (you can always ask a friend!) or don't want to experience the "personal comfort" you will still be able to choose your standard size.

2) Print the reference sheet (two A4 papers placed side by side or one A3 paper) that we will send you via email at the end of the campaign.


3) Take at least 15 pictures of each foot individually.

4) Choose your color!

After the campaign, we will send you an email to let you choose your favorite color from the following:

 

 

 

 

 

  


Any irregularities are natural attributes of the leather and should be considered as characteristics of the product.
 

 

 

Over the last year we have been testing with hundreds of people, we have received a ton of great feedback, listened to our customers and made multiple improvements since then!



Recent advances in biometric scanning and 3D printing technologies make this the perfect time for our innovation.
We need your help to make it real. Hit one of the below buttons and show iovado to your friends.

 

 

 

iovado embraces cost transparency so that our customers limpidly know what they are paying for and can make purchases in full awareness.

By being online only, iovado eliminates brick-and-mortar expenses and passes these savings on to customers.

Everything we do we believe in the importance of a high degree of manual skills in the production of high-quality goods; we believe more attention should be given to the artisans who are the backbone of iovado’s quality. The way we give more attention to the artisans is by being transparent and revealing our costs.
 

 

Once the last gets in the hands of the Italian craftsmen...

 

We use "sacchetto bolognese construction" method which is rooted in Italian tradition and allows each shoe to fit like a glove.

What characterizes iovado shoe is the quality of the leather. We use premium calf leather, selecting only first choice with a specific thickness:
each pair of iovado Mocassino shoes is crafted, dyed, and burnished by hand.
 

The soles express Italian exclusivity: each sole is brushed vintage and hand-polished; therefore each sole differs from one another.

iovado shoes are handmade and packaged at the craftsmen’s workshops in Italy in the Marche region paying utmost attention to quality and design.

Each pair goes through a rigorous inspection to ensure that every shoe is of the highest quality.
 

 

 

iovado has been conceived from the idea of two Italian brothers Albert and Hans Paul to create an unique and timeless moccasin shoe with strong lines and very comfortable. The quality of our shoes is centred around three pillars: design, comfort and custom made. 

The young entrepreneurs were born in Valdagno in the cradle of Marzotto a famous Italian textile industry; therefore, the bond with the fashion industry was inevitable.
Our vision is to bring breakthrough technologies to the traditional high fashion industry to make luxury goods affordable to everyone.

It all started 3 years ago, we were studying and working abroad and as fashion-minded people we were disappointed of seeing the same premium luxury shoe brands everywhere.
So we came back to Italy with a draw and an idea.
As former MSc students of Innovation and Technology at Bocconi University in Milan, we had the idea of ​​using Biometric scanning and 3D printing technologies to create a unique, custom-made shoe.

We built several prototypes, we researched into the craftsmanship of shoes, talked to several artisans, exchanging ideas, getting feedbacks, breaking old bias and getting lost through the beautiful Italy.

We invested a lot of time talking to our beta users and improving our product. A lot of ups and downs, learnings and iterations.
And we are here now to introduce iovado to the world.
 

iovado loafer is a must-have, timeless shoe that fits several styles. Whether for the office, a business dinner, a party, or simply a casual weekend look. Plain and simple, available in a wide array of colors: from the classic brown leather to the light-blue Santorini, we have stylish colors that suit several occasions.
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

iovado shoes are characterized by dotted lines that represent the path made of steps into the future.
The dotted lines express action, progress and your next step.
We believe that action beats inaction. iovado shoe was born to embrace this concept while giving personality to who wears it.
 

Feel empowered to take new steps and let the dotted lines give you balance and drive for your next decisions.

We are the result of the steps we took in the past, and of the decisions that we take everyday. iovado shoes are all about inspiration. Let the dotted line find that inspiration in you, whilst empowering your next steps.

 

At the end of the campaign, we will send the link to download the app and the survey to collect your color choices.
The faster we get them back, the sooner we can start production!

We expect that it will take 3 to 4 weeks to collect these information from you.
As soon as we get your information, we will put your shoes into production.
Production typically takes 4 weeks, and shipping approximately 2 to 3 days (we use DHL Express).

By the end of September 2017, you will receive your custom-made italian handcrafted mocassino shoes!
We ship worldwide. Once your iovado shoes have been shipped we will send you the tracking code.

The shipping cost will be charged at the time of the survey once the campaign is over and will vary based on the destination country. You can see shipping rates here.
If applicable, duties and local taxes will be charged by the appropriate authority at the destination country. Please determine these charges locally.
Orders shipped within the EU will not incur customs duty charges.

All orders will be shipped from the craftsmen workshop in Marche region (Italy).

story:
Why Resinate?

Hello! My name is Leitha, and I am the founder and creator of Resinate Jewelry that combines bullet casings with natural stones to create works of beauty. I began Resinate in 2014 to share my passion for creating unique, handcrafted statement pieces with others. My life's journey, like so many others, has not been easy, but it led me to creating my own business where I hope to help others find their own voice. I believe individuality is important and should be celebrated. I create my jewelry to reflect that belief.

I just received the amazing news that I was selected to participate in the Las Vegas Cowboy Christmas from December 7-16, 2017. This is a huge achievement for me and my business, and I couldn't be happier for this incredible chance to be seen by thousands of new potential buyers. The exposure from this event could be the making of my small startup!​ But, I need your help to make this event happen.

In order to raise money for the booth fee, I have removed all items from my online storefront and put them here on my Indiegogo campaign. This is not only a great opportunity for you to help me grow my business, but a perfect chance to purchase some my one-of-a-kind statement pieces at a great price! I need your help to celebrate the unique spark in every human - help me grow Resinate!

Thank you for your support! I couldn't do this without you.

P.S. Since my jewelry contains bullet casings, I cannot ship internationally at this time. Thank you for your understanding.

What We Need & What You Get

The combined cost for my booth fee, travel and hotel stay for the week in Las Vegas, and creating new jewelry for the show is $5,000. Unfortunately, these incredible works of art don't grow on trees!

As my gift to you for your support, I'll be sending you one of my handcrafted pieces of jewelry! Each level of giving is broken down with what is included with your contribution. 

No two pieces are the same, so you are guaranteed a one-of-a-kind masterpiece created with love to celebrate that unique spark in you!

Please note that since each piece is unique and different, I couldn't possibly list each one separately. Only custom orders will be able to design or choose the specific item that will be shipped to them. Don't worry, every piece I create is stunning - you won't be disappointed!

If by some unfortunate circumstance the Cowboy Christmas event doesn't work out, your generosity will still help Resinate continue to grow and reach even new heights as I begin work on my bridal and men's line. Change is constant, and so are the pieces I create at Resinate!

 

What You're Support Really Means

Every person has a moment in their life where they stand at the crossroads and need to make a choice. For me, I chose independence and the freedom to live my life for me. I created Resinate Jewelry so I could enjoy all that life had to offer me while doing what I love. While I love creating these incredible, wearable works of art, I am still working additional jobs to make ends meet. 

Your support not only helps me get to the 2017 Las Vegas Cowboy Christmas, it gives me a new lease on life and my business. This is the spark I need to grow my business so I can help others find independence through Resinate Jewelry as well, as a patron or employee. The spark is there! I need your help to fan it into a flame.

Risks & Challenges

I recognize the cost of attending the 2017 Las Vegas Cowboy Christmas is rather steep, and I have a lot of long days and late nights ahead of me as I prepare my displays and stunning new pieces for this show. However, I am ready and excited for this challenge and have enlisted the help of family and friends to make this event happen.

If the worst should happen and I don't make it to the event, I am not giving up! My passion is in Resinate and the freedom it can provide. I believe in using the pressures of life to turn the coal I've been given into diamonds of opportunity. Your support will not go to waste, no matter the success of Cowboy Christmas.

 

How You Can Help

I recognize that not everyone will be able to provide financial support to Resinate Jewelry, but you can still help! Please share my campaign with your friends and family and blast it out on your social media. I need your help to get the word out about Resinate! Indiegogo makes it easy for you with social media share buttons. Resinate would not be possible without the support of people like you! Thank you!
story_txt:
Why Resinate?
Hello! My name is Leitha, and I am the founder and creator of Resinate Jewelry that combines bullet casings with natural stones to create works of beauty. I began Resinate in 2014 to share my passion for creating unique, handcrafted statement pieces with others. My life's journey, like so many others, has not been easy, but it led me to creating my own business where I hope to help others find their own voice. I believe individuality is important and should be celebrated. I create my jewelry to reflect that belief.
I just received the amazing news that I was selected to participate in the Las Vegas Cowboy Christmas from December 7-16, 2017. This is a huge achievement for me and my business, and I couldn't be happier for this incredible chance to be seen by thousands of new potential buyers. The exposure from this event could be the making of my small startup!​ But, I need your help to make this event happen.
In order to raise money for the booth fee, I have removed all items from my online storefront and put them here on my Indiegogo campaign. This is not only a great opportunity for you to help me grow my business, but a perfect chance to purchase some my one-of-a-kind statement pieces at a great price! I need your help to celebrate the unique spark in every human - help me grow Resinate!
Thank you for your support! I couldn't do this without you.
P.S. Since my jewelry contains bullet casings, I cannot ship internationally at this time. Thank you for your understanding.


What We Need & What You Get
The combined cost for my booth fee, travel and hotel stay for the week in Las Vegas, and creating new jewelry for the show is $5,000. Unfortunately, these incredible works of art don't grow on trees!
As my gift to you for your support, I'll be sending you one of my handcrafted pieces of jewelry! Each level of giving is broken down with what is included with your contribution.

I created Resinate Jewelry so I could enjoy all that life had to offer me while doing what I love. I need your help to fan it into a flame.

However, I am ready and excited for this challenge and have enlisted the help of family and friends to make this event happen.
If the worst should happen and I don't make it to the event, I am not giving up! My passion is in Resinate and the freedom it can provide. I believe in using the pressures of life to turn the coal I've been given into diamonds of opportunity. Your support will not go to waste, no matter the success of Cowboy Christmas.
 

How You Can Help
I recognize that not everyone will be able to provide financial support to Resinate Jewelry, but you can still help! Please share my campaign with your friends and family and blast it out on your social media. I need your help to get the word out about Resinate! Indiegogo makes it easy for you with social media share buttons. Resinate would not be possible without the support of people like you! Thank you!

story:
Expandable Strap – expands according to all that you put into the wallet and holds it tight. You can therefore confidently fit in any item like GPS tracker, keys, Earphone, Receipts, business cards, cash, memory cards. It simply fits in all that you need and holds it tight and you don't have to worry about losing any item.

 

 

Smart Pull-out Strap – Quickly access your multiple cards up to 6 cards. The elastic strap holds your items firmly, and will automatically retract once released. This layer insulates your cards and prevents electronic pick-pocketing called RFID skimming. The padding secures all the cards in your inner compartment.

 

 

Two quick access slots: on one side which gives easy access to your favorite card. This slot is an RFID protection free slot is open for your work ID card, so you can seamlessly and easily access it on the go. Easy-access Push Slot – Convex opening makes it easier to push your card out 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP     

Even if you cannot donate at this time, please share our campaign with family and friends, or anyone else who would love to have this useful item to take with them during their day today. This increases the chances of a successful campaign, and the ability to purchase STRAPO at a later date.

 

 

Shipping: We are ready for production. We will ship Strapo Minimalist Wallet to our backers worldwide. The shipping cost varies base on your location. You can find out shipping cost in each of pledges. However, there may be additional duties and taxes you might have to pay. In any case, we recommend checking your country’s tax and customs laws.

WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET  

As a small business, it’s often very difficult to secure enough capital for larger projects, especially one that requires such quality materials and craftsmanship. We’ve turned to crowdfunding to help keep costs as low as possible, removing the strain of investor returns which would send the cost of the STRAPO higher. Once our funding goal is reached, we will be able to carry out our first production run, fulfilling the preorders made here. Please see our reward tier to secure your very own STRAPO. It would also make a wonderful gift.
story_txt:
STRAPO™ is designed in New York, USA. We are a small team, committed to designing unique & innovative products that offer irresistible value to our customers. By pooling in the best talents and with a wealth of experience, we came up with Strapo Minimalist Wallet.
Traditional wallets were geared towards carrying cash, eventually adopting card pockets as a secondary feature, but in today’s day and age, that design has become bulky and unnecessary. Credit, Debit, and Gift Cards are quickly becoming the standard, and when you’re in line at the supermarket, it’s all about the ease of the swipe-and-go. Most slim wallets, while solving the bulky issue, end up compromising on the ability to carry more when needed. We sought to do was create the perfect middle ground – a wallet that was spacious without taking up too much space, but most importantly, was geared towards card-carrying, and convenience. Expandable Strap – expands according to all that you put into the wallet and holds it tight. You can therefore confidently fit in any item like GPS tracker, keys, Earphone, Receipts, business cards, cash, memory cards. It simply fits in all that you need and holds it tight and you don't have to worry about losing any item.  Smart Pull-out Strap – Quickly access your multiple cards up to 6 cards. The elastic strap holds your items firmly, and will automatically retract once released. This layer insulates your cards and prevents electronic pick-pocketing called RFID skimming. The padding secures all the cards in your inner compartment.  Two quick access slots: on one side which gives easy access to your favorite card. This slot is an RFID protection free slot is open for your work ID card, so you can seamlessly and easily access it on the go. Easy-access Push Slot – Convex opening makes it easier to push your card out              HOW WE CREATED STRAPO
  OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP     Even if you cannot donate at this time, please share our campaign with family and friends, or anyone else who would love to have this useful item to take with them during their day today. This increases the chances of a successful campaign, and the ability to purchase STRAPO at a later date.    Shipping: We are ready for production. We will ship Strapo Minimalist Wallet to our backers worldwide. The shipping cost varies base on your location. You can find out shipping cost in each of pledges. However, there may be additional duties and taxes you might have to pay. In any case, we recommend checking your country’s tax and customs laws.WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET  As a small business, it’s often very difficult to secure enough capital for larger projects, especially one that requires such quality materials and craftsmanship. We’ve turned to crowdfunding to help keep costs as low as possible, removing the strain of investor returns which would send the cost of the STRAPO higher. Once our funding goal is reached, we will be able to carry out our first production run, fulfilling the preorders made here. Please see our reward tier to secure your very own STRAPO. It would also make a wonderful gift.

story:
Hey, lookit those awesome shirts! ..no, really. Those shirts.


It's the first tees from Runway Studios!

Runway Studios is an LA juggling and modern manipulation space and is the creative home of Ryan, Remy, and Sennyo.

Remy at Runway Studios has been designing tees and clothing for 10 years for big labels all over the US, along with her own contemporary line (www.remyholwick.com), and she'd really like to design for the studio where she lives and trains.

We wanted to put these out early as a presale to give you guys a chance at a discount.


We are pre-selling either tee at 18.00.  It will retail for 24.00.  We will throw in a workshop pass worth 30 dollars for a 40.00 presale.


Nobody is getting rich off these tees-- we're doing this to build the Runway as a Los Angeles resource for the manipulation, juggling, and flow communities. WARM FUZZIES!

The manipulation tee runs mens' s/m/l, and the "I'm in the circus" tee runs womens' s/m/l.  Both are 100% cotton tees sewn in downtown LA.

story:
You can now purchase your wallet here : www.articulatelifestyle.com



Be sure to LIKE us on ^ FACEBOOK ^ and help spread the word!

YOU WILL CHOOSE YOUR COLOR AT THE END OF THE CAMPAIGN

FREE SHIPPING in the USA. 

Thank you in advance for checking out the Articulate Wallet 2.0, we truly appreciate all the support.

How is the 2.0 improved? 

We took all the feedback and suggestions we received from our backers and created an even better wallet. 

  • The Articulate Wallet 2.0 now uses an upgraded premium full grain imported Italian leather that looks and feels amazing.   We wanted a wallet that would compare to the inflated designer brand wallets.  Not only does it look and feel the same, it incorporates features that no other wallet has. 
  • The new design has six card slots with slanted corners to make for quick access.  It is truly one of a kind. 




  • The 2.0 is now 1/2in THINNER then the 1.0.  ONLY .35in!! This makes it as thin as an iPhone!  By using an upgraded leather, we were able to make one of the thinnest leather bill-folds on the market today.
  • Seamless, refined build quality. The edges of the wallet now wrap inside of the wallet. This makes for a professional, higher quality wallet.  
  • The lining on the back pocket wraps over itself. 
  • We added a special RFID blocking lining. You can now feel secure that all your personal information, including the card in the back pocket, are protected from RFID identity theft.   Other RFID blocking wallets on the market are boring/bulky and have nothing unique about them.   
  • We widened the wallet by 1/4in to hold your bills more easily. 
  • The ability to fully customize at a very affordable price- $55

Articulate Wallet 2.0 Collection




The Story-

Articulate began just over a year ago, when we set out to create a wallet that would simplify our lives.  We launched our first design on Kickstarter and thanks to the overwhelming support, we were successfully funded.  We fulfilled over 3,000 orders and since then have received feedback and suggestions for a better wallet.  Taking them into consideration we have come up with something truly unique and one of a kind.  

We wanted a wallet that was convenient to use, looked great, and was thin at the same time.  Money clips are a one solution to keeping it thin, but we found it very inconvenient folding your bills to put them away.  The standard bill-folds we found on the market were either too bulky, too cheap looking, or way over priced.  The Articulate Wallet 2.0 gives you everything you look for in the perfect wallet.  An ultra-thin minimalist design, convenient to use, and all at a very affordable price.


Customize Your Articulate 

Although we offer TEN great looking wallets, we wanted to give our Indiegogo supporters the opportunity to make this wallet their own.  Whether it's your favorite sports team's colors, patriotic colors, company colors, school colors etc., we wanted our supporters to have that choice.  Mix n' Match any of the leather colors we offer in the 2.0 collection, along with any stitching color.  

What is RFID and why should I care?

Whether its your debit/credit card or you government issued ID or driver's license, these cards now include RF(radio frequency) enabled chips.  When these chips come into contact with radio waves, they respond with a slightly altered signal. The response can contain encoded personal identifying information, including the card holder's name, address, Social Security Number, phone number, and pertinent account or employee information.  Upon capturing this data, thieves are then able to program their own cards to respond in an identical fashion (via 'cloning'). Many sites are dedicated to nothing but teaching people how to perform this act, as well as supplying the necessary equipment and software.

With the Articulate Wallet 2.0, ALL of your information is protected, including the card in the back pocket.  Feel safe that all your personal information is protected in an ultra thin and stylish design.  

The Perfect Wallet

•Patent Pending back pocket for your most used card

•SIX easy access card slots

•TWO underneath pockets for business cards and change

•RFID blocking

•Ultra Thin minimalist design (.35in)

•Several colors to choose from + International version

•Customizable

Your Support

This is where Indiegogo comes in. We need your support to launch this new line of wallets. We are raising funding for the manufacturing, packaging, shipping costs and logistics of the Articulate Wallet 2.0.  With your help, we can take this next step, and deliver an even better wallet then before.  Although it is just a wallet, we hope to provide simplicity in your everyday life.  Thank you so much for the support!  

Manufacturing

Articulate Wallet 2.0 are made from 100% full grain genuine Italian leather.  We have established a great relationship with our manufacturer and know they will deliver the highest of quality wallet once we are successfully funded. We have the packaging material designed and ready to go. Now, with your help we can get out the first production run of our newest Articulate Wallet!  Your pledge will go directly into the production and final assembly costs of the wallets, allowing us to meet the minimum order quantity. If you have any suggestions on how we can improve the wallet, or would like to give some feedback, we would love to hear it.  Your support is greatly appreciated!!

Risks and Challenges

The challenges of Articulate Wallet 2.0 will be getting the word out, and convincing backers to participate. With so many great projects to choose from, we hope ours will stand apart from the rest. To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs to help spread the word.

To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs to help spread the word.

story:
My Story

My dear friends and everyone, who appreciates what I am doing! It’s been more than 3 years since I made a decision to become a model. During that time you could see me posing for covers of worldwide famous magazines, advertisment photoshoots and music videos.

From time to time, I heard from people that being part of the industry means financial independence and prosperity. And after all these years, I would like to reveal the myth and say that it has nothing to do with reality!

And at this point, I came to realization that the only thing I have from the so called “model world” is you, my beloved fans, who supported me and stayed by my side.

It’s time to take the situation in my own hands and find the way how to finance myself as a model. I found a team of great artists and managers, who agreed to help me with launching of clothing line carrying my name “Teya Salat”. Every piece of this exclusive wear will hold a piece of me, because I closely participated in development of the designs; this is not just a product launch, that’s a launch of my dream!

What You Get

Great exclusive items developed exclusively for this particular campaign at justified cost! Moreover, as the project progresses, new items will appear in the list.


Please pay attention to the accounting section in the end, as it contains a calculation of costs for this project.

T-shirts are available in all sizes! Free shipping included worldwide!

With development of the project new great items will be released!

About the Indie Go Go project

I believe that a crowd-funding is a great way to set closer relationship with fans and help talented people to avoid middlemen. This particular project is not about earning huge money, that’s first of all, a test of whether I can do without industry representatives and agencies, whether I can make money on my own and support myself to stay an independent model, which is not tied to contractual obligations with “producers” or any other industry representatives. I want to do it my way and I believe that is exactly the reason why you have been supporting me all these years!

Budget

Here's a projected budget we've prepared to give you an idea as to how we've planned to allocate the funds. (Budget is based on reaching our goal)

story:
Invisible bags

Redesigning fashion one bag at a time



Our story

Hi, we are Dom and Luke. The story of why we decided to design the Invisible bags is simple - we don't like the way the fashion industry operates. In recent years, fashion has been spewing out trends faster than we can buy. This is an era defined by disposability and noise, and put simply, we had enough. 

We believe that with the right design, fashion doesn't need to be temporary or disposable. One well-considered object can take the place of many cheaply made ones. And that's exactly how we designed the Invisible bags. 

Our short video about fast fashion:


Invisible bags:

- Simple

- Functional

- Long-lasting



While style can change quickly, a well-considered design will remain. 

We believe that a bag that can withstand the test of time, and one you will want to use forever must start with this:

 


1. A simple and unobtrusive appearance

Changing a t-shirt for a shirt can often result in us changing our bag as well. But a great design shouldn't restrict us from self-expression. Your personal style can be anywhere from bohemian to preppy, but it shouldn't matter for a well-designed bag.



2. Useful and honest functionality

A bag is bought to be used (well, like duh). Therefore, its design needs to include functionality that will help and encourage us to use it. But this is a dangerous place where many get lost - adding geeky features that promise the world, but end up getting in the way. Honest design requires patience, lots of it. And making something simple feel complete, even more. 


We want you to use your bag everyday. That's why all bags feature a water resistant exterior. Rain will always be part of our lives and a well-designed bag needs to take that into account

We want you to use your bag forever. That's why all bags are made from a strong and durable materials. The shell is made from 800D nylon and the details are PVC*.

*Not the most environmentally friendly material. But because it will last longer than some other materials and you won't need to buy a new bag because of it, we believe it's a good trade-off.  "Fun" fact - even though cotton comes from mother earth, the large quantities consumed by the fashion world  has made it by far the biggest pollutant in the industry.



3. A sustainable mindset

A timeless design, unlike a fashionable one, will never seem outdated. By increasing the lifecycle of a product we start to conserve not only the earth's resources but also our own - the time and money spent on cheap disposable products that try to be fashionable might seem insignificant in the short term, but has proven to be huge in the long run. And to better illustrate that, we made up some numbers:

Less, but better



Find out more about the features of individual bags below:



INVISIBLE BACKPACK



Features:


4 quick-access pockets


Separate padded laptop compartment

(fits up to 15" screen)


Expandable inner divider

Keep your gym equipment, or anything else you might want, separate. When not used, the divider will sit on the bottom without taking up any space


Secret side pocket

It’s big enough for your water bottle but useful for much more. It closes like a normal compartment, which means it can be used even if you don’t carry your beverage of choice with you


Inner document holder




INVISIBLE MESSENGER



Features:


2 quick-access pockets


Separate padded laptop compartment (fits up to 15" screen)


3 inner organisers

We apologise for the quality of this picture. A very tricky angle.



INVISIBLE TOTE



Features:


2 quick-access pockets


Separate laptop compartment (fits up to 13" screen) Non-padded


3 inner organisers




INVISIBLE DUFFEL



Features:


One inner pouch. 

Minimalism not intended.



Help us prove that good and long lasting design has room in today’s fashion world

We truly believe that companies need to take a step back and realize the impact their activities have on our lives and the world at large. But this won’t happen until there is someone that can prove there’s a better way. We’re not saying that it’s going to be us, but the more support we and others like us gather, the bigger the chance that other companies will reconsider their current business model. Remember, companies go where the market goes. So when you’ll start buying less but better, they will start producing less and better.




Bundles


THE CODE

Sometimes you can get lost when trying to reach a certain destination. That's why having a compass that helps guide you to the right direction is very important. The compass we use can be found below. The ten principles that were developed by Dieter Rams is what we are all about.


WHAT IS GOOD DESIGN?

It's as little design as possible:

Less, but better – because it concentrates on the essential aspects, and the products are not burdened with non-essentials. Back to purity, back to simplicity

It's innovative:

The possibilities for innovation are not, by any means, exhausted. Technological development is always offering new opportunities for innovative design. But innovative design always develops in tandem with innovative technology, and can never be an end in itself.

It's unobtrusive:

Products fulfilling a purpose are like tools. They are neither decorative objects nor works of art. Their design should therefore be both neutral and restrained, to leave room for the user’s self-expression.

It makes a product useful:

A product is bought to be used. It has to satisfy certain criteria, not only functional but also psychological and aesthetic. Good design emphasizes the usefulness of a product while disregarding anything that could possibly detract from it.

It's honest:

It does not make a product more innovative, powerful or valuable than it really is. It does not attempt to manipulate the consumer with promises that cannot be kept

It's aesthetic:

The aesthetic quality of a product is integral to its usefulness because products are used every day and have an effect on people and their well-being. Only well-executed objects can be beautiful.

It's long-lasting:

It avoids being fashionable and therefore never appears antiquated. Unlike fashionable design, it lasts many years – even in today’s throwaway society.

It makes a product understandable:

It clarifies the product’s structure. Better still, it can make the product clearly express its function by making use of the user’s intuition. At best, it is self-explanatory.

It's thorough down to the last detail:

Nothing must be arbitrary or left to chance. Care and accuracy in the design process show respect towards the consumer.

It's environmentally friendly:

Design makes an important contribution to the preservation of the environment. It conserves resources and minimises physical and visual pollution throughout the lifecycle of the product.

Invisible bagsRedesigning fashion one bag at a timeOur story
Hi, we are Dom and Luke. The story of why we decided to design the Invisible bags is simple - we don't like the way the fashion industry operates. In recent years, fashion has been spewing out trends faster than we can buy. This is an era defined by disposability and noise, and put simply, we had enough. We believe that with the right design, fashion doesn't need to be temporary or disposable. One well-considered object can take the place of many cheaply made ones. And that's exactly how we designed the Invisible bags. 
Our short video about fast fashion:



Invisible bags:
- Simple
- Functional
- Long-lasting

While style can change
quickly, a well-considered design will remain. We
believe that a bag that can withstand the test of time, and one you will want to use forever must start with this: 
1. A simple and unobtrusive appearance

Changing a t-shirt
for a shirt can often result in us changing our bag as well. But a great design
shouldn't restrict us from self-expression. Your personal style can be anywhere
from bohemian to preppy, but it shouldn't matter for a well-designed bag.
2. Useful and honest functionality
A bag is bought to be used (well,
like duh). Therefore, its design needs to include functionality that will help
and encourage us to use it. But this is a dangerous place
where many get lost - adding geeky features that promise the world, but end up
getting in the way. Honest design requires patience, lots of it. And making something simple feel complete, even more. 

We want you to use your bag everyday. That's why all bags feature a water resistant exterior. Rain will always be part of our lives and a well-designed bag needs to take that into account

We want you to use your bag forever. That's why all bags are made from a strong and durable materials. The shell is made from 800D nylon and the details are PVC*.

But because it will last longer than some other materials and you won't need to buy a new bag because of it, we believe it's a good trade-off.  "Fun" fact - even though cotton comes from mother earth, the large quantities consumed by the fashion world  has made it by far the biggest pollutant in the industry.

3 inner organisers

be us, but the more support we and others like us gather, the bigger the chance

Bundles

It's honest:

It's aesthetic:

story:
Hi my name is Jeff Ventola,

My whole life I have been fascinated with anything that flies. Our website: www.wickedwingflyingthing.com

The Wicked Wing Flying Thing™, made to rule over the wind for outdoor sports. "Wicked" means going beyond reasonable limits.

The Wicked Wing Flying Thing ™ is an exciting new flying disc featuring a wickedly unique aerodynamic design that enables it to perform in superior ways when compared to other flying discs. We have a new design which raises the bar on flight performance. We field tested each aspect of the design to confirm our findings and created something very special and well worth fresh attention. We hope you will be intrigued and become part of the Wicked Wing Flying Thing's™ next stage, scale up to commercial manufacturing and first production run.

The idea came about from wondering if there is a way to compete in the  www.guinnessworldrecords.com  flight distance record established for hand held throwing objects. Development was remarkably fun and quite different than what we expected. Testing the prototypes has delighted friends, neighbors and casual witnesses that have seen the Wicked Wing Flying Thing™ in action. In the midst of our testing we realized that the need to fly beyond 100 yards is unnecessary. This product exhibits accuracy, force, and the convenience of staying on target in the wind. Wind does not have adverse effects on accuracy. The design exhibits far greater qualities than just achieving longer distances. The initial discovery of wing capability gave us the luxury to focus on the most practical weight, dimensions and most importantly, the specific wing shape details. The shape of the wings is the root of the Wicked Wing Flying Thing's™ lift and gracefulness in flight. This unique flying thing will be made with silicone rubber for a soft, bendable outer edge safe to catch by hand.

In this section we will show a comparison of the Wicked Wing Flying Thing™ capabilities to other flying discs:

Wicked Wing Attributes

Other Flying Disc Attributes

The   Wicked Wing Flying Thing™ can be thrown very low to the ground for up to 100   yards, even as low as inches and still maintain its lift across a level   field.

Other   flying discs do not have enough lift to maintain a low flight pattern,   especially in distances approaching 100 yards.

The   Wicked Wing Flying Thing™ can easily fly into the wind, even if the wind is   strong.

Other   flying discs get easily pulled downward from high winds.

The   Wicked Wing Flying Thing™ can be thrown in a controlled manner; it can be   thrown to curve right or left at will.

Other   flying discs lose their stability when thrown at angles.

The   Wicked Wing Flying Thing's™ wings act as handles, creating extra initial   force and constant lift.

Other   flying discs have no handles or wings to give them extra force, lift or   stability.

The   wings of the Wicked Wing Flying Thing™ deter it from rolling continuously   when landing on the ground.

Other   flying discs that are round will roll inconveniently away from intended   targets.

The Wicked   Wing Flying Thing™ is designed to be thrown more similarly to a baseball   making it easier to aim at targets. It does not have to be thrown   back-handed.

Other   discs are typically thrown in a back-handed style which can affect distance   and accuracy.

Our best memory of how the name came about was that one of the testers exclaimed, “Wicked”! When one of the first prototypes exhibited the surprising capability we now know and love. The “wing “name was obvious because it has wings. Soon, it was just referred to by all who love it as The Wicked Wing Flying Thing™. Merriam-Webster’s 4th definition for the word “wicked “reads, going beyond reasonable or predictable limits: of exceptional quality or degree< throws a wicked fastball>.

Our initial development, prior to filing patents, was done over one and a half
years creating clay models then converting the model to a master mold. We worked with the mold makers at Skylight Studios www.skylightstudiosinc.com to
obtain molds to create prototypes with rubber or silicone to test and perfect
the design. We have a U.S.A. utility and design patent pending. We have a barcode, packaging design, and trademark with a beautiful Logo designed by one of our most devoted testers. We believe that "made in the U.S.A" will result in the best quality and was found to be more cost effective. Our manufacturer and packaging company are both in the U.S.A (www.surfacesolutions.com, www.gandfmedical.com, www.stephengould.com) and we will also ship via the U.S. postal service. Your participation will trigger development of CAD files, tooling, reserve a manufacturing slot for production, packaging and sales. We have chosen the U.S manufacturer because they will use stainless steel which is guaranteed for production of 500,000 products before the mold loses structural integrity. Our plan is to reinvest the initial earnings to continuously build up manufacturing quantities accordingly. We will provide the rewards to each contributor from the initial manufacturing run. Then, the finished product with be available for sale on our web-site: www.wickedwingflyingthing.com.

Here is a high level view of the production scale up project plan:

  1. Obtain CAD File Programs to:
    1. create the pre-steel mold final prototype for final test
    2. prepare for cutting the stainless steel mold cavities,
    3. Make Stainless Steel Tooling (2 mold cavities guaranteed to make 500,000 products)
    4. First Production Run (2,000 first run products)
    5. Final Die-Cut Packaging

Since scale up to manufacturing is a step by step process, if we do not receive full funding we will use the funds we receive to continue scale up as far as the funds will take us. With whatever funds you contribute generously to our production scale up we will still have made progress along the steps to our goal.

The Wicked Wing Flying Thing™ is relevant to a range of distribution channels such as sporting goods stores and toy stores. The central organization for Presidential Libraries, Aquariums, Science and other Museums www.eventnetwork.com has expressed interest in including our product in their 6,000 gift shops. The Boston Science Museum has offered to support us with a local inventor display. The www.si.edu has been excited about the aspects of inspiration to youth to educate them on inventing.

One of our exciting goals is to refine a game we call "Aerial Ricochett". This game is possible because the Wicked Wing Flying Thing™ can travel so smoothly across a field and be thrown with such control, speed and accuracy. We envision this futuristic game sensation to be similar to Lacrosse only with larger nets such as in Soccer.

We are so eager to share this with you all soon. Our greatest joy is seeing kids spontaneously join in on testing with us even on humid New England Summer afternoons when their camp counselors couldn't get them interested in other games. It is our hope that this will spark continued interest and contribute to reducing obesity and improving health for many people. Our developers have naturally lost weight and the kids who treat us like rock stars spur our passion to get this on the market to them soon. Thank you all forever, for honoring us with your participation in this healthful mission we are on together. I am so very grateful to you all,

Jeff Ventola

story:
Kultcha gets Cultured in London & Paris

Kultcha Collective has been offered an incredible opportunity! We need your support?

I recently got involved with the Australian International fashion festival held in the sunshine coast QLD, the festival ran for the whole day on the 28th October 2016 with over 27 designers involved in the runway shows including the likes of Nicola Finetti, international designer Thang de Hoo and many more inspiring and aspiring designers like myself Kaidee Peel of Kultcha Collective.

One of many incredible parts of this show aside from the inspiring works of many, local international, buyers, fashion consultants, bloggers, media.

Was the once in a lifetime opportunity! to be one of three selected designers chosen to take part in the International development program, which means attending London fashion week, experience first hand what standards are required to show at Pure London, London Fashion Week, Premier Vision and Tranoi Paris.

The International Marketing & Development Program is available through a strict application process of registration, catwalk shows, industry and interviews. Our mentor Margaret Rushe Farrell, board member of the world fashion organisation.

My current personal situation is, My husband and I are building and creating a film on our shipping container home in the hinterland of Byron bay, living the simple life with our two children and cat.

We work each day bit by bit using recycled materials where ever possible to create our dream space for our children to grow up on.


 

Its such an exciting project along with our ongoing passion for a Australian made label Kultcha. My husband Bulan is the most amazing support when it comes to the business and we are also building a container studio for our workspace and showroom along with our home that will be open to the public by appointment.

We need to crowd fund approx $11000 to take hold of this opportunity to travel to London/Paris and take Kultcha Collective global.

P.S Did you know; Kultcha Collective supports ethical small businesses throughout, Our production is carried out 90% in Australia.

We do not mass produce, we expect quality and not quantity.

You are supporting our australian business to become worldwide recognised and potentially show and get a foot in the door for a european market!
