story:
MISS THE CAMPAIGN?

CLICK HERE TO VISIT LALABU.COM

Stay up to date on the latest Lalabu news and order Soothe Shirts™ at Lalabu.com.

 

SPEND A DAY WITH LALABU™

It's the perfect companion for you and your baby.  Watch the video below and see how the Lalabu Soothe Shirt™ can simplify your day. 

The Lalabu Soothe Shirt™ is designed for moms who want the intimacy of a wrap without the complexity.

  • Simple pouch soothes newborns
  • Built-in nursing bra for breastfeeding
  • Secure seams from climbing apparel
  • Wear along and with your favorite outfits
  • Made in the USA
  • Daily companion for new moms


 

SOOTHING YOUR BABY HAS NEVER BEEN EASIER

Wear your Soothe Shirt™ all day and you can calm your baby whenever you need to.  Say goodbye to complicated wraps, snaps, and buckles.  Your infant is held securely in the expandable pouch, with a support panel that flips up when needed to hold your baby's head against you. 


FINALLY A MODEST NURSING TANK 

Unlike most nursing tanks, the Soothe Shirt™ is modestly cut so it can be worn on its own.  When you aren't breastfeeding, the pouch is designed to be pulled up over the breasts creating an elegant curve and an extra layer of coverage.  The Soothe Shirt™ also features a comfortable, easy to use nursing bra.  There are no clasps or hooks - just pull it aside for easy access.  

 

 

DRESS IT UP OR DRESS IT DOWN

The Lalabu Soothe Shirt™ is versatile.  Wear it under an open blouse, with a cardigan, or by itself.  Launch colors to choose from include: Pure Black, Natural Brown, and Rich Purple.  It's sized like a standard tank top, ranging from extra small to extra large (XS-XL).

 

ABOUT LALABU

Lalabu is named to honor the woman who taught us how to wrap babies during a trip to Burkina Faso, Africa. Our "One Day One Dollar" model strives to support women in Africa and Atlanta. One day a week we give our time to work with exploited women in Atlanta. One dollar from every sale is given to a microfinance organization to help women in Africa.  For this campaign we're giving one dollar for every Soothe Shirt™ to Lalabu herself.

  

WHY WE NEED FUNDING

Our minimum order is going to cost $15k.  This includes materials and production.  We've self-funded $25k to develop the product and we need this campaign to place our first order.  Your support will help us finish a 3 year journey to launch Lalabu. 

 

LEVI AND THE LALABU™ DRUM

Wondering what Levi is doing with the African drum? Great question! We got the drum on our trip to Burkina Faso in 2009. Levi and the Lalabu team play it each time we raise another $1,000 of support on Indiegogo! 

 

SPREAD THE WORD!

Even if you don't want to contribute to our campaign with money, you can help us out by sharing this with your friends, family, or anyone else who might love a Lalabu Soothe Shirt™. The shortcut to this campaign is:

igg.me/at/lalabu

Thanks for checking out Lalabu. With your help, we'll make Simple Babying a reality!
story_txt:
MISS THE CAMPAIGN?
CLICK HERE TO VISIT LALABU.COM
Stay up to date on the latest Lalabu news and order Soothe Shirts™ at Lalabu.com.
 

SPEND A DAY WITH LALABU™


It's the perfect companion for you and your baby.  Watch the video below and see how the Lalabu Soothe Shirt™ can simplify your day. 


The Lalabu Soothe Shirt™ is designed for moms who want the intimacy of a wrap without the complexity.





Simple pouch soothes newborns

Built-in nursing bra for breastfeeding
Secure seams from climbing apparel
Wear along and with your favorite outfits
Made in the USA
Daily companion for new moms








 
SOOTHING YOUR BABY HAS NEVER BEEN EASIER


Wear your Soothe Shirt™ all day and you can calm your baby whenever you need to.  Say goodbye to complicated wraps, snaps, and buckles.  Your infant is held securely in the expandable pouch, with a support panel that flips up when needed to hold your baby's head against you. 


FINALLY A MODEST NURSING TANK 


Unlike most nursing tanks, the Soothe Shirt™ is modestly cut so it can be worn on its own.  When you aren't breastfeeding, the pouch is designed to be pulled up over the breasts creating an elegant curve and an extra layer of coverage.  The Soothe Shirt™ also features a comfortable, easy to use nursing bra.  There are no clasps or hooks - just pull it aside for easy access.  


 
 


DRESS IT UP OR DRESS IT DOWN


The Lalabu Soothe Shirt™ is versatile.  Wear it under an open blouse, with a cardigan, or by itself.  Launch colors to choose from include: Pure Black, Natural Brown, and Rich Purple.  It's sized like a standard tank top, ranging from extra small to extra large (XS-XL).


 



ABOUT LALABU


Lalabu is named to honor the woman who taught us how to wrap babies during a trip to Burkina Faso, Africa. Our "One Day One Dollar" model strives to support women in Africa and Atlanta. One day a week we give our time to work with exploited women in Atlanta. One dollar from every sale is given to a microfinance organization to help women in Africa.  For this campaign we're giving one dollar for every Soothe Shirt™ to Lalabu herself.


  



WHY WE NEED FUNDING





Our minimum order is going to cost $15k.  This includes materials and production.  We've self-funded $25k to develop the product and we need this campaign to place our first order.  Your support will help us finish a 3 year journey to launch Lalabu. 


 
LEVI AND THE LALABU™ DRUM


Wondering what Levi is doing with the African drum? Great question! We got the drum on our trip to Burkina Faso in 2009. Levi and the Lalabu team play it each time we raise another $1,000 of support on Indiegogo! 


 



SPREAD THE WORD!
Even if you don't want to contribute to our campaign with money, you can help us out by sharing this with your friends, family, or anyone else who might love a Lalabu Soothe Shirt™. The shortcut to this campaign is:
igg.me/at/lalabu

Thanks for checking out Lalabu. With your help, we'll make Simple Babying a reality!

story:
Please note: If you are ordering the 'Super Early Bird' perk - we will contact you via email after the order is placed to select which watch you want. There is no the option to select a particular watch during the checkout. We have stock to accommodate any selection. 

SHIPS EARLY DECEMBER 2016

Dire Wolf Timepieces | The Art of Time

Raw styling transfused with a distressed metal or artistic emblazoned dial created by a collective of highly acclaimed international street and contemporary artists. Introducing Dire Wolf's is first collection featuring five different styles.

Culminating with the launch of the collection, Dire Wolf is offering the collection at a heavily discounted price (only available for this Indiegogo campaign).

The timepiece features a larger face unisex design with minimal non numerical markers which won’t deter from the beauty of the artwork and finishings. Encased in stainless steel 3ATM/30m resistant and built to the highest quality, matched with a genuine leather vintage strap with a light suede finish. Accuracy is ensured by Japanese 3 hand movement and each timepiece comes with a 1 year manufacturer's warranty.

www.dire-wolf.com

THE COLLECTION

Distressed Black Timepiece

L7M Timepiece

Distressed Silver Timepiece

Christopher Hancock Timepiece
 

Conrad Bizjak Timepiece

 

SPECIFICATIONS

Size: 39.5mm

Case Thickness: 8.7mm

Case Material: Stainless Steel

Case Finish: Distressed Metal

Movement: Japanese Quartz Movement

Strap: Genuine Leather, Light Suede

Strap Width: 18mm

Strap Colour: Black

Interchangeable Straps: Yes

Water Resistant: Up to 3 ATM (splash/rain resistant)

Gender: Unisex (with additional strap holes to accommodate smaller wrist sizes).

QUALITY ASSURANCE

It took over a year to source a manufacturer who could deliver the high quality timepiece to our exact specifications. Our manufacturing partners acumen is assured through the watches they already produce for some of the world's largest watch brands. Brands which (like us), demand stringent Q&A and the highest quality product to be produced each and every time.

Warranty - Each timepieces comes with a 12 month manufactures warranty.

UNISEX

We couldn't be happier with the sizing of the watches… whilst fitting nicely on the ladies they still look large on the gents - please see the accompanying images/videos for examples.

ASPIRATIONS & IMPACT

The concept really excites us and we wish to build upon in the future. All the funds raised will go towards unlocking more artists and creating more collections. We already have some artists in mind and many ideas for future. So join with us and be a part of the journey and discover what the future beholds. Keep up-to-date with our social networks and website for all the news and announcements. 

www.dire-wolf.com
www.facebook.com/direwolftimepieces
www.instagram.com/direwolf.timepieces
www.youtube.com
www.vimeo.com

OUR BELIEF

Leading artists all have a common trait, the ability to create something unique. Our aspiration is to encompass that trait with our timepieces and offer them at the lowest possible price.

INCENTIVES

Lower Price Point by Selling Direct - This is the obvious one, traditional watch makers enjoy a hefty mark up as consumers are buying into their branding. By selling direct through Indiegogo, we are cutting through these mark-ups to offer the watch at the lowest possible price point and enjoy a substantial saving on our Recommended Retail Price.

Unique - It's nice being different. We feel the combination of styling, finishings, branding and or course artworks will ensure the timepieces are truly unique!

Batch Number - Each timepiece (for this campaign) is engraved with '1' batch number. As the brand grows, hopefully so will the value of our first collection.

Food for thought - As Dire Wolf is currently located in the UK we are having to endure the fallout of post Brexit, which as it stands is a 20% depreciation of the currency (British Pound), not good for us - but good for you. International buyers will enjoy the knowledge that the savings have already been passed on.

CORRESPONDING VIDEO CLIPS

RISKS & CHALLANGES

Investing in first generation products can at times be frustrating. Waiting for prototyping, sampling and assembly to be completed before the product can be produced and delivered can be a timely process and can often experience unexpected delays. To alleviate this, Dire Wolf has fully completed all the prototyping, assembly and sampling stages before posting this campaign. The final product samples have been perfected, signed off and going into production.

We have sourced a exception manufacturing partner with a proven track record of manufacturing to the highest degree for some of the biggest watch brands in the world. With stringent QA procedures and a proven track record, we have taken every step possible to alleviate the risks. 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

We are looking to make as much noise as possible so always appreciate any exposure, shares, comments, reviews, blog posts etc. Indiegogo has made it easy with their share tools at the top right of the campaign. Any support is greatly appreciated! Also check out our social networks for updates and announcements.

ADDITIONAL IMAGES






 








 

THANKYOU

Thank you for your time and consideration - any support is greatly appreciated :)

Kind Regards,

Jake Anderson | DireWolf Timepieces
www.dire-wolf.com

story:
I created CanGenie because my wife complained about filthy, disgusting trash bags at the bottom of the can (think last night's spaghetti + full baby diaper).  Yeah!  For some reason neither my wife nor my daughters wanted to reach in there and reattach the bag to the rim.  That was apparently my job and frankly, I didn't want to do it either.  So off to the garage I went with an idea on how to solve this problem.  Two hair dryers later (I set the first one on fire), some wire, batteries and an ordinary trash can and POOF, the CanGenie was born. 

I currently have two working prototypes that are used daily by my family and that my wife says she WILL NOT give up.  In her words, "They just work."  No more diving into the can to get a fallen trash bag, ever.

Seeing the CanGenie prototypes in action, the most common response I get is a smile and a befuddled, "Huh."  But most of the time people just admit that they never thought anything was wrong with their trash cans, until now.  The Video Demo, shows exactly how easy CanGenie is to install (only the External model requires installation) and operate.  

Put a bag in the CanGenie, press the button and the air is removed from beneath the bag.  The CanGenie runs until the bag has fully adhered to the inner sides of the trash can then stops, saving battery life (if running from power pack).  When the cycle is complete, the full inner volume of the trash can is usable space and there is virtually no way for the bag to fall down into the can.  Problem solved!

Never again will you reach down into a trash can to get a nasty, disgusting trash bag from the bottom of the can.  Also, no more wrestling and fighting with a full bag to get it out of the trash can.  With CanGenie the full bag of trash slips right out with no fuss.  CanGenie is simple, efficient and just plain works.

I am working with a design firm in L.A. and they have shown great interest in streamlining my prototype designs and bringing them to market.  The "CanGenie" name and both prototypes are protected under United States Intellectual Property/Trademark Laws and I am in the process of obtaining a broad patent on the design and method of my devices.

Your funding will go toward the next step in the prototyping and design of the CanGenie.  It will also move it forward into the manufacturing and marketing stages.

story:
Hello, My name is Theresa.  For many years I have been annoyed with 90% of womens clothing; dresses and skirts to be spicific. They never have pockets. When all you need is your drivers license, phone, and perhaps a few bucks lugging around a purse can be a hassle. Not to mention leaving your phone on a table at any park, fast food, or bar table leaves the risk of theft. After years of trying to figure out how I can keep 2 free hands, no purse, and still carry my small amount of nessessitys I finally figured it out.

 

Click here for more photos

 

Peek A Pocket-

Just about the size of an avrage back pocket it holds just what you need. it has a velcro back that allows for conveint removal and reattachment to an ajustable strap you can place anywhere. A clear front cover allows easy usage of your smart phone without removing it from the pocket itself.

In my 20s I hated holdong my stuff while dancing. As a mother of four kids who love to run I now appreicate the ability to join without leaveing my stuff on the park table or in the car. So it occured to me I am most likely not the only one.

I believe in this product. I have had sevreal strangers intrested in the one I have been wearing. It has been also brought to my attention that basketball shorts never have pockets. With the adjustable strap it can be worn under them. 

So I have conected with an invention agancy that will help me with taking this from a concept for me to a product for everyone. I have paid the patent fees but do not have the funding for the rest of the fees. I need  $500. down on a $2,500. fees twoards the designers, manufactures, marketers, ect.

By contributing I will be able to make the Peek A Pocket avaible to anyone. At this moment I am simply seeking the deposit however the sooner I can pay the total the sooner it can be on shelfs.

If you do not have the ability to contribute (I understand, believe me :) Please pass this along to friends and family.

Thank you for checking me out and Thank you for any help offered

Theresa Sanders

story:
1. Premium Asian Bamboo: Plants that are carefully cultivated from dedicated and sustainable plantations.

2. Superior Craftmanship: Made by generations of textile fabrication.

3. Incredible Style: Designed with the input of leading athletic fashion industry.

4. Amazing Comfort and Durability: Bamboo is incredibly soft and very durable.

5. The Bamboo Guarantee: We guarantee you will be happy with the way our clothing feels and fits or the return or exchange is on us. (Sorry, no returns on socks or underwear due to hygienic reasons but we will make sure you get the correct size and you keep the original order.)


OUR STORY: We are athletes who demand more and want to keep our competitive edge. We know we can find harmony and balance in a world that is more sustainable through the innovation of technology. Exercise and fitness are a vital part of maintaining good health, but so is a clean environment. Not only is good fitting apparel important for comfort and style, we believe there is room among the industries leading brands for an innovative and holistic (intimately connected) brand between people and the environment. We are committed to making better product and simply doing business better.

OUR VISION: BAMBOO CLOTHING CO. wants to showcase to the world that the relationship between human ingenuity (cleverness) and innovation (new ideas) built with a strong relationship to the earth and environment around us can significantly improve our quality of life while sustaining a clean, and habitable planet. BAMBOO CLOTHING CO. is committed to engaging with the successful development of individuals, teams and athletes by adapting holistic lifestyle practices as part of the fundamental building blocks in creating the truly advanced and evolved athlete, team or individual. You have unlimited potential for greatness and we want to help you get there. Combine your ambition, dreams, and Premium Bamboo Clothing derived from the powerful elements of our surroundings, and you will find universal strength, balance, and success in your life.


SIZING OPTIONS

Unisex Socks Sizes

Small / Medium (Size 6-9) and Large / XLarge (Size 10-13)


HELP GET PRODUCTION STARTED
After 3 years of research and 3 months of designing, we are finally ready to bring our amazing Bamboo Training Compression Socks to the mainstream market. We need your KickStart Pledge to get our initial order off the ground. In return for your support we are offering you Guaranteed Product First in a number of limited packages.


OUR GUARANTEE
We guarantee you will be amazed with the quality and comfort of our Premium Bamboo Clothing.

For any reason your item doesn't fit, we will send you the right size free of charge and you keep the original order. We know a friend or family member will love a gift. Sorry, no returns on socks or underwear due to hygienic reasons but we will make sure you get the correct size and you keep the original order. (Continental Canada Only.)

Canadian Shipping cost is about $15 of total Pledge.

International pledgers are subject to a $20 Shipping and Handling fee.

Bamboo can grow up to 4ft a day and over 100ft tall in a short 3-5 years. It's a highly renewable resource that doesn't require pesticides or fungicides to be grown, which is great for the environment. Bamboo actually exchanges the carbon dioxide in the air 30x more efficient than trees. With impressive facts like that, it's no wonder we're excited to showcase Bamboo to the world!

Our industry goal is to help raise awareness of the harmful effects of the modern cotton industry today which uses 100's of thousands of tons of chemicals to grow and maintain each year, where Bamboo does not need any chemicals to grow. That's right! Bamboo plants have 100% natural strength and raw power, just like you and us.  We see a sustainable world made of Bamboo clothing instead.

Of course, the most amazing thing about this giant woody-grass is that it can be worn as clothing and is compared to the softness of cashmere or silk. Our Bamboo clothing material are just as impressive as the plant itself.



RISKS AND CHALLENGES

1. We already have a pre-production run of socks being made, worn and tested, and our production team is ready to produce your orders as soon as funding is received.

2. We have been researching, developing and testing Bamboo product in the market for the past several years. People are blown away with the feel and confort of our product. We anticipate our production to go smoothly with a prompt and easy delivery once the project is funded and the first run of socks are made.

3. Delays are unforeseen and obstacles are always possible. We find the likelihood of anything serious occurring to be extremely unlikely. That said, our community of supporters will be the first to know if anything unexpected happens.

story:
WOW!!! We did it!!!

AMAZING AND THANK YOU!!!!


A huge and sincerest thank you to all of our contributors! Your generosity is inspiring and you have helped us to do something very special... 10% of all contributions have been transferred to Phase Nepal to help earthquake relief.

If you have any questions about your products, or you are interested in what is happening at Mirror in the Sky, please email us:

contact@mirrorintheskycashmere.com

or visit our new website:

www.mirrorintheskyshop.com


THE MIRROR IN THE SKY STORY

We love handmade scarves and we love creating amazing designs... put the two  together and you have Mirror in the Sky.

Our story begins in the Nepal Himalaya mountains where we discovered a tradition of handweaving cashmere that is more than 400 years old. We are based in Barcelona, a beautiful vibrant city full of style and for the last three years we've learnt how to make great scarves. At the same time, we've searched for a way to combine our passion for art, design and photography to create a unique range of 'Signature Designs'.



Designer scarves are normally very expensive and that doesn't make sense to us. Our mission is to promote new and emerging artists, designers and photographers through a sustainable business model for high quality handmade products. We have decided to focus on selling our products online, so that we can:

  • Avoid the huge markups of retailers and distributors
  • Guarantee Fair Wages to our weavers and artists
  • Offer you amazing value for money

So we've come to Indiegogo because we need to meet minimum quantities for each design. We'd really appreciate your help to make this project a reality and reach our fundraising goal of €12,000 (US$13,000) and make all of our Signature Designs!




EARTHQUAKE DISASTER UPDATE

The launch of our Indiegogo Campaign has coincided with a massive earthquake in Nepal. Tragically one staff member lost their life and the factory has been partially damaged but we are thankful because the situation could have been much worse. 

Over the last twenty years Nepal has been a huge part of our lives, it is our second home, so we will be donating 10% of all sales to the disaster relief program.

We will be supporting PHASE Nepal (www.phasenepal.org) a humanitarian NGO based in Nepal who are coordinating relief supplies throughout the country.

The disaster relief program is just the beginning of the help that Nepal needs now and in the future. We think that the best way to help Nepal fully recover is by combining emergency aid with long-term business partnerships so we believe our project has become more important than ever.

The Fair Wages we pay are a vital lifeline for more than 100 families. We are already repairing the factory and expect to be operational in the next two to three weeks.

We are totally committed to continue working in Nepal in the years ahead.

Please support our project by choosing a perk and sharing our story.

HANDCRAFTED

When you begin with amazing fibers you can make amazing scarves. We have chosen a 'modal-cashmere' blended yarn because it is totally natural and feels sensational. Modal comes from beech trees and cashmere is from mountain goats in the Himalaya and Mongolia.

We make everything in Nepal by hand, from preparing the yarn, weaving, massaging and finishing each scarf because we believe it is the best way to make amazing products.



SIGNATURE DESIGNS

The idea of wearable art really appeals to us, so we have partnered with artists, designers and photographers to create what we call 'Signature Designs' - to transform our scarf canvas in to products that say or express something about who we are and the world we live in.

We want to encourage more artists and designers to get involved with our project, so please feel free to contact us with ideas!



FAIR WAGES

Designer scarves typically cost €270 - €1000 (US$300 - $1100) due to high margins charged by distributors and retailers but we want to make our products affordable to everyone and pay Fair Wages to the folks who make them.

We believe that producing high-value handmade items is the most sustainable way of building a strong business in Nepal. Our project is designed to improve the livelihoods of all the staff in Nepal as well as the artists and designers who create our designs.

It has taken us two years to put together the right combination of yarn suppliers, weavers, designers and artists to test our sustainable business model but we must also be competitive. So, instead of cutting wages to save costs, we have decided to cut out the middle men and retailers and sell direct online.



SOMETHING LUCKY FOR EVERYONE

Plus, every product comes with a Kalachakra amulet that has been blessed by a Tibetan Lama. It's a symbol of tolerance, wisdom and openness from the Himalaya and represents our ethical, open approach to business.

We recommend you put it on your key ring and you'll never loose your keys again ;-)


Please scroll down the page for more details about each design.


 Compare with luxury brands €270 - €1000 (US$300 - $1100)




BARCELONA

Inspired by the amazing city we live in.

€145 / US$160

Made from hand-massaged modal (90%) & cashmere (10%).

Digital print with vintage colour effect, size = 140 x 180cm (55" x 70")

Artist / Designer: Robin Boustead



TIBETANESQUE

Auspicious symbols from the Himalaya.

€145 / US$160 

Made from hand-massaged modal (90%) & cashmere (10%).

High definition digital print, size = 140 x 180cm (55" x 70")

Artist / Designer: Rosaura Marsinach


 

TRIBAL MONOTONE

Ethnic motifs from the Himalaya.

€145 / US$160 

Made from hand-massaged modal (90%) & cashmere (10%).

High definition digital print, size = 140 x 180cm (55" x 70")

Artist / Designer: Lillan Team



GELATISSIMO

The ultimate summertime treat!

€145 / US$160 

Made from hand-massaged modal (90%) & cashmere (10%).

High definition digital print, size = 140 x 180cm (55" x 70")

Artist / Designer: Lillan Team




PAINT DROPS

Colour is an expression of how we feel.

€145 / US$160 

Made from hand-massaged modal (90%) & cashmere (10%).

High definition digital print, size = 140 x 180cm (55" x 70")

Artist / Designer: Lillan Team



HEARTFELT

A positive heart-art-message for all.

€145 / US$160 

Made from hand-massaged modal (90%) & cashmere (10%).

High definition digital print, size = 140 x 180cm (55" x 70")

Artist / Designer: Rosaura Marsinach



HAPPY QUOTE

The words say it all!

€145 / US$160 

Made from hand-massaged modal (90%) & cashmere (10%).

High definition digital print, size = 140 x 180cm (55" x 70")

Artist / Designer: Lillan Team



HOPE

Think positive everday!

€145 / US$160 

Made from hand-massaged modal (90%) & cashmere (10%).

High definition digital print, size = 140 x 180cm (55" x 70")

Artist / Designer: Lillan Team



FORMENTERA

A beautiful island for fun in the sun!

€145 / US$160 

Made from hand-massaged modal (90%) & cashmere (10%).

High definition digital print, size = 140 x 180cm (55" x 70")

Artist / Designer: Pier Paola Canè



CIUTAT

Abstract city life.

€145 / US$160 


Made from hand-massaged modal (90%) & cashmere (10%).

High definition digital print, size = 140 x 180cm (55" x 70")

Artist / Designer: Lillan Team



ABOUT THE ARTISTS


Lillan Team

Lilian Team is an innovative graphic design agency in Barcelona, Spain. We are a team of five young creative designers who believe in a dynamic, enthusiastic approach to creativity. We work with our brand partners in a professional way while maintaining a personal touch to every project. We love the design process and our projects vary from creative branding, printing, illustrations, brochure and catalogue production and website design.


Pier Paola Canè

Pier Paola Canè was born in Bologna, Italy and studied art and design until she abandoned her course in 1993 to dedicate herself exclusively to painting. Since then she has had solo exhibitions in Italy, France and Formentera and many collaborations in design and publishing. She has published four books, travel journals in which she has expanded her watercolor techniques. She currently lives and works between Bologna and Formentera.


Rosaura Marsiñach Frisach
Rosaura Marsiñach Frisach lives in Barcelona, Spain and has a passion for art and design as well as exploring India and Nepal. Close friends urged her to begin painting in 2010 and she draws inspiration from everyday life and the feelings we experience when we help others. She loves encouraging her young daughters to express themselves through art and music.


Robin Boustead

Robin Boustead was born in the UK, spent nearly 20 years based in Australia and now lives in Barcelona. Known for his explorations of the Great Himalaya Trail, Robin is also a keen sketcher, which he often uses to decorate the books he has written about the mountains of Nepal. He is also co-founder of Mirror in the Sky and believes that the best way to help Nepal develop is through quality trade and business improvement.



OUR PACKAGING

We love our products and we want them to last as long as possible. So each scarf is packed in a protective lightweight cotton storage bag inside a strong aluminium can. All of the cans are printed with the distinctive Kalachakra design and are shipped in a sturdy cardboard box.



INTERNATIONAL FREIGHT

Certified international delivery is included in the price. Please contact us if you would like your product delivered on a guaranteed day.



PRODUCTION AND DELIVERY SCHEDULE

Fulfillment Schedule: For early bird customers we have made 2 pieces of each design that we can guarantee delivery to anywhere in the world immediately at the end of the funding project. Subsequent products will be shipped at the end of June or at a later date specified by you - just in case you are buying as a gift for someone!

Delivery Times: In manufacturing, delays are always possible despite the best laid plans. For the last 2 years we have researched and tested our system for buying yarns from around the world and hand-crafting every product in Nepal. We are confident that we can deliver our products on time, subject to acts of God.

Duty/VAT Charges: We have endeavoured to keep our prices below the duty and VAT threshold for most countries around the world. However, rates and systems can change and you will be responsible for any applicable charges.

Customs: Some customs departments around the world can be very slow and we only wish we could speed them up. We will always try our best to ship products to suit your best timing, but we cannot be held responsible for customs delays.



FAQs

I am buying a scarf as a gift, can I specify the delivery date?

Sure you can... but there will be an additional cost. Please contact us for details.


I want to buy more than one design, can I ship them together?

Yes, but you must check the duty value limit on combined shipments. It might work out faster and cheaper to send them separately.


Can I recommend an artist or designer to you?

Absolutely! Please put us in contact.


I want to make my own designs, is that possible?

Yes it is, but small quantities will be expensive to make so try to meet our minimum quantity of 10 pieces.


I want to contribute to your project but I cannot afford a scarf, what can I do?

Every contribution is welcome and for those over €20 we will send you a thank you kalachakra amulet... see perks...

and please share our story with your friends, we need all possible help to make our campaign a success!



A huge thank you to Fran Bacardit i Torrens @ Film Easy
for amazing patience and creativity with our video!


THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

story:
Dandi Wind Opaine - March 2013 Fashion Show

Hi everyone, I am ridiculously excited to have been accepted to present my first fashion line at Vancouver’s Winter Fashion Week in March. I've immersed myself in the creative process but I'm urgently seeking funding to complete and bring my show fully to life. Not only will you help me achieve a LIFELONG DREAM, but you will also nourish the fledgling local art and fashion community in our city. XOX

1. Dandi's Life and Work

From an early age, I've sought to understand who I am, what my spirit holds and what my obligation to the universe is.... Everything I've done since has tied back to my earliest experiences, growing up in northern BC. Gazing at the skies (aurora borealis, constellations) and vast mountain ranges, I yearned to see what was beyond them. It's natural that my subsequent life and work has been an exploration of the elements, the earth, my subconscious, hypnagogia (the state between sleep and awake), and the human condition.


Photos Credit: Camille Mcquat / Leigh Righton


Photo Credit: Leigh Righton

Although I came to some degree of prominence via the musical acts Dandi Wind and Fan Death, my efforts have been more than just sound based. I've always considered myself to be an art director; a mode honed by my experiences touring globally, performing in prestigious art spaces, working in film, video, costume, and styling, both for myself and clients. The transition into a focus on fashion/styling was natural and organic, and enabled me to present a very successful first show in December 2012 for USED House of Vintage in Vancouver. Read the review of the show in The Straight and see behind the scenes photos.

2. Vision for the show MARCH FASHION WEEK

I’m extremely excited to present my winter line at Vancouver's Fashion Week in March 2013, a dream come true since adolescence.  I've been working on this collection of sculptural-wearable pieces for the past few months drawing upon my lifelong influences: My upbringing in Northern BC, between the tiny town of Smithers and the Wet'suwet'en First Nations village of Moricetown, in a cabin surrounded by lush evergreen forest and glaciers. My young and extremely loving hip parents, and WWII veteran grandparents taught me the appreciation of the earth’s natural resources and elements for survival.

My grandmother, a most remarkable woman, just passed away this month Feb 2013. As a child she had a great influence on me. She taught me to knit,  (she obsessively knit Chowichan sweaters for a period)  to shumak, to spot/collect gemstones/crystals and to appreciate skulls and bones washed up in her creek. I feel very blessed to have had her in my life and as a tribute to her I will incorporate many of her handknits, weave/cross stitch/ crochet and miniatures in this show.

Given enough resources, my show will present a new line of clothing in a fully immersive environment (with the production expertise of MIRROR whom I worked with on my Dec show) including performance, original musical score, and sculptural elements. It will help propel Vancouver further into the international fashion spotlight, while simultaneously employing extraordinarily talented local individuals in the fields of hair, makeup, sculpture, set design, video, and production. This is increasingly important, given the current climate of stifling of the arts by our federal government, and “bulldozing” of our city's cultural nodes by rampant and short sighted development (RIP Waldorf).


Photo credit: Camille McQuat

3. Logistics

The reality of my vision is two fold: I want to create and I want to present my creations.

In the process of my creation for this show, I will maximize the use of recycled/discarded organic fabrics and vintage items, including silk, cotton, and wool; hand dyed fabrics using ecologically friendly dyes. The accessories and handpieces will be entirely hand made.

In addition to a runway show, I wish to present my creations via pattern samples, a website, and print material. I will strive to achieve the caliber worthy of NYC, Paris, London :)


Photo Credit: Camille McQuat

Your funding will assist with the following essentials:

  • Fabrics
  • Seamstresses
  • Pattern development
  • Screen-printing
  • Footwear
  • Handmade accessories
  • Studio space + walk in freezer
  • Fabric dyes
  • Video production for background screen
  • Live cinematographers
  • Marketing (website development, invitations, program printing,
  • Key Hair “sculptor/artist”>
  • Hair extensions /Wigs
  • Key makeup artists
  • Music production, score specifically made for show
  • Accessories and headdresses
  • Props for show
  • Special rentals for show (snow machine, freezer truck)
  • Production assistant

Thank you so much for taking a look at my pitch! Creating clothing can cost an enormous amount, and so can an ambitious showcase. Although I've managed to keep my costs down by recycling and reusing as much as possible and being as resourceful as I can, I still need your help to complete my work and present it with Mirror at VFW 2013.

http://dandilionwind.tumblr.com/

dandiwind@gmail.com 


Photo Credits : Dandilion Wind Opaine

Production assistant

Although I've managed to keep my costs down by recycling and reusing as much as possible and being as resourceful as I can, I still need your help to complete my work and present it with Mirror at VFW 2013.
http://dandilionwind.tumblr.com/
dandiwind@gmail.com 
Photo Credits : Dandilion Wind Opaine

story:
All orders over $18 will receive a free handmade Bat n`Bunny Kawaii Narwhal.

 

THE PINS 

The first series of Bat n'Bunny pins will feature my very well loved Fairy Unicorns. 

My IG vote was SO CLOSE that I have decided to make not 1 but 2 Fairy Unicorn colors available. They will be absolutely precious on their own but also as twinsies. 

Also a third flower bum bum Unicorn and 2 Bat n`Bunny logos will be available.

I am looking to order 100 minimum of each design, more may be ordered depending on popularity of each design.

The Fairy Unicorn pins will feature:

- Hard enamel with gold plating 

- 30mm tall

- Glitter bodies 

- your choice of gold metal clucth or rubber clutch backing.

- Bat n 'Bunny branded 

The Bat n 'Bunny logo pins will feature:

- Soft enamel with gold plating 

- 25mm tall 

- your choice of gold metal clutch or rubber clutch 

- Bat n'Bunny branded 

Pins will go into production AFTER the funding has ended, this may take up to 3-5 weeks depending on manufacturing and delivery times. Once received, they will be packed by hand and sent to you via Japan standard post (Standard post does not included a tracking number. A tracking number can be included for a small extra fee) Funds raised will go towards production of the pins and backing cards as well as other packing as well as Indiegogo fees. Defects are also to be considered.  Shipping is expected to be by mid September after funding and production - enough time for the Christmas holidays ;)

I will send a survey to all backers for pin selections. 

I have been informed that the designs may differ ever so slightly due to the fine details in the design.  

(please see above photos for all available designs, Features and stretch goals - colors may appear differently depending on your monitors)  

 

Risks & Challenges

As this is a 'All or Nothing' funding, the big risk is that this project will not go ahead without full funding. But of course this leaves no risk to you as you will receive a 100% refund if funding is not met. 

There may be risks with production and shipping delays or the pins differing slightly in the above designs. In case of any delays, all backers will be notified and kept up to date with progress on orders. Its estimated that pins will be shipped by 4-5weeks.

Estimated Timeline 

- July: Funding period 

- August: Production period

- September - Packed and Shipped 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help me by sharing my campaign with friends and family. With your help, we can better the chance of production for these precious little ladies xx 

lots of hugs and bunny binkies 

Gabby - Bat n'Bunny

story:
My name is Rebecca Mink (AKA Granola Blahnik)

I live for making luxury vegan shoes! I am based in Venice Beach, California.

I have spent the last 15 years making shoes in Italy. Mink is produced in the same factories as Christain Louboutin, Chanel, Jimmy choo and more. All hand made by 4th generation shoe masters. Mink is the best vegan shoe in the world!

We make vegan shoes that don't look like vegan shoes! 

We have built strong bonds with the top factories known for producing the most elite shoe brands. We are focused on creating the highest quality, sustainable, fashionable and comfortable vegan shoes available today.


                    

This is my partner Luca Villani (AKA Italian master)

Luca lives for making a shoe come to life! He is based in Florence, Italy.

Luca and I met over 7 years ago when I was on my last night in Florence after visiting the factories. We had a great creative and strong connection. I knew he was something very special. I asked him to be my translator on my next visit. Upon my return we reunited. We walked into the first factory of the day that produces Christian Louboutin and Luca came to life. It is then I realized Luca had worked in the fashion industry around Florence for over 20 years and was a master shoemaker himself. The rest is Mink history. 


THE STORY:

We are resourceful survivors! We wanted to put every penny we made back in our company.  My partner Luca Villani designed his first full collection and worked on custom production in ITALY while I worked diligently on expanding and growing the company in the VENICE BEACH this season.

The results are here to see. A gorgeous collection for Spring ONE 2016 offered to you at an affordable price direct from the factories in Italy.


         

WHY INDIEGOGO?:

We have completed a successful campaign before to benefit Mercy For Animals (we LUV them!!) and we enjoyed promoting animal welfare and connecting people to the cause and why we do this. We received fabulous support from the vegan community!

We really like the Indiegogo model because it helps our community share. There are people all around this planet that want quality vegan shoes. We want them to know they can custom order direct from our factories.

Offering your size, style and color is never a problem with a custom preorder. This Indiegogo is focused on giving you the opportunity to custom order the exact shoe you want from our collection. Right now!


                                



LET ME BE HONEST:

Making shoes is an incredible process! It is like being an architect each time you create a new style. It has to hold weight, move and fit the foot right. Then the design process has many elements. Different components are manufactured, created and sewn in sometimes over 15 factories just to make one shoe. Think about it. Look at all the different parts on the shoe on your foot now. The upper, sole and details are all manufactured in different locations. We are skilled and have this part covered. We are great at what we do. Mink shoes are made to perfection.


                    



THE PROBLEM:

Each Mink shoe collection is handmade in limited production. Having the right size and style for everyone is impossible. This is our problem. We want you to have the size and style you want. If you custom order your shoe you can get exactly what you want... and at a lower price! Win + Win for all. Basically the money from the campaign goes to make your desired shoes. Our focus is making Italian shoes affordable. You buy the shoes and we go to work making it custom preordered for you. Problem solved. That simple. 


                     



THE SOLUTION:

We need you to custom preorder your favorite shoes, share this campaign and get vegan shoes on more peoples feet then ever before in history. You can help make high quality vegan shoes available. Our goal with this  Indiegogo is to make our clients happy. Preorder now and it is possible to give you exactly what you desire!

           


THE PLANET AND THE PEOPLE: 

Mink shoes are made from recycled and organic materials, non animals glues, veggie plastics, naturally tapped rubber, cork, wood, bamboo and other sustainable materials. All Mink employees and factory workers are treated with respect and in doing so we have developed a deep unbreakable bond. We all have the passion for for making immaculate shoes with the added benefit of also being a sustainable transparent brand. 

     


            



THE ANIMALS:

A Mink shoe is proof that you do not need to harm animals to make fabulous shoes. I come from the mind of being an animal welfare activist.  I want to show people that a leather shoe is not better! It cracks in water, is reacts horribly to heat. No leather is used on a boat for this reason. Without toxic chemicals leather is biodegradable and falls apart. Non leather is superior. Why use abused animals skins!? Lets get off that strange addiction.

I have produced and sourced the best fabrics available in Italy. We have also made breathable, water proof and high performance options. We are a pioneers on a mission to prove that you do not need any animal products to make luxury goods. 


LETS DO THIS:

Mink is often looked at like a fashion company. Yes it is.. but it's roots are deep in making a lifestyle brand with no animals harmed. This is a cause you can get behind and getting fabulous shoes is a bonus. 

There is a limited window for custom ordering.  This campaign is only 15 DAYS!! 

ORDER YOUR CUSTOM MINKS NOW.....

                     


PLEASE SHARE:

We appreciate you supporting vegan shoes. Please post, tweet, email, call and shout this out to the world. Our goal is to make certain everyone can get Mink's on their feet. This is only going to be available for 15 days! 

Let everyone you know about Mink's Indigogo. 

They will thank you. It is hard to find quality vegan shoes!  Share with the world. 

No vegan left behind!

               


PERKS!!

$25 PERK ONE / GIFT CERTIFICATE >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

We have all been there.. you cannot afford to buy a shoe in the next 15 days? Well we have an opportunity for you to donate $25. now and we will put this amount toward a Mink shoe you purchase in the future. Like making a down payment on the best vegan shoe in the world now. It never expires! 



$55. PERK TWO  / MINK DOG LEASH >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

BLACK OR WHITE / hand made in Italy with gold paw charm



                 

                             




$145. PERK THREE >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

Flat espadrille black and gold 

~ Preorder NOW $145 / Retail $165 ~




PERK FOUR $165. >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

Full croc sandal white or black (both with gold) 

~ Preorder NOW $165 / Retail $185 ~





PERK FIVE $230>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

Croc medium wedge tri color 

~ Preorder  NOW $230 / Retail $250 ~




PERK SIX $169. >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

MENS (or women's) black faux leather simple espadrille 

PREORDER NOW $169 / $189 RETAIL AFTER 10 DAYS

WE HAVE THIS ONE MEN'S OPTION.. MORE ON NEXT CAMPAIGN!


PERK SEVEN $1,250. >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

The whole collection $1,250 ( $294. off retail) CHECK OUT!!

7 pairs of shoes including the mens and two dog leashes.

ALSO three shoes included that are not available to anyone else!!! 

ck out all pics below. You get every pair! :)


This next white espadrille below is not offered to anyone else! 


This next open sandal below is not offered to anyone else! 

*FINAL SHOE / GOLD CROCK HIGH WEDGE - Be the first to get it!
This next cage shoe below is not offered to anyone else! 

  
*MENS SHOE PHOTO ON PERK 6.


PERK EIGHT $2,250 >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

Custom couture shoe $2,250 ($250 off ) WE CAN MAKE YOU ANY SHOE YOU WANT VEGAN. WE CAN MAKE YOUR DREAM SHOE! 

THIS IS AN AMAZING EXPERIENCE..

WE START WITH A PHONE CALL TO COME UP WITH THE PERFECT DESIGN. THEN WE GO TO WORK MAKING YOUR VERY OWN CUSTOM SHOE. 

THAT SHOE YOU ALWAYS WANTED ...YOUR WHOLE LIFE... VEGAN!


PERK NINE $4,000. >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

One custom shoe & lessons on how to make shoes in Italy! Visit our Italian factories for 2 days going over all the aspects of making a shoe. We will take you to the best shoe factories in the world. You will learn about all aspects of making a shoe from start to finish. You will feel like an expert on Italian shoemaking before you leave.

$4,000 (INCLUDES A $2,500 CUSTOM COUTURE SHOE)

THIS IS A ONCE IN A LIFETIME OPPORTUNITY! We will take you into the factories that make Christian Louboutin, Chanel, Jimmy Choo and more ..outside Florence Italy in the hills of Tuscany. Spend 2 full days learning how luxury shoes are made!

NOONE CAN SHOW YOU WHAT WE CAN! 

Are you a shoe lover?  This is a dream come true!

*Air and hotel not included



THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING VEGAN SHOES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!


                                      


Thank you for your support! YOU are making it possible for us to offer Italian hand made vegan shoes in exactly the way you like them. We cannot wait to get Mink's on your feet. The best shoes in the world straight from Italy to your door!

OX

Rebecca Mink  and Luca Villani

www.minkshoes.com

*SIZE AND COLOR WILL BE CONFIRMED WHEN THE CAMPAIGN IS COMPLETE       THROUGH EMAIL. WE ARE HERE TO HELP YOU GET THE PERFECT FIT. YOU WILL   HEAR FROM US RIGHT AFTER THE CAMPAIGN CLOSES. 

*EXCHANGES AVAILABLE FOR ANY UNFORESEEN SIZE PROBLEMS. 

*WE GUARANTEE YOUR AS HAPPY AS THE ANIMALS YOU SAVED. VEGAN LUXE.

story:
OUR COMPAIGN IS OVER AND IF YOU HAVE MISSED THE OPPORTUNITY AT INDIEGOGO
YOU CAN STILL GET YOUR A.I.WATCH.
PRE – ORDER NOW : http://www.aiwatchtech.com


Hello Everybody,

Our daily work at the factory is intensive and in big progress surrounded by a Team highly skilled and concerned to give their best for A.I Watch.
The initial Indiegogo campaign project of A.I.Watch brings finally to ”Life“ a device that we imagined and that we fulfilled with your help and support.
We are very proud today to present you here bellow the final design of A.I Watch that have been improved and revised to make A.I Watch unique like we promised.
Thanks to all those who believed and trusted us we decided even we did not reach our goal and stretch goals to deliver to all our backers A.I Watch upgraded as follows:

1) Micro SD external memory slot

2) Battery:Lithium ion battery, 800mAh

3) Curve touch screen

4) Bluetooth 4.0

5) 5 Mpixel (720p Video Recording)

6) 2x Led Flash also can be used as a torch

7) Speaker improvement

8) Microphone improvement

9) Additional function button (Menu interface, apps menu)

10) A.I Watch UI/User Interface 2.0 improved

11) Over-the-Air (OTA) System firmware update

12) Charge entry protector

13) PCB improvement

14) Design Improvement :

Click here to Download Smartwatch comparisons Diagram.PDF File 


In the Press:

Yahoo News : A.I Watch: a standalone smartphone on your wrist

Gadget Review : Why carry all these different devices when you can simply use one!

Le Parisien : A.I Watch, un projet de montre intelligente autonome

IGN : A.I Watch the Watch 'smart' by itself

Toms Guide : A.I Watch : la montre connectée indépendante

Phonandroid : A.I Watch, la montre intelligente de cette fin d’année ?

Airing News : A.I Watch is the latest smartwatch in town

Watch-Ru : A.I Watch – еще одни автономные умные часы

NewsTract : A.I Smart Watch

Gigaom : Meet A.I. Watch: A $279 wearable Android phone for your wrist

Phone Review : A.I Watch Android smartwatch

Crunchwear : A.I. Watch – A Watch That Is Also A Smartphone

Technodify : A.I smartwatch also works as a Android Smartphone

The Smart Watch Review : There is a new Android smartwatch in town – the AI Watch

Nero Magazine : A.I Watch Android Powered Smart Watch


Welcome to A.I Watch® world: 

A world of style, simplicity and Art Technologies:

A.I Watch® Smartwatch today innovating the world of Wearable Technologies with the 2 most advanced smartwatches in the world (AI8286S and AI9286 “ULTRA) and innovating the world of Fashion, combining a luxury and fashionable design suitable for men and women to wear.

A.I Watch® is the world's first wearable smart watch using Android 4.4 (Kit Kat) OS, which adopts the most powerful hardware in the world on a smart watch: Quad-Core 1.3GHz processor (AI8286S) or Octa Core 1.7GHz (AI9286 ULTRA) and it's also supports GSM Quad Band and Three Band 3G network.

Not only can it achieve common smart watch function which is often called phone companion functions, but the A.I Watch® is completely independent to any device and also fully-equipped with high end smart phone features and it can use an ordinary Micro SIM card, built-in GPS, WiFi, Camera, Micro SD Slot and many other hardware configuration. As it is a real wearable smart phone, it can get access to the Google Play Store (Android Market) to download and install thousands of applications.

The processing power in A.I Watch Smart Watch will allow you to catch up on your social news, posts, Tweets, Instant messages, chat with your friend on Facebook, emails, SMS – anytime, anywhere, check your heart rate with Smart Camera heart rate , listen music or FM radio, voice notifications, voice translator, check the weather, navigate or localise yourself with the GPS in Google maps, GPS Alert (SOS), fitness companion or simply surf the web, you can even take pictures with the 5mpx A.I Watch camera and share them with the world.

A.I Watch Smart Watch is a fully functioning 3G smartphone on your wrist with a micro Sim Card wich runs Android 4.4 KitKat much like today’s latest High End Smartphones and Tablets With the 3G and Wifi connections you will be connected everywhere to receive calls or make a call straight from your A.I Watch Smart Watch by dialling the number,Selecting a contact from your address book or even by voice control with A.I voice instructor; just shake your wrist and A.I Watch Smart Watch will come to life and enjoy the full experience of A.I Watch Smart Watch with A.I app Store, a dedicated app store, all without the need for Bluetooth-tethering, allow you leaving your life smart and be free, to do whatever you do best, in every field of your life.


Differences between smart watches first generation and A.I Watch®:

Normal smart watch is a Bluetooth external device of an ordinary smart phone, its predecessor is Bluetooth Watch (phone companion).

Normal smart watch via Bluetooth protocol to connect with ordinary smartphone, which can also sync the phone for text messaging, email, photos, music and so on. 

Bluetooth watches and smart watches generally use Bluetooth solution or tablet program, but A.I Watch® uses smart operating system, so it can download and install a variety of applications software.

● Normal Smart Watch: itself is an external device of Bluetooth, using Bluetooth or tablet program.

✔A.I Watch® : itself is a fully independent smart watch.

● Normal smart watch: cannot support GPRS and SIM card, no RF circuit and also without GSM antenna.

✔A.I Watch® : Support GPRS and SIM cards, built-in RF circuit and GSM (WCDMA) antenna.

● Normal smart watch: generally without speaker, handset and other electro-acoustic devices, and there is no GPS, other functions and hardware.

✔A.I Watch® : have standard speaker, handset and other electro-acoustic devices, more convenient for user to answer the call, and with built-in GPS, G-Sensor and so on.

● Normal smart watch: cannot be separated as a terminal to connect the network server for data transmission and management.

✔A.I Watch® : can be used as an independent terminal to connect the server, can be applied to a variety of industries for development.


A.I Watch® delivers you an easy and unbelievable experience:

You just touch the A.I Watch® screen and an unbelievable experience starts.

It is a fully functioning 3G smartphone with a micro Sim Card which runs Android 4.4 (Kit Kat) much like today's latest smartphones and tablets. 

The processing power in A.I Watch will allow you to receive calls, caller Id, make a call straight from your A.I Watch® by dialing the number, selecting a contact from your address book or even by voice control with A.I voice instructor; just shake your wrist and A.I Watch will come to life.

You can also receive and send your SMS directly from your A.I Watch, download apps from the Google Play Store, stream videos on Youtube, listen music or FM radio, voice notifications, voice translator, chat with your friends on Facebook, catch up on news, check the weather, receive emails, navigate or localise yourself with the GPS in Google maps, GPS Alert (SOS), check your heart rate with Smart Camera heart rate, fitness companion,or simply surf the web, you can even take pictures with the camera and share them with the world.

With the 3G and WIFI connections you will be connected online everywhere.

A.I virtual assistant:

A.I Virtual assistant was created as a concept of the future, and how we will interact with virtual intelligence. 

We are fascinated by having our own artificially intelligent companion. 

You might remember Hal, Holly or Kit and we are heading toward this becoming a reality, as a custom and dedicated build of the application utter! A.I Virtual assistant allows you to configure your own voice commands and responses, so your virtual assistant can be as smart and individual as you make it. The growing intelligence of the application will be powered by its user-base, allowing for interactions and knowledgeable responses far beyond the scope of other assistants. These responses can be submitted and updated in real time by every user, to every user, all over the world, providing an infinite wealth of knowledge to all. 

The future is closer than you think...

A.I Watch Smartwatch - A.I Assistant in action :


A.I Watch® Features:

● Support Google Play Store (Android Market) mass application download (maps, navigation, E-mail, Voice Translator, Voice Notifications, etc., as well as various office applications and games).

● Built-in gravity sensor (G-Sensor) shake your hand to see the time, shake your hand to change watch face and offers a variety of sensors and hardware expansion interface, applicable for the development for every industry such as medical, health, sports, RFID, NFC, etc...

● Highly integrated product, dimensions similar to an ordinary watch, very small but very intelligent with a very high-end smart phones configurations.

● High rigidity aluminum alloy case with safe silicone strap or Leather, lightweight to wear, comfortable and safe.

● Water Resistant

● High speed Quad-Core 1.3GHz processor, support 3G, enjoy high-speed experience.

● GSM quad band + WCDMA (3G), workable all over the world.

● Using Android 4.3/4.4 OS with pure curve capacitive screen, showing HD vision and intelligence experience.

● Ergonomic design, variety of colors, various watch Faces interface (Shake option), suitable and fashionable for men and women to wear.

● Ultra-low power consumption, the standby time can be up to 100 hours.



A.I Watch® is the first Android 4.4 (Kit Kat) smart watch prototype ever built

Easy multitasking, rich notifications, customizable home screens, resizable widgets, and deep interactivity that adds powerful new ways of communicating and sharing.

Custom Dials with Downloadable Watch faces, Weather, Calculator, Calendar, Gmail, Email, FM Radio, Stop Watch, Music application, Health Tracker, A.I Voice Commands, Time zones, Sport and Fitness, GPS distance measurment, Google Maps, GPS SOS and many others await you in Google play store.

Customize your A.I Watch® with Fashion & Style:

Call ID, receive or make calls:

Threaded SMS are inbuilt. 

You can even connect your VoIP provider!

A.I Watch® is the best friend of your favorite social networks:

A.I Watch® most advanced smart watch in the world notifies you of any updates that you receive but also you can reply, write a Facebook status, Tweet or even take a picture and share it in Instagram without having to use the smartphone. 

The first smart watch that have full social networks features:

Facebook app and Twitter do not support a 1.54 inch screen yet so we worked a lot to adapt Facebook and Twitter apps on A.I watch with low battery consumption, less memory consumption, Better interface and more features.

Facebook:

Twitter

* Full set of Twitter functionality: Tweet, Retweet, Direct Message, @Mention, lists

SMS/MMS

A.I Watch notify you by vibration, sound or even voice. 

You can read or Send directly SMS or MMS from A.I watch.

A.I Alert

A.I Watch® gives you a brief vibrating nudge, ringtone or voice notify to inform you about missed calls, new messages, emails or social network notification. 

Smart Notification

Smart notification displays non-intrusive notification banners for any app on your device include Facebook,Twitter etc...

You can swipe the notification to the right to dismiss it, to the left to dismiss all notifications, or click it to launch it.

A.I Voice Notification

Voice notification announces status bar notification messages like Facebook notification include Messages,Twitter etc....

Voice Translator

Two language voice translation of the dialogue mode

(Real-time translation Secretary)

• recognize the voice input, automatic generation of text read aloud the translation results

(Voice translation-to-speech)

Connections and Networks:

A.I Watch® can be connected to many devices like Bluetooth headset to listen music, to receive or make calls or even Bluetooth speaker to listen music with your friends

Wi-Fi Direct and Bluetooth HDP:

A.I Watch® also support Wi-Fi Direct lets you connect directly to nearby peer devices over Wi-Fi, for more reliable, higher-speed communication. No internet connection or tethering is needed. Through third-party apps, you can connect to compatible devices to take advantage of new features such as instant sharing of files, photos, or other media; streaming video or audio from another device; or connecting to compatible printers or other devices.

Also introduces built-in support for connecting to Bluetooth health Device profile (HDP) devices. With support from third-party apps, you can connect to wireless medical devices and sensors in hospitals, fitness centers, homes, and elsewhere.

GPS  Alert (SOS):

Because we think every smart watch need it!

GPS Alert (SOS) : can offer in time and efficient emergency help.

GPS Positioning System ➞ Track the A.I Watch position anytime.

SOS with one press ➞ Call for help with only one press, then you can instantly get the help seeker’s location by mobile phone or computer.

Sport and fitness: 

Because A.I Watch® also cares about your well-being


GPS distance measurement: 

With GPS function, no matter where you are, it can offer you with accurate position information and sports distance measurement and much more

The GPS sensor in A.I Watch® record geographic and velocity statistics, but the app also syncs with third-party biometric sensors.

Smart Camera heart rate monitor for healthy sports:

Heart rate monitor uses A.I Watch® built-in camera to take pictures of your fingertip and calculate your heart's rhythm.

Measure your heart rate

It's never been easier to know what your heart rate is! Without any external hardware, just using the built-in camera of your A.I Watch® you can get accurate readings almost instantly.

Google Maps:

Explore new places, discover local favorites, and navigate your world with Google Maps


Stop Watch:

Stopwatch helps you in your everyday-life by making timing easy and simple. With its simple and stylish interface you have a both stable and stylish timing toolkit that can help your running track or make your eggs absolutely perfect

Health tracker:

Health tracker lets you monitor your daily habits in a very simple way. No crazy calorie counting. No specific metrics to monitor. Rather than focusing on just one aspect of your life - such as calories consumed or miles logged - the app takes a holistic approach, letting you track and micro-journal about four pillars of self-care: Nutrition Exercise Sleep Balance (AKA Stress Management) Rate yourself on a simple 1-to-5 scale each day and "connect the dots" for your healthiest self. Stats can be viewed in daily, weekly and monthly formats. Share your information with your loved ones and health providers, if you want. Gain insight into your health and lifestyle. Work on your weak pillars to... become the perfectly healthy person your body wants you to be.


Hardware, Prototype Progression and Design:

Hardware:

A.I Watch® is the most powerful Smart Watch workable prototype.

A.I Watch® is the world's first wearable smart watch using Android 4.4 (Kit Kat) OS, which adopts the most powerful hardware in the world on a smart watch: Quad-Core 1.3GHz processor (AI8286S) or Octa Core 1.7GHz (AI9286 ULTRA) and it's also supports GSM Quad Band and Three Band 3G network.

We’ve tried to think of everything to make your A.I Watch® experience as intuitive and powerful as possible so we’ve packed as much technology into this tiny device as humanly possible by combining the best hardware and software together. 

Below are the technical specs of A.I Watch®


SPECIFICATIONS:

  • Processor : Quad Core 1.3GHz / Octa Core 1.7 GHz
  • O.S : UI 2.0 / Android 4.2.2 / 4.4 (Kit Kat)
  • Network : GSM, WCDMA (3G)
  • Frequency : GSM 850/900/1800/1900 
  • Frequency : WCDMA (3G) 850/1900/2100 MHZ (workable all over the world)
  • Flash : Ram: 1GB 
  • Rom : 8GB
  • Micro SD slot - up to 128GB
  • Display : 1.54, RGB 240*240 dots
  • Touch Screen : Curve Touch Screen
  • Speaker : 1208 Speaker/Headphone 2 in 1
  • Microphone : 4015
  • Bluetooth 4 : Support Bluetooth Stereo Headset, support video audio; Support data transfer and receive; Support calling via Bluetooth Headset
  • Camera : 5 Megapixel (720p video recording)
  • USB Port : Micro 7 pin port: downloading, charging, data transfer and headset use (4 in 1)
  • Antenna : GSM+ Bluetooth + GPS +WIFI antenna inside
  • Vibration motor : Yes
  • Gravity Sensor : Acelerometer, E-Compass, Gyroscope
  • Battery : Lithium ion battery, 800mAh
  • GPRS : Support
  • Internet use : Support
  • WIFI : Support
  • GPS : Support
  • Media : Mp3, Mp4 Support
  • FM : Support
  • Voice Recording : Support
  • SMS/MMS : Support
  • Hands Free : Support

First A.I Watch® concept sketch:

A.I Watch® concept start getting life in 3D:


First generation A.I Watch® assembled board:

After more than 200 tests from our teams around the world we got better ideas for our prototype to gain space in the watch, increase hardware, add more features and save battery consumption.

So we got a brilliant idea to gain space : Why not building in the bracelet the speaker and the Micro Sim Card reader, so we start to review all the hardware, design to pack as much technology into the A.I Watch® as humanly possible by combining the best hardware and software together. 

This is the result of more than one year of hard work:

After a lot of tests on our prototype, then definitely it was build and working.

We had now to finalize the design of our A.I Watch, it was a very important part in the A.I Watch® development; We love fashion and luxuries designs but also our goals was to develop a smart watch that looks like a watch.

After we start working on the bracelet; we checked different materials; some time just to feel the touch of them : PU, silicone (More than 10 different qualities), leather etc...

We were determinate to use the best materials to custom our A.I Watch and finally we decided for a high quality TPU bracelet with a smooth feeling.

Now we reach the point of the most exciting part of our adventure: 

The assembling parts:

A.I Watch® board assembled in a aluminium case


Design and A.I Watch® collections:

✔A.I Watch® Love Fashion and Luxuries designs

➤ Sports & Fashion Design a collection full of colors and full of LIFE

 We call it “LA Vie"

A.I Watch® come in an elegant aluminium watch case and a fashion high quality silicone bracelet:  

The colors available for "La Vie" collection are : Red, Blue, Yellow, Orange, Black, White and Pink.


➤ LA Vie collection Gold Plated 

Colors Available : Black, White and Pink.


➤ The Luxury Tech Collection "It's art if it can't be explained"

The A.I Watch® come with an elegant leather bracelet and an aluminium case.

The colors available are : Black, Brown and Blue Lagoona.


➤ Black edition : The most advanced smartwatch in the world in a special all Black Edition 


Where we’re at

What we are showing in the video is a real-working prototype close to the manufactured product.

These are the result of a number of prototypes tested before them;

We have worked hard on our smartwatch prototypes to improve the quality up to the optimization of each of the components and will continue that way until complete satisfaction of our Smart Watch.

We will be revising our designs to simplify manufacturing and increase the robustness of the manufactured version.

The revision we plan on doing will tackle key issues like making the product in complete concordance with our specifications ensuring that every product that come out is of the highest standard of quality.

We are already in discussions with several potential manufacturers partners, but we need to have final numbers for our initial manufacturing run before those talks can continue.

Why do we need your help?

We’ve been working on A.I Watch® for over 1 year now. 

The A.I Watch® that you see in the video is a real working prototype.

With your support, we can bring A.I Watch® onto wrists worldwide. 

We also need your help to spread the word about A.I Watch® You'll be amongst the first to have one so you can tell your friends and the whole world too.

While we're close to entering production, your contribution will help fund:

- Production tooling

- Large component order

- Apps development

Estimated Timeline:

  • September-October 2013: Indiegogo campaign, Interface improvement, prototype Improvement, Apps development.
  • October- November: Prototype Improvement and certification 
  • November 2013 - Starting delivery A.I Watch® rooted version to developers 
  • November 2013 - Production improvement, last steps before starting first production
  • December 2013 - Volume production begins.


Our Team

Swissco Ltd was created with for object to develop wearable technologies. 
Swissco Ltd has the challenge to bring to his customers the newest High-tech products, thus in cooperation with several well-known and famous manufacturers all over the world. 
We believe in making a difference. 
Swissco Ltd stands for quality, innovation, and a sense of competitive challenges. 
We are also able to draw on talented people from throughout the group structure. Our team features experts in different fields located in ENGLAND, FRANCE, USA and  China.  

Damien DOUK is a French talented designer and developer of High-Tech, watches and smart phones as well as in jewelry were also here he proved his talent. With his experience as engineer developer and designer for more then 6 years in this field, he decided to create a Smart Watch that will be completely independent to any device. Today he has in charge the high-tech department and the development of the A.I Watch project. 

He is working on this project for more then one year together with a team including engineers all over the world specialized in technical development, data system, wireless technologies, computer and also design. 
Today the A.I Watch® prototype is in complete compliance and we are very proud to launch the project through Indiegogo platform showing and demonstrating our complete workable smart watch prototype.

Risks and challenges

After more than one year of research and development, we have now fully functional prototypes in-hand. This is the result of meticulous care in design, development and in selecting the highest caliber components and manufacturing partners.

There are always significant challenges in manufacturing and delivering any electronics product at scale. Mass manufacturing isn't the same as prototype development, we have to make sure they are secure and reliable, and also most importantly that they can be manufactured efficiently at mass volumes as any product. Supply chain logistics can potentially impact parts delivery. Additionally, delays may result from final detailing and testing lab procedures and certifications.

Our challenge is your satisfaction and for this we will work hard to bring to all of you, High-Tech Fans and lovers, our A.I Watch® a powerful smart watch with the latest hardware and software technologies combined together in a beautiful design.

Thank you all for your support.

Differences between smart watches first generation and A.I Watch®:
Normal smart watch is a Bluetooth external device of an ordinary smart phone, its predecessor is Bluetooth Watch (phone companion).
Normal smart watch via Bluetooth protocol to connect with ordinary smartphone, which can also sync the phone for text messaging, email, photos, music and so on. 
Bluetooth watches and smart watches generally use Bluetooth solution or tablet program, but A.I Watch® uses smart operating system, so it can download and install a variety of applications software.
● Normal Smart Watch: itself is an external device of Bluetooth, using Bluetooth or tablet program.
✔A.I Watch® : itself is a fully independent smart watch.
● Normal smart watch: cannot support GPRS and SIM card, no RF circuit and also without GSM antenna.
✔A.I Watch® : Support GPRS and SIM cards, built-in RF circuit and GSM (WCDMA) antenna.
● Normal smart watch: generally without speaker, handset and other electro-acoustic devices, and there is no GPS, other functions and hardware.
✔A.I Watch® : have standard speaker, handset and other electro-acoustic devices, more convenient for user to answer the call, and with built-in GPS, G-Sensor and so on.
● Normal smart watch: cannot be separated as a terminal to connect the network server for data transmission and management.
✔A.I Watch® : can be used as an independent terminal to connect the server, can be applied to a variety of industries for development.
