A.I Watch® interface 2.0 : 

A smart watch was never so simple to use but also with infinite modules and themes to change:
A.I UI 2.0/ USER INTERFACE 2.0 make it easy (self exploratory), efficient and enjoyable (user friendly) to operate A.I Watch in the way wich produces the desired result and the most convenient to use on a Smartwatch.
Customize your A.I Watch® with Fashion & Style:
You can customize your A.I Watch® with themes, launcher, watch faces, widgets, apps shortcuts.
You have unlimited possibilities to turn your A.I watch® to a unique piece of Art Technology.


UI (User Interface) 2.0 on A.I Watch Prototype:


Screen Customization Features:


● You can add different size tiles


● You can add a variety of color tile



● You can save and restore the theme


● You can edit the start screen layout

● You can set the current background style


● You can switch the application list style



● You can add Android widgets in the tiles



● You can set style lock screen and status bar



● You can select more than one hundred kinds of theme colors



● You can add special features tiles, like time, pictures and contact photo

Get your style with watchfaces :




Welcome to the future, Where your body is technology's new frontier

Watch face Example :








Call ID, receive or make calls:





With the power of Android, all your contacts are available, and you can call them directly with a tap on your wrist. Use the speakerphone and mic that are inbuilt on the bracelet, or connect a bluetooth headset and talk away! 
The micro sim goes in the left of the smart watch. 
Threaded SMS are inbuilt. 
You can even connect your VoIP provider!




A.I Watch® is the best friend of your favorite social networks:



A.I Watch® most advanced smart watch in the world notifies you of any updates that you receive but also you can reply, write a Facebook status, Tweet or even take a picture and share it in Instagram without having to use the smartphone. 


The first smart watch that have full social networks features:

Facebook app and Twitter do not support a 1.54 inch screen yet so we worked a lot to adapt Facebook and Twitter apps on A.I watch with low battery consumption, less memory consumption, Better interface and more features.

Bellow are all the features tested and working on our latest prototype: 


Facebook:



Main features:

• Access to Facebook© full news feed
• Send, share, like and comment contents
• Chat and manage private messages
• Search friends, people, pages and everything else 
• Update status, Upload photos and videos
• Access to Groups and Pages 
• Multi accounts
• Facebook© photos download 
• Customize Facebook© background
• Customize Facebook© News Disposition





Twitter



Main features:

* Background notifications alert you of new Direct Messages and @Mentions
* Easily manage multiple Twitter accounts
* Choose from light or battery-saving dark color themes
* View threaded conversations all in one place to easily keep track of who said what
* Full set of Twitter functionality: Tweet, Retweet, Direct Message, @Mention, lists
* Offers photo previews right in your Twitter timeline
SMS/MMS



A.I Watch notify you by vibration, sound or even voice. 

You can read or Send directly SMS or MMS from A.I watch.
A.I Alert
A.I Watch® gives you a brief vibrating nudge, ringtone or voice notify to inform you about missed calls, new messages, emails or social network notification. 
Smart Notification
Smart notification displays non-intrusive notification banners for any app on your device include Facebook,Twitter etc...


You can swipe the notification to the right to dismiss it, to the left to dismiss all notifications, or click it to launch it.




A.I Voice Notification


Voice notification announces status bar notification messages like Facebook notification include Messages,Twitter etc....




Voice Translator


Two language voice translation of the dialogue mode

(Real-time translation Secretary)
• recognize the voice input, automatic generation of text read aloud the translation results
(Voice translation-to-speech)
• Simultaneous Multi-language translation
• More than 50 languages



Connections and Networks:


A.I Watch® can be connected to many devices like Bluetooth headset to listen music, to receive or make calls or even Bluetooth speaker to listen music with your friends
Wi-Fi Direct and Bluetooth HDP:
A.I Watch® also support Wi-Fi Direct lets you connect directly to nearby peer devices over Wi-Fi, for more reliable, higher-speed communication. No internet connection or tethering is needed. Through third-party apps, you can connect to compatible devices to take advantage of new features such as instant sharing of files, photos, or other media; streaming video or audio from another device; or connecting to compatible printers or other devices.

Also introduces built-in support for connecting to Bluetooth health Device profile (HDP) devices. With support from third-party apps, you can connect to wireless medical devices and sensors in hospitals, fitness centers, homes, and elsewhere.


GPS  Alert (SOS):
Because we think every smart watch need it!
GPS Alert (SOS) : can offer in time and efficient emergency help.
GPS Positioning System ➞ Track the A.I Watch position anytime.
SOS with one press ➞ Call for help with only one press, then you can instantly get the help seeker’s location by mobile phone or computer.
Sport and fitness: 
Because A.I Watch® also cares about your well-being





GPS distance measurement: 

With GPS function, no matter where you are, it can offer you with accurate position information and sports distance measurement and much more


The GPS sensor in A.I Watch® record geographic and velocity statistics, but the app also syncs with third-party biometric sensors.









Smart Camera heart rate monitor for healthy sports:


Heart rate monitor uses A.I Watch® built-in camera to take pictures of your fingertip and calculate your heart's rhythm.
Measure your heart rate



It's never been easier to know what your heart rate is! Without any external hardware, just using the built-in camera of your A.I Watch® you can get accurate readings almost instantly.
Google Maps:
Explore new places, discover local favorites, and navigate your world with Google Maps





Stop Watch:


Stopwatch helps you in your everyday-life by making timing easy and simple. With its simple and stylish interface you have a both stable and stylish timing toolkit that can help your running track or make your eggs absolutely perfect


Health tracker:
Health tracker lets you monitor your daily habits in a very simple way. No crazy calorie counting. No specific metrics to monitor. Rather than focusing on just one aspect of your life - such as calories consumed or miles logged - the app takes a holistic approach, letting you track and micro-journal about four pillars of self-care: Nutrition Exercise Sleep Balance (AKA Stress Management) Rate yourself on a simple 1-to-5 scale each day and "connect the dots" for your healthiest self. Stats can be viewed in daily, weekly and monthly formats. Share your information with your loved ones and health providers, if you want. Gain insight into your health and lifestyle. Work on your weak pillars to... become the perfectly healthy person your body wants you to be.



Hardware, Prototype Progression and Design:

Hardware:
A.I Watch® is the most powerful Smart Watch workable prototype.
A.I Watch® is the world's first wearable smart watch using Android 4.4 (Kit Kat) OS, which adopts the most powerful hardware in the world on a smart watch: Quad-Core 1.3GHz processor (AI8286S) or Octa Core 1.7GHz (AI9286 ULTRA) and it's also supports GSM Quad Band and Three Band 3G network.
We’ve tried to think of everything to make your A.I Watch® experience as intuitive and powerful as possible so we’ve packed as much technology into this tiny device as humanly possible by combining the best hardware and software together. 
Below are the technical specs of A.I Watch®




SPECIFICATIONS:

Processor : Quad Core 1.3GHz / Octa Core 1.7 GHz
O.S : UI 2.0 / Android 4.2.2 / 4.4 (Kit Kat)
Network : GSM, WCDMA (3G)
Frequency : GSM 850/900/1800/1900 
Frequency : WCDMA (3G) 850/1900/2100 MHZ (workable all over the world)
Flash : Ram: 1GB 
Rom : 8GB
Micro SD slot - up to 128GB
Display : 1.54, RGB 240*240 dots
Touch Screen : Curve Touch Screen
Speaker : 1208 Speaker/Headphone 2 in 1
Microphone : 4015
Bluetooth 4 : Support Bluetooth Stereo Headset, support video audio; Support data transfer and receive; Support calling via Bluetooth Headset
Camera : 5 Megapixel (720p video recording)
USB Port : Micro 7 pin port: downloading, charging, data transfer and headset use (4 in 1)
Antenna : GSM+ Bluetooth + GPS +WIFI antenna inside
Vibration motor : Yes
Gravity Sensor : Acelerometer, E-Compass, Gyroscope
Battery : Lithium ion battery, 800mAh
GPRS : Support
Internet use : Support
WIFI : Support
GPS : Support
Media : Mp3, Mp4 Support
FM : Support
Voice Recording : Support
SMS/MMS : Support
Hands Free : Support

AnTuTu Benchmark test Note of A.I Watch latest prototype:

Prototype progression and design:
First A.I Watch® concept sketch:



A.I Watch® concept start getting life in 3D:









First generation A.I Watch® assembled board:After more than 200 tests from our teams around the world we got better ideas for our prototype to gain space in the watch, increase hardware, add more features and save battery consumption.So we got a brilliant idea to gain space : Why not building in the bracelet the speaker and the Micro Sim Card reader, so we start to review all the hardware, design to pack as much technology into the A.I Watch® as humanly possible by combining the best hardware and software together. This is the result of more than one year of hard work:After a lot of tests on our prototype, then definitely it was build and working.We had now to finalize the design of our A.I Watch, it was a very important part in the A.I Watch® development; We love fashion and luxuries designs but also our goals was to develop a smart watch that looks like a watch.After we start working on the bracelet; we checked different materials; some time just to feel the touch of them : PU, silicone (More than 10 different qualities), leather etc...We were determinate to use the best materials to custom our A.I Watch and finally we decided for a high quality TPU bracelet with a smooth feeling.Now we reach the point of the most exciting part of our adventure: The assembling parts:A.I Watch® board assembled in a aluminium caseDesign and A.I Watch® collections:✔A.I Watch® Collections was designed in France✔A.I Watch® Love Fashion and Luxuries designs✔A.I Watch® was designed for both Men and Women.➤ Sports & Fashion Design a collection full of colors and full of LIFE We call it “LA Vie"A.I Watch® come in an elegant aluminium watch case and a fashion high quality silicone bracelet:  The colors available for "La Vie" collection are : Red, Blue, Yellow, Orange, Black, White and Pink.
➤ LA Vie collection Gold Plated 
Colors Available : Black, White and Pink.➤ The Luxury Tech Collection "It's art if it can't be explained"The A.I Watch® come with an elegant leather bracelet and an aluminium case.The colors available are : Black, Brown and Blue Lagoona.
➤ Black edition : The most advanced smartwatch in the world in a special all Black Edition 
Where we’re atWhat we are showing in the video is a real-working prototype close to the manufactured product.These are the result of a number of prototypes tested before them;We have worked hard on our smartwatch prototypes to improve the quality up to the optimization of each of the components and will continue that way until complete satisfaction of our Smart Watch.We will be revising our designs to simplify manufacturing and increase the robustness of the manufactured version.The revision we plan on doing will tackle key issues like making the product in complete concordance with our specifications ensuring that every product that come out is of the highest standard of quality.We are already in discussions with several potential manufacturers partners, but we need to have final numbers for our initial manufacturing run before those talks can continue.Why do we need your help?We’ve been working on A.I Watch® for over 1 year now. The A.I Watch® that you see in the video is a real working prototype.With your support, we can bring A.I Watch® onto wrists worldwide. We also need your help to spread the word about A.I Watch® You'll be amongst the first to have one so you can tell your friends and the whole world too.While we're close to entering production, your contribution will help fund:- Production tooling- Large component order- Apps developmentEstimated Timeline:
September-October 2013: Indiegogo campaign, Interface improvement, prototype Improvement, Apps development.
October- November: Prototype Improvement and certification 
November 2013 - Starting delivery A.I Watch® rooted version to developers 
November 2013 - Production improvement, last steps before starting first production
December 2013 - Volume production begins.
Our TeamSwissco Ltd was created with for object to develop wearable technologies. Swissco Ltd has the challenge to bring to his customers the newest High-tech products, thus in cooperation with several well-known and famous manufacturers all over the world. We believe in making a difference. Swissco Ltd stands for quality, innovation, and a sense of competitive challenges. We are also able to draw on talented people from throughout the group structure. Our team features experts in different fields located in ENGLAND, FRANCE, USA and  China.  Damien DOUK is a French talented designer and developer of High-Tech, watches and smart phones as well as in jewelry were also here he proved his talent. With his experience as engineer developer and designer for more then 6 years in this field, he decided to create a Smart Watch that will be completely independent to any device. Today he has in charge the high-tech department and the development of the A.I Watch project. He is working on this project for more then one year together with a team including engineers all over the world specialized in technical development, data system, wireless technologies, computer and also design. Today the A.I Watch® prototype is in complete compliance and we are very proud to launch the project through Indiegogo platform showing and demonstrating our complete workable smart watch prototype.Risks and challengesAfter more than one year of research and development, we have now fully functional prototypes in-hand. This is the result of meticulous care in design, development and in selecting the highest caliber components and manufacturing partners.There are always significant challenges in manufacturing and delivering any electronics product at scale. Mass manufacturing isn't the same as prototype development, we have to make sure they are secure and reliable, and also most importantly that they can be manufactured efficiently at mass volumes as any product. Supply chain logistics can potentially impact parts delivery. Additionally, delays may result from final detailing and testing lab procedures and certifications.Our challenge is your satisfaction and for this we will work hard to bring to all of you, High-Tech Fans and lovers, our A.I Watch® a powerful smart watch with the latest hardware and software technologies combined together in a beautiful design.Thank you all for your support.

story:
YOU DO NOT HAVE TO BE A CERTAIN SKIN TONE TO FIND GREAT COSMETICS

 

                                    

Too many times people of color that have a  passion for makeup have been told that they’re either “too dark to look good in red lipstick”; should not wear bold colored cosmetics because, “that’s GHETTO” or “HOOD”—or altogether cannot participate in the beauty industry because they cannot find quality products to show up on their skin without appearing “ashy” or “ghostly”.

Pound Cake is a cosmetics brand that is creating authentic products for people of various skin tones AND undertones. Our first line into the market are five different red, retro matte lipsticks that coincide with skin tones: light, medium, warm, deep, and rich. The entire collection is called, HOT CAKES—and it’s just that—hot, fiery reds that every person of color can wear confidently and not be afraid that they’re “too dark” to look beautiful in our products.

 

Pound Cake Featured in:

 

 

 

       IF YOU LOVE MAKEUP, YOU NEED TO #POUNDCAKE

 

MOOD

Bothered by the current beauty industry standards: fairer skin, only offering limiting foundation colors, using offensive product names such as “Typo,” just creating one type of lipstick, thinking it will show up the same on darker skin—the list goes on and on… the Pound Cake team decided to challenge these stigmas and create the first ever batch of matte lipsticks made for your lip tone.

WE'RE INTRODUCING:

 

The Hot Cakes Collection is a line of five, red, retro-matte lipsticks designed to show up on your specific skin tone. 

 

HOW IT WORKS

 

 

                               

                               

We’re creating with our cosmetic chemist, five different red, matte lipsticks to show up as the desired red for your skin tone. Our suggestions, are just suggestions below. You are more than welcome to order any of the lipsticks below or the entire Hot Cakes Collection!

 

WHY DO WE POUND CAKE?

pound cake

/ˈpoun(d) ˌkāk/

Noun North American

Cake represents the current beauty industry: non-inclusive to ALL POC’s of darker skin tones, while forcing us to adhere to European standards of beauty. We are here to disrupt and POUND that…thus providing you a new type of cake: pound cake.

 

BUDGET BREAKDOWN FOR OUR BACKERS:

Cosmetic Formulation - $10K

Casing and Packaging - $5K 

Shipping and Handling - $5K

 

We have been working smart and working hard over the past year and half to secure relationships with our amazing cosmetic formulation partners! Nonetheless, we are aware that there are always risks when launching a new product.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Help get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Don’t forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

If we surpass our initial goals and projections, additional funding will allow for the development of a new wave of cosmetic products to cater to more people of color such as foundations, blushes, and eye shadows.

story:
The ITR One Backpack is a complete overhaul of the everyday backpack. With the Advanced Modular System that can uniquely adapt for every aspect of your life by changing its compartments. You can switch it to your camera bag, work & gym pack, suit carry bag, travel pack or use it as a tech-backpack. A real everyday backpack that truly connects with you.

 

ITR One backpack prototype first look by Bo Ismono

ITR One backpack prototype first look by Willie Morris

ITR One backpack Sling Module review by One Tech Traveller

 
 

Skip ahead to: Backpack | Camera Module | Sport Module | Sling Module  | Suit Carry Module | Pouch Module | External Strap System |  How to Back | FAQs

This video explains all the features of the One backpack and each module.  

Photography Combo

Daily Carry Combo

Urban Professional Combo

Work & Gym Combo

How to get them? 

Become a backer of this project and pick a reward. You will essentially be pre-ordering one of our new bags with a special backer discount, and you'll receive your stuff before it is available in stores. Want to build your own setting? Check out All Rewards & Add-ons. Still confused? Check out How to Back this Project.

Use our Add-On Pledge Calculator for quick math. (please pledge base on the price show in the calculator)

The early bird offer is very limited. If you can’t decide which modules you want, don't worry. You can pledge just the backpack first and purchase add-ons or upgrade to combo after the campaign ends with the same Kickstarter price.

How Does The One Backpack Modular System Work?

Powered by Fidlock, the easy-to-use instant secure magnetic hardware, The One Backpack provides slick modularity through the magnetic system that quickly and securely attaches modules to the pack. Just Click and Go. 

ITR One Backpack Features

The One Backpack is designed to be durable, functional, comfortable and stylish. Let's start with the exterior of the bag. 

It comes with a removable Magnetic Key Chain that allows you to detach when needed.  

On the inside, there are pockets for you to keep longer items such as your camera gimbal. You can also reach them from the quick access opening.  

　

Weight Management 

One of the biggest complains from backpack users is that their bag doesn't handle the weight very well, giving them back pain after a regular two hours commute a day. By attaching everything close to your back, we can distribute the weight more evenly and swift the center of gravity closer to your body, so you won’t feel you are being pulled back by the backpack and make it feel lighter. SMART, yes!

　

Durability & Comfort

The shoulder straps of a backpack are usually sewed directly to the body, and it makes the connection point a common breakpoint of a regular backpack. Some manufacturers use leather straps but they are just so painful to wear.

Using premium leather to reinforce the common breaking point of a regular backpack, we brilliantly merge a leather strap with a padded strap to provide maximum comfort without sacrificing strength. The connection points are also bolted to maximize durability. A complete overhaul backpack structure that will last a lifetime. 

Material in Details   

                                             
 

　

Camera Module Features   

Designed to store camera equipment securely and convert to a shoulder bag easily, the module cover can roll up and stay open, making it easy for you to reach your gear from the quick access opening in the front. We also added a spot for you to attach your Peak Design Capture. 

What is the Camera Module made of? 

The cover can roll up and stay open, making it easy for you to reach your gear from the quick access opening in the front.   

                                             

　

Sport Module Features

The Sport Module can hold a pair of shoes inside the washable and removable shoes bag. You can put your gym clothes in the main compartment to keep them separate from the shoes. The Sport Module makes the One Backpack perfect to hold your gym and work essentials.

What makes the Sport Module so perfect for the gym?   

The Shoes Bag inside is removable and washable, you can all attach it to the Suit Carry Module.   

                                             
 

　

Sling Module Features  

The Sling Module is designed to hold to notebook, iPad, and other everyday items. All the element define a new standard for smart organization and fast access. With the sling module, you can choose to leave your backpack behind when you don't need it and don’t even have to worry about switch bag.

The Sling Module is perfect to hold your everyday carry items.    

                                             

　

Suit Carry Module Features   

The Suit Carry Module can hold a suit or clothes inside your backpack without wrinkles. On the top of the module, you can attach the shoes bag, the Sling Module, and the Pouch module. Making it perfect for travel or to commute by bike.

What makes the Suit Carry Module so dope?   

We recommend using a hanger within 41cm width (the hanger shown in the picture is the STRKIS hanger from IKEA.   

                                             

　

Pouch Module Features   

You can use the Pouch Module to hold your water bottle and gym essentials or to use it as a dopp it and tech pouch when you travel.

What is the Pouch Module made of?    

                                             

　

2-Way Waist & Shoulder Strap
   

　

External Strap System   

The External Strap System is designed for you to attach your tripod or any cylinder shape objects to the backpack

What makes the External Strap System so strong?    

 Perfect to carry your tripod, yoga mat or many other things.   

　

Fidlock® Magnetic Water Bottle Set   

We integrated the bag with the Fidlock Water Bottle; you can attach it to the side of the backpack, shoulder strap or your bike.

MSRP is 39.99 USD

　

How to Back?   

It takes just 60 seconds…

1. Choose a reward level. 
You choose one (and only one) reward level to back this project. You cannot choose 2 reward levels. Just one. You will get all items in that reward—you cannot swap things that you don't want for things that you do want. See the FAQ for why we can't do this.

2. If you want to add something, check out the Add-On Menu.If (and only if) you want to add something additional to your reward, check out the Add-On Menu below. If it's in the Add-On Menu you can add it to your reward by increasing your pledge by the amount specified in the menu. For example, if you pledge for “One Backpack“ and want to add on a camera module, simply increase your pledge amount from HKD1088(USD139) to HKD1428(USD183) (reflecting the $44/HK$340 increase). If you can’t decide which modules you want, don't worry. You can pledge just the backpack first and purchase add-ons or upgrade to combo after the campaign ends with the same Kickstarter price. See the FAQ for further explanation.

3. Relax, you're done for now.All details like shipping information, color preference, and add-on specifics will be collected via survey after this campaign has ended.

　

Rewards and Add-Ons

　

Timeline

The Sling Module is perfect to hold your everyday carry items.    



                                                　
Suit Carry Module Features   
The Suit Carry Module can hold a suit or clothes inside your backpack without wrinkles. On the top of the module, you can attach the shoes bag, the Sling Module, and the Pouch module. Making it perfect for travel or to commute by bike.

What makes the Suit Carry Module so dope?   

We recommend using a hanger within 41cm width (the hanger shown in the picture is the STRKIS hanger from IKEA.   


                                                　
Pouch Module Features   
You can use the Pouch Module to hold your water bottle and gym essentials or to use it as a dopp it and tech pouch when you travel.

What is the Pouch Module made of?    


                                                　
2-Way Waist & Shoulder Strap   


　
External Strap System   
The External Strap System is designed for you to attach your tripod or any cylinder shape objects to the backpack

What makes the External Strap System so strong?    

 Perfect to carry your tripod, yoga mat or many other things.   


　
Fidlock® Magnetic Water Bottle Set   
We integrated the bag with the Fidlock Water Bottle; you can attach it to the side of the backpack, shoulder strap or your bike.
MSRP is 39.99 USD



　
How to Back?   
It takes just 60 seconds…
1. Choose a reward level. You choose one (and only one) reward level to back this project. You cannot choose 2 reward levels. Just one. You will get all items in that reward—you cannot swap things that you don't want for things that you do want. See the FAQ for why we can't do this.
2. If you want to add something, check out the Add-On Menu.If (and only if) you want to add something additional to your reward, check out the Add-On Menu below. If it's in the Add-On Menu you can add it to your reward by increasing your pledge by the amount specified in the menu. For example, if you pledge for “One Backpack“ and want to add on a camera module, simply increase your pledge amount from HKD1088(USD139) to HKD1428(USD183) (reflecting the $44/HK$340 increase). If you can’t decide which modules you want, don't worry. You can pledge just the backpack first and purchase add-ons or upgrade to combo after the campaign ends with the same Kickstarter price. See the FAQ for further explanation.
3. Relax, you're done for now.All details like shipping information, color preference, and add-on specifics will be collected via survey after this campaign has ended.
　
Rewards and Add-Ons

　
Timeline

story:
Our Story

 

PI5 by MKB is a brand name of my own fashion creativity in women’s RTW apparel. I don’t purpose to reinvent the fashion wheel in what is an already over saturated industry; my mission is to bring my own creative vision of what I consider to be a classy-sexy-chic woman to fashion. PI5 by MKB produces women’s apparel that is California~Business~Casual~Lifestyle~Driven, embracing a high quality standard of fashion and creativity. The PI5 label is produced and sold exclusively through selected trunk shows, boutique/home parties and special events. I have been asking for sponsors to donate $10 each for a goal of $10,000 which will allow me to pre-launch my line.

 

The Impact

 

The impact of this campaign will enable me to pre-launch a fashionable women's apparel label that delivers a strong positive message. The label, through the direct sales business model, will allow women to generate an income from home-helping to build families.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

This campaign will allow me to create samples and host a pre-launch fashion show to get feedback on the designs from random fashionable women, and go on to produce, promote, operate and sell the line, as well as cover association fees, licensing and permits needed to operate a fashion business in California. For your support, those donating $10 will receive name & business recognition on my website (http:www.wix.com/themkbco/pi5), an invite to the pre-launch fashion show, and a free PI5 Signature Tee worth $25.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Become a PI5 Advocate - create a buzz - tell all your friends -- start spreading the word about PI5 on your social networks like Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Myspace and others. "Clothe Your Spirit" with PI5 fashions.

story:
My Start. My Story. 

I am Adam David Vaught, founder and creator of Black Confederacy Clothing. My passion for clothing and design began at a young age, but did not materialize until well into adulthood. Growing up in the city of Detroit, becoming a fashion designer was not a picture of normalcy. Talking about patterns, stitches and design was not a topic of conversation among my peer group. For awhile, I followed the traditional notions of "getting a job" and living the status quo that is deemed acceptable by society's standards. However, it wasn't long before I had to break away from such limiting beliefs and follow my dreams - my true purpose.  


I began sewing approximately 7 years ago. I started off taking a few classes, but realized I could teach myself and go much farther than what was being offered, so I sought to do just that and I am primarily self-taught. I constantly read and study the craft of design. I create my pieces from scratch, and I am a believer that the smallest detail can leave the most lasting impressions.


To date, I have made numerous custom and ready-to-wear pieces for clients near and far, ranging from jeans and denim shirts to dresses and handbags. I have never regretted taking the road less traveled because, in my journey, I have answered my true calling. And I will let my work ethic and passion speak for itself.

 

Description of The Black Confederacy Campaign and the Importance of My Mission:

The inherent nature of Black Confederacy invites questions and curiosity as to its derivation - mostly because many associate "confederate" or the "confederate flag" with racism, bigotry, and other negative connotations. However, the Black Confederacy name holds special significance to me because it was born out of the concept that you can take what many may view as a negative image and disarm it, as well as reshape it to reacquaint itself with its positive roots. 'Confederacy' simply means an alliance or union of people for a common purpose or cause. 'Black' has generally been associated with dark, mysterious things, or underdogs of our society. The Black Confederacy brand has bridged these two concepts together and brought it to the forefront that the underestimated or unexpected can come together for a common cause and that is the cause of FASHION.


MY BRAND. MY PASSION

This campaign is so important to me because I believe that it will allow me to take my business to the next level. The funds will help me to increase visibility to my brand as well as confirm my identity and credibility as a true designer who is serious about his craft and the vision of his brand.

I am so excited about Black Confederacy because it is the single greatest expression of who I am and what I believe fashion to be.

Magnitude of Contributors' Support:

I love to create, so with this campaign, I want to create customers, believers in the brand, fans, and quite possibly partners. The bottom line is that I cannot do this without you. You are my greatest asset.  My goal is to have my clothing line in stores and online, and by helping me further my passion and make my dreams a reality, you invest in my life and there is no greater investment one can make. 


What I Need & What You Get & Enjoy

The amount needed is $15,000. Your generous contributions will cover the cost of the following:

3 new industrial sewing machines; fabric in bulk; various custom notions (buttons, rivets, more hang tags, and name tags); a newer more updated website; a new laptop with more storage capacity and better graphics for my pattern making software; a new camera for better quality pictures for next year's look book. A fabric saw for multilayer cutting and smarter production time. This money will also allow me to set up my fashion show/trunk show for late 2014.

And for helping me in such a generous and selfless way, you will be perked out with PERKS!!! (See below)                                                                  

 

For a donation of $5: Pat on the b(l)ack and a sincere thank you!!! You are helping to make something great possible.Thank you in advance!!!

For a donation of $10: You will receive a Black Confederacy logo patch. Just like some people wear their heart on their sleeve, I would be honored if you wore my brand on yours! (Or anywhere else!!!)

For a donation of $25: You will receive a Black Confederacy logo t-shirt. You can share and wear the brand and the passion. It will be totally awesome to know that you see and wear the passion of the Black Confederacy brand. Thank you in advance!

For a donation of $50: You will be rewarded with a $25 voucher to use toward your purchase at BlackConfederacyClothing.com.

For a donation of $100: You will be rewarded with a $50 voucher to use toward your purchase at BlackConfederacyClothing.com.

For a generous donation of $250 or more: You will have the privilege of owning a pair of custom fit jeans for the men. For the ladies, you can accessorize and rock my signature over-sized military hobo bag. Two awesome perks from me to you for your generous contribution!

For a super generous donation of $500 or more: All boutique owners(*) will be gifted a digital look book for you to choose five pieces (of one style) for the F/W 2014 season. That's 5 pieces to display in your awesome boutique for a contribution of $500 or more.

*out of respect and fairness to the boutique/retail owners, proof of store ownership is required.


Of course, I hope to reach (or surpass!) my goal of $15,000, but if I don't, I am still humbly thankful and grateful for all of your help!!!  Your contributions will help me in the building my brand and making future campaigns possible.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute and that's ok! You can still help me by:

  • Sharing my story with your family, friends, neighbors, EVERYONE YOU KNOW!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you EVERYBODY!!!!


BC

story:
Bespoked - A Collection of Personalized Quality Goods & Gifts.

 

NOTE: All prices INCLUDE SHIPPING!

 

Create your own brand, make the perfect gift, or design something just for you - a sustainable way to buy less and get more. 

We're on a mission to bring about a change in the way we buy - a change that moves us away from mass-production, towards a more local, ethical, sustainable and better form of consumer culture, where everything can be tailored to you - the technology and knowhow are here, so it's time. All our products are made in-house from locally sourced materials by a small team of designers and craftspeople using tradional and modern technologies together - we're offering personalization not just because we can, but as a way to add meaning to these things beyond their look and function. This, coupled with great natural materials, a focus on quality, and local production mean we'll be able to buy less and get more for our money in the long run.

 

How it works

We've designed and made a range of products that can be personalized uniquely for you or anybody else. On the right hand side, you'll see a range of perks at varying prices. These all correspond to the detailed descriptions & photos below, where you can see exactly how you can customize each item. 

Select your favorite perk, or many perks! You'll be taken through to a payment processing page, and we'll be in touch with a customization form when the campaign is over. 

A real wooden protective backing for your iPhone 4/4S or 5, custom engraved to your specifications. Choose from American Walnut, Cherry or Maple. So thin you won't notice it's there - jealous onlookers definitely will. Easily applied to the back glass face of your phone using a hi-tack / no-residue adhesive tape in only a few seconds. It can be removed and even re-applied to another iPhone. Includes Shipping.

We thought that something that rests around your neck and sits close to your heart should be personalized by you. Choose from American Walnut, Bamboo or Hoop Pine and have something meaningful to you engraved in one of Mother Nature's greatest gift. See our photos for just some of the possibilities. Comes with either a black ball chain (hangs at 20 inches/508mm) or a classic silver plated chain (hangs at 8 inches/203mm), and an optional split-ring. Includes Shipping.

A simple, stylish and practical way to organise your keys - the only kind of key management you'll ever need. Made from one piece of reclaimed leather and a single brass Chicago screw, this design will keep up to 6 standard keys perfectly in-line with each other and as slim as can be. Fits keys with 0.2in/5mm or larger round holes, comes with an expander piece to suit either 3 or 6 keys, 3 split rings just in case you have some irregular items to attach, and one large split ring for anything else. Comes beautifully boxed. Includes Shipping.

A unique backpack or travel bag wooden engraved tag - just like the high end brands do, only better. A reclaimed leather strap is buckled to either a Bamboo, American Walnut or Hoop Pine tag (measuring 2.2in/56mm x 3.7in/94mm + strap) via a solid brass Chicago screw and made personal for you. Alternatively, it is happy to mingle with your keys and anything else its 0.2in/5mm round fastener fits through. Includes a small split ring to ensure it fits through just about any zipper just in case. Comes beautifully boxed. Includes Shipping.

Suitably the finest stubby holder the world has seen. Crafted purely from wool, the most natural and effective insulator, the Alpine Sleeve will leave your beverage untouched from heat this coming Summer. An elastic strap is practical for a one-size-fits-most design. Stamp your initials or message into the Brass fastener that holds this masterpiece together. Comes beautifully boxed. Includes Shipping.

A set of four lacquer coated wooden coasters. Personalize them to add character to your drinking experience and make using coasters charming rather than a chore. High calibre and highly durable, select between American Walnut, Bamboo and Hoop Pine. Measures 3.6 inches in diameter (91mm), and all 4 are rougly 0.06in (3mm) thick. Same text/monogram/artwork must appear on all 4. Comes beautifully boxed. Includes Shipping.

This is an incredibly clever use of one piece of reclaimed leather. It wraps around itself to comfortably blanket your cash and cards, and you can even take out your cards without having to open the Billfold. No stitching, no glue and no fasteners mean this masterpiece is built to last as probably the most minimalistic wallet anywhere. Fits 3-6 standard cards and a wad of notes. Measures 3.8in/96mm x 3.2in/81mm. Comes beautifully boxed. Includes Shipping.

This sweatshop-free, no stitching design is perfect for the sustainable woman. Cleverly crafted from one piece of felt and one piece of reclaimed leather, a brass button is all that's needed to hold it together. Its practical, with a divider and a coin pocket, and feels great to hold. It will have your own name, logo or monogram etched onto the back. Fits plenty of cards, cash and most smartphones - including the iPhone 4/5 and Samsung Galaxy S2/S3. Measures 3.9in high x 5.9in wide (99mm x 150mm). Comes beautifully boxed. Includes Shipping.

A custom made clock perfect for your home or workplace - theme it in whatever way you like; motivational, ornamental or just as a novelty. Choose from natural materials like Bamboo and Hoop Pine, or go for the black or white acrylic finish if need be. Browse the example photos for some ideas. Measures 8.25in/210mm in diameter. Comes beautifully boxed. Includes Shipping.

 A mighty fine slab of Cedar wood custom engraved to your unique specifications, whether it be a commemorative award or a decorative artwork. Apart from its divine aromas, it radiates with an impression of grandness. Measures 4.5in x 4.5in (114mm x 114mm) square OR 3.5in x 5.5in (89mm x 140mm). Comes beautifully boxed. Includes Shipping.

Crafted with temperature and temperament in mind, Cedar wood has weather and mold resistant properties, with a lacquer coating to seal the deal. Ideal as a house, office or letterbox sign, you can etch your own meaning into the sign and behold it's elegance. Comes in 3 different sizes. Includes adhesive tape for immediate mounting right out of the packaging. Includes Shipping.

This state-of-the-craft folio was designed to look amazing, just in case you we're wondering. A nice piece of reclaimed leather acts as the hinge to open and close the folio. You can engrave your name, logo or monogram onto your choice of Bamboo or Hoop Pine. Great for design portfolios, important company documents or special menus. Fits A4 size paper with a standard 2 hole punch in either landscape or portrait. Accommodates documents up to approx 0.5in/12.5mm in thickness using provided spacers. Includes Shipping.

 

 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

The Style Pack - $149

We've poured a lot of focus in designing the personal items you own to be simply beautiful and sustainable, now we want you to personalize them - because that's how your personal belongings should be, the Great Gatsby had the right idea. So we bundled this pack with you in our mind;

  • A necklace/key ring.
  • The Keysmith.
  • The Swing tag.
  • The Billforld OR Heartfelt.

Includes Shipping.

 

Get Bespoked - $500

Spend a day with us at our Sydney based workshop where you'll get to see 4 products of your choosing get made right in front of you, on the spot, just the way you want them. We'll even go all out and provide a full lunch spread and plenty of time to chat to the founders about any of your own ideas.

 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Most of our rewards come beautifully boxed as standard, just like you see here - please see the item description of each reward for details.

 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

There is a great selection of fonts to choose from, if you choose text as a customization option. When it comes to laying it out, you'll be given a range of options again, such as justification/alignment (in some cases), otherwise you'll also be able leave it to our Graphic Designers to work their magic. Please note that not all fonts have all regular punctuation and extras - please limit your text to only the most common when necessary i.e !@$&%#*. Numbers are available in each font, however fonts listed in capitals do not have lower-cases.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You’ll have plenty of different monogram options to choose from once the campaign ends and we send out surveys. You’ll be able to choose the font and a maximum of 3 letters to be made into a stylish looking mark by our talented Graphic Designers. Above are some of the examples that we’ve used on our products so far. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Logos & Artwork

If you plan to use a logo/artwork or graphic on one of the rewards, please be aware that there are certain guidelines you'll need to follow, and not everybodys graphic will be suitable straight away. The most common issue people may encounter is having too much detail in their graphic - we'll clearly explain this when you place your order, but as a rule of thumb, refer to all our images above to get an idea of the maximum detail we're capable of and try to imagine your artwork on the products above when viewed from an arms-length away - if you can't make something out then chances are it's too detailed. We require Hi-resolution images in black & white (monochrome) Bitmap format. We'll provide extensive instructions and visual tutorials on how to convert your graphic into this form when we send out your online order form, but really it's not that difficult - Microsoft Paint can even do this for you. 

----------------------------------------------------------

 

Taking & Processing Backers Orders

At the end of the campaign, we'll send each backer an online form specific to their pledge product. This form will contain all the necessary fields that will help them tailor their order exactly, and will include all the "Options" listed in the reward sections above, specific to each reward. In many cases there will be even more options to choose from, such as text alignment, size, location and some fancy extras! You'll be able to attach any necessary logos/artwork via this form too, and all options will be clearly represented visually with examples of "Option A vs Option B". This online order form system is something we've used for a long time, so we know it works. All are already created and ready to go, and take about 5 minutes to fill out.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Our Story

We've been making things for people for years now through our existing business "Bespoke Laser Sydney", but we recently realized that there was more to what we were doing than just servicing locals - we could do the same thing for people everywhere. We took some of the most common and best things we were asked to build and made them into the template products you see above. If this project is successful, we'll fulfil all the orders, make sure everybody is happy, then think about our next move - we're using this campaign as a way to test our theory that others are looking for the kind of service we provide - hopefully it's not just a hunch!

We're embarking on one of the biggest Indiegogo campaigns yet, don't let our funding goal fool you. Technology is at the stage where the costs that large corporations were saving from mass production are becoming easily achieved by small businesses - conceiving a new wave in production called mass customization. We want to prove that no matter how many orders we get, we can personalize each individual one just for you. By not branding our designs, we're not passing those marketing costs on to you, and allowing you to cherish something more meaningful.

The Team

Angus Deveson - Production manager

Dan Sutherland - Lead Designer

Dylan Murray - Operations Manager

Nathan Kaw - Industrial Designer

Olivia King - Graphic Designer

Tim Veron - Marketing & Social Media

Scott Triana - Business Development Manager

Matt Triana - Business Development Manager

 

Why Indiegogo?

Some people have asked why we don't just make an online store and be done with it.. well truth be told, we don't know for sure if this is something people are really looking for - being based in Australia (total population of only 23 million) it's difficult to overcome the geographical isolation and prove whether something like this is worth the effort. In addition, we don't have the time or funds to do so. For this to work, and for us to be able to slow our regular business to have the time for something bigger, we need that initial volume that only a crowdfunding campaign can provide. We're a small, young team (5 people on-and-off, our oldest is 25), so just spending the time to create this campaign is already a gamble, and we're all in. In addition, we want to gain that volume to be able to scrutinize our suppliers and doubly ensure the materials we use are good for people and the environment. Any extra funds we raise will be put towards making our current systems more efficient and again, better for people & the environment. One day we'd love to operate out of the US. If successful here, we will look to seek extra capital to expand only once all of our backers are taken care of.

We've personally been on the receiving end of some terribly run crowdfunding campaigns and we're often left wondering where the money went - not this time. We've set our prices at a point that covers our costs and gives enough space to be able to expand to just the point where we will ensure orders are fulfilled quickly, and all enquiries/concerns/issues are dealt with - we plan to run an exceptional campaign right up to the last order - we'll spend what it takes to ensure that.

 

Risks & Challenges 

In terms of our ability - we already produce similar items for our clients at Bespoke laser (http://www.bespokelaser.com/) - our custom laser cutting studio that has been operating successfully in Sydney for over a year. We have two laser cutters, a fully equipped workshop, a team of 5 who can operate everything expertly, and a strong operational system in place to handle orders. We have combined years of experience in product design and manufacturing, especially for laser cutting. We know exactly how to make all of these products - and we control all aspects of the production from our Sydney studio. Every single product you see above was produced in our workshop by us - at the current funding target, we can fulfil that amount of orders within the space of about 5 weeks without needing to change or up the way we currently operate or our rate of output.

That being said, we may experience a significant increase in volume past our stated goal. We have planned for this, and many combinations of scenarios. We already have contingency plans in place that include the lease of additional space in Sydney, the purchase and operation of additional laser cutters and machinery. In addition, we're already part of a strong community of local manufacturers here in Sydney that we can call on to assist if all else fails.

Our materials suppliers are all competent, aware and reliable, eliminating the risk of materials shortfalls. We will be processing orders as soon as we reach our funding target to reduce lead time.

We know we are amongst the most capable to deliver this project properly and on time - we wouldn't have embarked on such a big project if we thought otherwise. Check out our business mentioned above if you have doubts - we're happily putting it's reputation on the line here.

Your Future With Us

If you're really impressed with what we're trying to do here, you haven't seen the start of it. Our team of forward-thinking, entrepreneuarial minds are highly motivated to push the boundaries of our consumer culture in the world of creative design. Contact us about opportunities to collaborate at contact@bespoketradingco.com.
story_txt:
Bespoked - A Collection of Personalized Quality Goods & Gifts.
 
NOTE: All prices INCLUDE SHIPPING!
 
Create your own brand, make the perfect gift, or design something just for you - a sustainable way to buy less and get more. 
We're on a mission to bring about a change in the way we buy - a change that moves us away from mass-production, towards a more local, ethical, sustainable and better form of consumer culture, where everything can be tailored to you - the technology and knowhow are here, so it's time. All our products are made in-house from locally sourced materials by a small team of designers and craftspeople using tradional and modern technologies together - we're offering personalization not just because we can, but as a way to add meaning to these things beyond their look and function. This, coupled with great natural materials, a focus on quality, and local production mean we'll be able to buy less and get more for our money in the long run.
 
How it works
We've designed and made a range of products that can be personalized uniquely for you or anybody else. On the right hand side, you'll see a range of perks at varying prices. These all correspond to the detailed descriptions & photos below, where you can see exactly how you can customize each item. 
Select your favorite perk, or many perks! You'll be taken through to a payment processing page, and we'll be in touch with a customization form when the campaign is over. 
A real wooden protective backing for your iPhone 4/4S or 5, custom engraved to your specifications. Choose from American Walnut, Cherry or Maple. So thin you won't notice it's there - jealous onlookers definitely will. Easily applied to the back glass face of your phone using a hi-tack / no-residue adhesive tape in only a few seconds. It can be removed and even re-applied to another iPhone. Includes Shipping.
We thought that something that rests around your neck and sits close to your heart should be personalized by you. Choose from American Walnut, Bamboo or Hoop Pine and have something meaningful to you engraved in one of Mother Nature's greatest gift. See our photos for just some of the possibilities. Comes with either a black ball chain (hangs at 20 inches/508mm) or a classic silver plated chain (hangs at 8 inches/203mm), and an optional split-ring. Includes Shipping.

A simple, stylish and practical way to organise your keys - the only kind of key management you'll ever need. Made from one piece of reclaimed leather and a single brass Chicago screw, this design will keep up to 6 standard keys perfectly in-line with each other and as slim as can be. Fits keys with 0.2in/5mm or larger round holes, comes with an expander piece to suit either 3 or 6 keys, 3 split rings just in case you have some irregular items to attach, and one large split ring for anything else. Comes beautifully boxed. Includes Shipping.

A unique backpack or travel bag wooden engraved tag - just like the high end brands do, only better. A reclaimed leather strap is buckled to either a Bamboo, American Walnut or Hoop Pine tag (measuring 2.2in/56mm x 3.7in/94mm + strap) via a solid brass Chicago screw and made personal for you. Alternatively, it is happy to mingle with your keys and anything else its 0.2in/5mm round fastener fits through. Includes a small split ring to ensure it fits through just about any zipper just in case. Comes beautifully boxed. Includes Shipping.

Suitably the finest stubby holder the world has seen. Crafted purely from wool, the most natural and effective insulator, the Alpine Sleeve will leave your beverage untouched from heat this coming Summer. An elastic strap is practical for a one-size-fits-most design. Stamp your initials or message into the Brass fastener that holds this masterpiece together. Comes beautifully boxed. Includes Shipping.

A set of four lacquer coated wooden coasters. Personalize them to add character to your drinking experience and make using coasters charming rather than a chore. High calibre and highly durable, select between American Walnut, Bamboo and Hoop Pine. Measures 3.6 inches in diameter (91mm), and all 4 are rougly 0.06in (3mm) thick. Same text/monogram/artwork must appear on all 4. Comes beautifully boxed. Includes Shipping.

This is an incredibly clever use of one piece of reclaimed leather. It wraps around itself to comfortably blanket your cash and cards, and you can even take out your cards without having to open the Billfold. No stitching, no glue and no fasteners mean this masterpiece is built to last as probably the most minimalistic wallet anywhere. Fits 3-6 standard cards and a wad of notes. Measures 3.8in/96mm x 3.2in/81mm. Comes beautifully boxed. Includes Shipping.

This sweatshop-free, no stitching design is perfect for the sustainable woman. Cleverly crafted from one piece of felt and one piece of reclaimed leather, a brass button is all that's needed to hold it together. Its practical, with a divider and a coin pocket, and feels great to hold. It will have your own name, logo or monogram etched onto the back. Fits plenty of cards, cash and most smartphones - including the iPhone 4/5 and Samsung Galaxy S2/S3. Measures 3.9in high x 5.9in wide (99mm x 150mm). Comes beautifully boxed. Includes Shipping.

A custom made clock perfect for your home or workplace - theme it in whatever way you like; motivational, ornamental or just as a novelty. Choose from natural materials like Bamboo and Hoop Pine, or go for the black or white acrylic finish if need be. Browse the example photos for some ideas. Measures 8.25in/210mm in diameter. Comes beautifully boxed. Includes Shipping.

 A mighty fine slab of Cedar wood custom engraved to your unique specifications, whether it be a commemorative award or a decorative artwork. Apart from its divine aromas, it radiates with an impression of grandness. Measures 4.5in x 4.5in (114mm x 114mm) square OR 3.5in x 5.5in (89mm x 140mm). Comes beautifully boxed. Includes Shipping.

Crafted with temperature and temperament in mind, Cedar wood has weather and mold resistant properties, with a lacquer coating to seal the deal. Ideal as a house, office or letterbox sign, you can etch your own meaning into the sign and behold it's elegance. Comes in 3 different sizes. Includes adhesive tape for immediate mounting right out of the packaging. Includes Shipping.

This state-of-the-craft folio was designed to look amazing, just in case you we're wondering. A nice piece of reclaimed leather acts as the hinge to open and close the folio. You can engrave your name, logo or monogram onto your choice of Bamboo or Hoop Pine. Great for design portfolios, important company documents or special menus. Fits A4 size paper with a standard 2 hole punch in either landscape or portrait. Accommodates documents up to approx 0.5in/12.5mm in thickness using provided spacers. Includes Shipping.
 
 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
The Style Pack - $149
We've poured a lot of focus in designing the personal items you own to be simply beautiful and sustainable, now we want you to personalize them - because that's how your personal belongings should be, the Great Gatsby had the right idea. So we bundled this pack with you in our mind;

A necklace/key ring.
The Keysmith.
The Swing tag.
The Billforld OR Heartfelt.
Includes Shipping.
 
Get Bespoked - $500
Spend a day with us at our Sydney based workshop where you'll get to see 4 products of your choosing get made right in front of you, on the spot, just the way you want them. We'll even go all out and provide a full lunch spread and plenty of time to chat to the founders about any of your own ideas.
 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Most of our rewards come beautifully boxed as standard, just like you see here - please see the item description of each reward for details.
 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

There is a great selection of fonts to choose from, if you choose text as a customization option. When it comes to laying it out, you'll be given a range of options again, such as justification/alignment (in some cases), otherwise you'll also be able leave it to our Graphic Designers to work their magic. Please note that not all fonts have all regular punctuation and extras - please limit your text to only the most common when necessary i.e !@$&%#*. Numbers are available in each font, however fonts listed in capitals do not have lower-cases.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You’ll have plenty of different monogram options to choose from once the campaign ends and we send out surveys. You’ll be able to choose the font and a maximum of 3 letters to be made into a stylish looking mark by our talented Graphic Designers. Above are some of the examples that we’ve used on our products so far. 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 
Logos & Artwork
If you plan to use a logo/artwork or graphic on one of the rewards, please be aware that there are certain guidelines you'll need to follow, and not everybodys graphic will be suitable straight away. The most common issue people may encounter is having too much detail in their graphic - we'll clearly explain this when you place your order, but as a rule of thumb, refer to all our images above to get an idea of the maximum detail we're capable of and try to imagine your artwork on the products above when viewed from an arms-length away - if you can't make something out then chances are it's too detailed. We require Hi-resolution images in black & white (monochrome) Bitmap format. We'll provide extensive instructions and visual tutorials on how to convert your graphic into this form when we send out your online order form, but really it's not that difficult - Microsoft Paint can even do this for you. 
----------------------------------------------------------
 
Taking & Processing Backers Orders
At the end of the campaign, we'll send each backer an online form specific to their pledge product. This form will contain all the necessary fields that will help them tailor their order exactly, and will include all the "Options" listed in the reward sections above, specific to each reward. In many cases there will be even more options to choose from, such as text alignment, size, location and some fancy extras! You'll be able to attach any necessary logos/artwork via this form too, and all options will be clearly represented visually with examples of "Option A vs Option B". This online order form system is something we've used for a long time, so we know it works. All are already created and ready to go, and take about 5 minutes to fill out.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
Our Story
We've been making things for people for years now through our existing business "Bespoke Laser Sydney", but we recently realized that there was more to what we were doing than just servicing locals - we could do the same thing for people everywhere. We took some of the most common and best things we were asked to build and made them into the template products you see above. If this project is successful, we'll fulfil all the orders, make sure everybody is happy, then think about our next move - we're using this campaign as a way to test our theory that others are looking for the kind of service we provide - hopefully it's not just a hunch!
We're embarking on one of the biggest Indiegogo campaigns yet, don't let our funding goal fool you. Technology is at the stage where the costs that large corporations were saving from mass production are becoming easily achieved by small businesses - conceiving a new wave in production called mass customization. We want to prove that no matter how many orders we get, we can personalize each individual one just for you. By not branding our designs, we're not passing those marketing costs on to you, and allowing you to cherish something more meaningful.
The Team
Angus Deveson - Production manager
Dan Sutherland - Lead Designer
Dylan Murray - Operations Manager
Nathan Kaw - Industrial Designer
Olivia King - Graphic Designer
Tim Veron - Marketing & Social Media
Scott Triana - Business Development Manager
Matt Triana - Business Development Manager
 
Why Indiegogo?
Some people have asked why we don't just make an online store and be done with it.. well truth be told, we don't know for sure if this is something people are really looking for - being based in Australia (total population of only 23 million) it's difficult to overcome the geographical isolation and prove whether something like this is worth the effort. In addition, we don't have the time or funds to do so. For this to work, and for us to be able to slow our regular business to have the time for something bigger, we need that initial volume that only a crowdfunding campaign can provide. We're a small, young team (5 people on-and-off, our oldest is 25), so just spending the time to create this campaign is already a gamble, and we're all in. In addition, we want to gain that volume to be able to scrutinize our suppliers and doubly ensure the materials we use are good for people and the environment. Any extra funds we raise will be put towards making our current systems more efficient and again, better for people & the environment. One day we'd love to operate out of the US. If successful here, we will look to seek extra capital to expand only once all of our backers are taken care of.
We've personally been on the receiving end of some terribly run crowdfunding campaigns and we're often left wondering where the money went - not this time. We've set our prices at a point that covers our costs and gives enough space to be able to expand to just the point where we will ensure orders are fulfilled quickly, and all enquiries/concerns/issues are dealt with - we plan to run an exceptional campaign right up to the last order - we'll spend what it takes to ensure that.
 
Risks & Challenges 

In terms of our ability - we already produce similar items for our clients at Bespoke laser (http://www.bespokelaser.com/) - our custom laser cutting studio that has been operating successfully in Sydney for over a year. We have two laser cutters, a fully equipped workshop, a team of 5 who can operate everything expertly, and a strong operational system in place to handle orders. We have combined years of experience in product design and manufacturing, especially for laser cutting. We know exactly how to make all of these products - and we control all aspects of the production from our Sydney studio. Every single product you see above was produced in our workshop by us - at the current funding target, we can fulfil that amount of orders within the space of about 5 weeks without needing to change or up the way we currently operate or our rate of output.
That being said, we may experience a significant increase in volume past our stated goal. We have planned for this, and many combinations of scenarios. We already have contingency plans in place that include the lease of additional space in Sydney, the purchase and operation of additional laser cutters and machinery. In addition, we're already part of a strong community of local manufacturers here in Sydney that we can call on to assist if all else fails.
Our materials suppliers are all competent, aware and reliable, eliminating the risk of materials shortfalls. We will be processing orders as soon as we reach our funding target to reduce lead time.
We know we are amongst the most capable to deliver this project properly and on time - we wouldn't have embarked on such a big project if we thought otherwise. Check out our business mentioned above if you have doubts - we're happily putting it's reputation on the line here.
Your Future With Us
If you're really impressed with what we're trying to do here, you haven't seen the start of it. Our team of forward-thinking, entrepreneuarial minds are highly motivated to push the boundaries of our consumer culture in the world of creative design. Contact us about opportunities to collaborate at contact@bespoketradingco.com.

story:
Our Indiegogo campaign has ended, but there are still many ways to help Shoes and Clothes for Kids ensure that every child in our community has the new basic clothing essentials they deserve. Learn how to get involved with SC4K.


Would you feel comfortable wearing someone else’s used underwear?

While it’s difficult to imagine, wearing socks and underwear that have been handed down or given away is an everyday reality for thousands of kids in our community.

More than 54% of Cleveland children live in poverty, with many families struggling to keep food on the table and pay rent. As a result, basic items like underwear and socks are often deemed a luxury, leaving many children to go without. 

Shoes and Clothes for Kids (SC4K) believes that every child deserves the pride and confidence that come from having something new to wear. We are the only nonprofit organization in Northeast Ohio dedicated to providing disadvantaged families with brand new children’s clothing and Payless ShoeSource gift cards at no cost to them.  

Through the power of our buying program, SC4K can turn every $1 donated into $15-$20 worth of new clothing. Socks and underwear are the most requested items for our 32 distribution centers, and we receive phone calls almost every day from teachers who have students in desperate need. 

We’ve set an initial goal of $10,000 that will help SC4K purchase brand new socks and underwear for the thousands of kids we serve. As little as $5 can help us meet our goal – and will help bring Greater Cleveland kids an invaluable sense of comfort and self-esteem. 

Looking for other ways to make a difference? You can:

Help us get the word out by sharing the video

Host a sock and underwear drive at your office or organization

Get involved with Shoes and Clothes for Kids

story:
**After the purchase is made, a survey will be sent to you to pick your watch **

Meet Vierra: The Last Watch You'll Ever Need to Buy


Typically when you're buying a watch, you select it because it has a really cool design or it's super durable & waterproof. With our watches, we have eliminated the need for you to make a choice between the two.

Vierra watches are 100M water resistant, have a sapphire crystal display, and backed by a lifetime warranty - all under $150.



In The Press


Features


The Lineup

Unbeatable Lifetime Warranty

We are so confident in our watches that we are offering a 100% replacement lifetime warranty.  If it breaks, for whatever reason, send us your old one back and we'll ship you a new one! Most warranties only cover manufacturers defects, but we're here to change that - we want you to be satisfied for LIFE!

If Funded, When Will We Fulfill?

We've repeatedly tested and tweaked the initial prototype. From there we finalized our design and purchased the molds with a reputable manufacturer. Our vetting process for the manufacturer took over 6 months and have built a trusting relationship.  After our 30 day campaign is over, Indiegogo releases the funds to us and we'll pay the manufacturer to begin production.  The estimated production time is roughly 50-60 days, depending on the quantity of the order.  As soon as we receive the watches, we'll work around the clock to ship out the watches to our awesome supporters!

Full Specifications

Case Material: 316L Carbon Stainless Steel
Case Diameter: 42mm
Band Options:
  • 316L Carbon Stainless Steel
  • Double Stitched Genuine Leather
  • Ultra Durable Rubber
Band Width: 22mm
Clasp: Push Button Clasp
Clasp Material: 316L Carbon Stainless Steel
Dial Window Material: Sapphire Crystal
Movement: Custom Miyota Japanese Quartz
Date Function: Placed At The "6" Hour Mark

Water Resistance: 10 ATM/300 Feet/100M


Refer 3, Get 1 Free

As a way to give back to our awesome supporters, we created a referral program! For every 3 people you refer that contribute to our campaign, we'll give you an additional watch of your choice on us! We will contact you once you hit 3 referrals.

1. Log into your Indiegogo account (required for tracking)
2. On the left side of the screen, go to the Indiegogo share tools
3. Click the “Link” icon to get your personalized URL
4. Copy the URL and send it to those 3 people in mind
**For best results, personal mediums like email & text are most effective

Our Dream + Your Support = Success!

We've turned to Indiegogo as a way to help us turn this dream into a reality. With Indiegogo, if we don't reach our full funding goal....we get nada.  So please help us share with your friends & family. We will be doing everything we can to spread the word ourselves through various mediums, but there is nothing more effective than a referral. A text, an email, or a social media post will help us reach our goal. Whether you're a backer or you just like our story, remember sharing is caring! Thank you for your support!

The Team

The Future

With enough of your support, together we can lift this company off the ground! Our goal is to create a full line of watches that bridge the gap between durable and stylish, while providing everyone with the confidence in their timepiece to pursue their enjoyment in life. We are excited at the prospect of growing this company and it all starts with you! Our success will be attributed to every single backer and we hope that you'll join us on this journey every step of the way.

Time's Ticking. Do What Excites You.

Giving As A Gift?

Even though our watches will be delivered March 2016, you can still give a family member, friend, or that special someone a Vierra watch as a gift! We have created special images to print off and provide as a token for the gift they'll be receiving. There's an image for each of the 6 watches!

>Click here for images<


FAQ's

Q: I don't want to pay using PayPal, can I just pay using a credit or debit card?
A: Yes you are able to. Once you get to the payment page, click the "Go to Paypal" button. Once you arrive on the Paypal page, choose "Pay with a credit or debit card" on the middle of the screen. You can pay using your credit/debit card without having a Paypal account.

Q: How do I claim multiple Early Bird perks?
A: You must complete an additional transaction. Simply, select your Early Bird perk, then complete your first transaction. After the first transaction is complete, then return back to the campaign page to select another Early Bird perk. Complete the second transaction to claim your second Early Bird perk. 

Q: Where do I pick out which watch I want?
A: At the conclusion of the campaign (December 16th), we will be emailing out a survey to every person who contributes to our campaign and that's where you will select the watch(es) you want. Indiegogo will provide us with your email address in order to do so.

Q: If I buy multiple watches, can I get any combination of the styles?
A: Yes, you are able to get any combination you would like. For example, if you are ordering 4 watches, you can get all 4 of the same style or mix it up any way you like.

Q: How do I claim an odd number of watches?
A:  In order to get your desired amount of watches, you must complete multiple transactions,. For this example, we will use 3 watches. First you select the perk for "2 Watches" and complete that transaction. Then, return to the campaign page and select the "1 Watch" perk. From there, complete the second transaction and you will have successfully claimed 3 watches.

Q: When will my watch(es) arrive?
A: We estimate March 2016 - after our 30 day campaign is over on December 16th, Indiegogo releases the funds to us and we'll pay the manufacturer to begin production.  The estimated production time is roughly 50-60 days, depending on the quantity of the order.  As soon as we receive the watches, we'll work around the clock to ship out the watches to our awesome supporters!

Q: For your lifetime replacement warranty, what exactly does it cover?
A: Our lifetime warranty covers your watch breaking for any reason! In addition to covering manufacturer's defects, it also covers accidental damage such as a cracked display, water damage, or a broken band. All you have to do is ship the broken watch back to us and we'll send you a replacement right away, for life! The warranty does not cover wear & tear on a working watch or a dead battery.
