story:
We are delighted to introduce the Metropolitan Automatic, Rossling & Co.'s latest watch collection. Featuring our most sophisticated designs to date and high spec automatic movements. Its understated style will impress with its presence.

 

We designed the Metropolitan models with the firm belief that style should never get in the way of function, but should naturally derive from it. True style complements function. It should be subtle, never loud or trendy. It should be timeless, never rendered obsolete by new technology.

 

Rossling & Co. has been crafting watches for over three years, with the Metropolitan Automatic being our fourth collection. We have developed strong expertise in design, manufacturing and fulfillment and have solid relationships with experienced manufacturing partners.

Every single component of the Metropolitan is made from superior materials to ensure flawless operations for years to come. It was designed to be an heirloom to be passed down to the next generation.

 

Our direct-to-consumer business model means we skip the distributors and retailers and pass the savings down to you.

 

The Metropolitan Automatic models all feature an exhibition caseback with a large window showcasing the beautiful automatic movement. You will be able to observe the rotor spinning and admire the engineering that goes into the design of the beating heart of an automatic watch.

One of the signature elements of the Metropolitan Automatic collection is the double domed bubble crystal covering the dial. Reminiscent of the bold mid-century modern designs of the 60s, it gives the watch an undeniable presence. The domed shape creates a slight distortion at the edge of the crystal, a signature look of 60s watches and part of the unique character of the Metropolitan watch.

The Calibre 90S5/9015 used in the Metropolitan Automatic watches is an exceptional high-spec, Japan-made automatic movement featuring a 42-hour power reserve.

It is a 3-hand movement that has been favorably compared to the ETA2824 movement used in luxury watches such as Baume & Mercier, Bell & Ross and Tudor.

Its high 28,800 bph (8 beats per second) impart it with a super smooth sweep of the seconds hand.

It was developed and is manufactured by Miyota, an iconic Japanese manufacturer with a reputation for quality, reliability and precision. The 90S5/9015 is ideally suited for an heirloom watch like the Rossling & Co. Metropolitan.

All Metropolitan Automatic watches feature a faux-croc genuine leather strap with genuine leather backing for ultimate comfort and durability. The polished buckle is engraved with the Rossling & Co. logo.

The case of the watch is made of highly polished stainless steel (316L) for ultimate durability and strength. The low profile crown allows for easy adjustment of the time or date.

The Metropolitan Automatic collection showcases 3 different dial colors (gloss black, gloss white and sunburst blue) each available in 2 dial layout options (Classic and Open-Heart). All dials feature hand-applied polished indices and diamond cut hands.

The Open-Heart layout features a round window at 6 o’clock showcasing the 90S5 movement.

The Classic layout features a square date window at 6 o’clock.

The Metropolitan Automatic watches available for pre-order will be hand-assembled as a limited-edition. Only 399 watches will be made for each model. Each watch will be delivered with an international 2-year warranty card and a certificate of authenticity. Each watch will feature a unique serial number on the caseback (ex.: 001/399).

 

The Metropolitan Black is for the man of the world. It conveys an air of mystery and effortless charm.

 

 

 

The Metropolitan White is for the classical man. Subtle, recognized by those in the know, it exudes confidence and charisma.

 

 

 

The Metropolitan Blue is our boldest design; for the man that does not fear being noticed. It has undeniable presence and personality.

 

 

 

 

  • Case Diameter: 40 mm
  • Case Thickness: 11.9 mm
  • Lug/Strap Width: 20mm
  • Double-Domed Bubble Crystal (AR coated)
  • Solid Stainless Steel 316L Case
  • Screw-Down Exhibition Caseback
  • Unique Serial Number (ex.: 001/399)
  • Miyota Cal. 9015 or 90S5 Automatic Movement (Japan)
  • 20 mm Faux-Croc Genuine Leather Strap with Leather Backing
  • 5 ATM (50 m) Water Resistance
 

 Production of the Metropolitan Automatic collection will begin in July 2016 and should be complete by February 2017. Once production is complete, we will proceed with quality control and will begin shipping in March 2017.

 

 

Here's a small selection of the media coverage we received for our previous Rossling & Co. collections:

“Nearly a year ago, Rossling & Co. made their name very known by way of a very successful [...] campaign. […] a nice formula that mixed value and style.” - Worn & Wound

“the watches are seriously awesome” - Cool Material

“The Rosslings are attractive watches that could easily find their way into almost any collection.” - The Time Bum

“At just over a year old, the Montreal based watch company has left a huge mark on the timepiece world, all-be-it with the aid of crowd-funding.” - Vouchmag

“There is something very appealing about these watches that is hard to put your finger on. It’s in their simplicity and lack of pretension. They aren’t trying to be something they are not, they are just pleasant and easy to wear.” - Worn & Wound

“While, [...] campaigns often dilute true horology in search of profits, Rossling has committed itself to making high-quality watches for less.” - Ivy Time

“Rossling & Co. definitely have made the case as one of the best up-and-coming watchmakers around.” – Vouchmag

Here's a small selection of the customer reviews we received for our previous collections:

"I had to stop and remember to breath after I opened the box. The gold and blue with the domed sapphire was absolutely stunning." - Ken L., Modern 36mm - Westhill

"Simple and elegant watch. It's timeless and goes with anything. I get compliments all the time from both women and men. It looks classic but bold, love it." - Thibault C., Classic 40mm - Glencoe

"less is more (sometimes). It is definitely the case here! So thin so light, nothing left to say than; Buy this watch. Simplicity at its best" - Tobias P., Classic 40mm - Stirling

"I am an avid watch collector and I can say that hands down this is my favorite watch. The simplistic design, paired with the unique band garners tons of compliments from family and friends. For the price, there is simply nothing that even comes close to comparing with this watch." - Alec A., Classic 40mm - Stirling

"One of my favourite watches to date. As a passionate collector I love coming across a fresh design. These guys have kept it simple and pulled off a really beautiful piece. The strap colour is so dynamic I end up wearing this more than the rest of my pieces combined. keep up the great work guys, looking forward to seeing what else you come up with." - Luke O., Classic Automatic – Westhill

Hello! We are Nadim, Terry and Karim, entrepreneurs and watch lovers. We started out as two brothers designing our first watch collection in 2013 after we couldn’t find what we wanted on the market. As the company grew, Karim, our third brother, joined us and Rossling & Co. became three-brothers strong. Our first model was a success beyond our expectations on a crowdfunding platform with close to 1,300 backers. We then launched our Classic Automatic collection in the fall of 2014 and our Modern 36mm collection last summer. Both were huge successes, raising multiple times their initial funding goal. We are beyond excited to launch the Metropolitan Automatic and we can’t wait to get it on your wrists.

 

We are excited to see you join us on this adventure. By supporting this project, you'll help it become reality. You'll also get yourself one of the few limited edition Metropolitan Automatic watches. You'll choose the specific model that you want. You can also help by sharing the project with friends and family. Word travels fast. By sharing on social media, you will help spread the word and give the project more exposure, allowing it to stretch its wings. More exposure means more backers and more funding. More funding means more stretch goal goodies for everyone! Thanks so much for joining us!
story_txt:
We are delighted to introduce the Metropolitan Automatic, Rossling & Co.'s latest watch collection. Featuring our most sophisticated designs to date and high spec automatic movements. Its understated style will impress with its presence.





 





We designed the Metropolitan models with the firm belief that style should never get in the way of function, but should naturally derive from it. True style complements function. It should be subtle, never loud or trendy. It should be timeless, never rendered obsolete by new technology. 





 





Rossling & Co. has been crafting watches for over three years, with the Metropolitan Automatic being our fourth collection. We have developed strong expertise in design, manufacturing and fulfillment and have solid relationships with experienced manufacturing partners.





Every single component of the Metropolitan is made from superior materials to ensure flawless operations for years to come. It was designed to be an heirloom to be passed down to the next generation. 





 





Our direct-to-consumer business model means we skip the distributors and retailers and pass the savings down to you. 





 



Exhibition caseback allows full view of the automatic movement


The Metropolitan Automatic models all feature an exhibition caseback with a large window showcasing the beautiful automatic movement.  You will be able to observe the rotor spinning and admire the engineering that goes into the design of the beating heart of an automatic watch.



Double domed bubble crystal


One of the signature elements of the Metropolitan Automatic collection is the double domed bubble crystal covering the dial. Reminiscent of the bold mid-century modern designs of the 60s, it gives the watch an undeniable presence. The domed shape creates a slight distortion at the edge of the crystal, a signature look of 60s watches and part of the unique character of the Metropolitan watch.



Miyota 9015 movement (courtesy Miyota Citizen Japan)


The Calibre 90S5/9015 used in the Metropolitan Automatic watches is an exceptional high-spec, Japan-made automatic movement featuring a 42-hour power reserve. 
It is a 3-hand movement that has been favorably compared to the ETA2824 movement used in luxury watches such as Baume & Mercier, Bell & Ross and Tudor. 
Its high 28,800 bph (8 beats per second) impart it with a super smooth sweep of the seconds hand.
It was developed and is manufactured by Miyota, an iconic Japanese manufacturer with a reputation for quality, reliability and precision. The 90S5/9015 is ideally suited for an heirloom watch like the Rossling & Co. Metropolitan.



Faux-croc genuine leather straps


All Metropolitan Automatic watches feature a faux-croc genuine leather strap with genuine leather backing for ultimate comfort and durability. The polished buckle is engraved with the Rossling & Co. logo.



Solid stainless steel 316L case and crown


The case of the watch is made of highly polished stainless steel (316L) for ultimate durability and strength. The low profile crown allows for easy adjustment of the time or date.



Metropolitan Automatic dial details


The Metropolitan Automatic collection showcases 3 different dial colors (gloss black, gloss white and sunburst blue) each available in 2 dial layout options (Classic and Open-Heart). All dials feature hand-applied polished indices and diamond cut hands. 
The Open-Heart layout features a round window at 6 o’clock showcasing the 90S5 movement. 
The Classic layout features a square date window at 6 o’clock.




Certificate of authenticity and warranty card


The Metropolitan Automatic watches available for pre-order will be hand-assembled as a limited-edition. Only 399 watches will be made for each model. Each watch will be delivered with an international 2-year warranty card and a certificate of authenticity. Each watch will feature a unique serial number on the caseback (ex.: 001/399). 





 





The Metropolitan Black is for the man of the world. It conveys an air of mystery and effortless charm.





 





 






 





The Metropolitan White is for the classical man. Subtle, recognized by those in the know, it exudes confidence and charisma.





 





 





 





The Metropolitan Blue is our boldest design; for the man that does not fear being noticed. It has undeniable presence and personality.

Case Thickness: 11.9 mm 
Lug/Strap Width: 20mm 
Double-Domed Bubble Crystal (AR coated)
Solid Stainless Steel 316L Case
Screw-Down Exhibition Caseback
Unique Serial Number (ex.: 001/399)
Miyota Cal. 9015 or 90S5 Automatic Movement (Japan)
20 mm Faux-Croc Genuine Leather Strap with Leather Backing 
5 ATM (50 m) Water Resistance

 






 Production of the Metropolitan Automatic collection will begin in July 2016 and should be complete by February 2017. Once production is complete, we will proceed with quality control and will begin shipping in March 2017.

story:
Media Coverage

Why We Are Here

During my military service in Taiwan, we were provided with hard and uncomfortable boots along with thin socks that easily tore. After only walking and standing for a few hours, my feet began to blister and the foot pain was noticeable. Since there was no way I could change my boots, I started to find ways to change what goes inside them (I couldn't replace my feet). During that time, I have bought more than 30 pairs of socks to try out but did not find what I was looking for. Each pair of socks I bought either only had anti-odor, arch support, or anti-blister properties, if at all. It was frustrating to find the perfect pair of socks that makes wearing uncomfortable shoes more tolerable. I experienced how uncomfortable unsuitable socks could be - and I don't want others to have to go through what I had. That’s why I have designed my own socks - the Neverquit Socks.

– Leo Chen, Founder

The Next Generation of Socks. 

Made with comfort and function in mind, its ultra-soft material wicks moisture and combats odor. Try it - you won’t go back to your old socks.

 

Burgundy and Army Green Also Available Now!

Risks & Challenges

At HIGHSTANCE we understand the importance of brand reputation, especially for new brands. We have spent over a year in preparation for this launch, which consists of design, product development, establishing logistics and shipping channels, and executing pre-production runs to ensure a seamless and enjoyable experience to our backers.

With any high volume production run, the biggest inherent risk is timing. We’ve consulted with numerous logistics experts and sample tested our manufacturer to ensure we can deliver an amazing product on time. We will be extremely transparent and open with regards to updates on the status of production and shipment.

Our manufacturer holds 30+ years of experience producing high quality socks, specializing professional and athletics socks. They work with some of the world’s biggest brands and have the capability, scale and expertise to meet any demand. We have the utmost confidence in their ability to deliver.

Lastly, please keep an eye out for our survey in order for us to deliver our socks in a timely manner. We will be messaging you through Kickstarter and your email.

story:
As a fine piece of jewellery, Amuleto can match any style and be worn with any outfit. It is the perfect option for all women to still feel fashionable, but also safe, especially when going out. We have fully working prototypes and now need to gather a critical mass of orders to bring the cost of production down and deliver Amuleto to you for a reasonable price.

Time is a critical factor in the case of assault, abduction, or a sudden health problem; But in most cases, victims or those in need of medical assistance do not always have the chance to dial for help.

 

While there are other safety alert wearables on the market, many of them use unflattering, materials such as plastic. As a fine piece of jewellery, Amuleto can match any style and be worn with any outfit. It is the perfect option for all women to still feel fashionable, but also safe, especially when going out. By backing our project, your pre-orders will help fund the first production run in a quantity that keeps the price acceptable for most people. In return, you get a nice piece of fine jewellery that can help you or your family members to call for a help immediately without wasting any precious minutes or seconds.

 

Located on the side of the bracelet is a discreet button. As soon as the wearer feels in danger, they simply hold down the button for two seconds and Amuleto will send an alert message with its current location to the pre-chosen list of emergency contacts. Furthermore, to ensure safety at all times, automatic notifications will also be sent when the device and cell phone goes out of range or the battery drops to a critical level.

  • Pure Sterling Silver
  • Bluetooth Low Energy Technology
  • Micro USB Connector
  • Genuine Leather Strap
  • Rechargeable Battery
  • 3 Weeks of Battery Life
  • 70 Meter Working Range


How your contribution helps -

By backing our project, your pre-orders will help fund the first production run in a quantity that keeps the price acceptable for most people. In return, you get a fashionable and helpful piece of fine jewellery that can help you or your family members to call for a help immediately without wasting any precious minutes or seconds.

Being an early backer you will get a benefit of receiving it up to 37% lower price comparing to the future retail price.

In addition to that, being a backer of the project you help make society become at least a little safer.

Amuleto has been featured in...

 

We often hear shocking news of people, especially young women, being kidnapped, sexually assaulted, or even murdered. What we realized is that many of these situations could have been prevented if the victim had had a chance to immediately call for a help and inform people of their location. Therefore, we decided to start developing a very small Bluetooth Low Energy device that would send help alert messages and share the user's location just with the click of a button.

 

We also understood that it would be very difficult to make any woman wear some unattractive rubber or plastic device for a function that they, if lucky, will never have to use in their entire life. No one thinks such situation will happen to them. Therefore, what instantly came to our mind was – fine jewelry – simply because jewelry is something that every woman is happy to always wear.

 

Mindaugas Butnorius, Cofounder

Experienced project manager, civil emergency planning expert at NATO and Logistics professional. Took Amuleto from first ideas to what it looks today. 

Dovile Butnoriene, Cofounder

International banking expert with a passion for fashion and public safety. Dovile is making sure that Amuleto happens on time, on budget and in style.

Mark Schwab, Electronic Engineer

Mark has 10 years experience in engineering.  3 years of power electronics and 7 years of wearables and low power designs. Mark designed and made first prototypes of Amulteto‘s Bluetooth low energy modules.

Auste Arlauskaite, Professional jeweler

Young and ambitious designer of jewelry and luxury goods. Thanks to the synthesis of traditional and modern 3D jewelry technologies Auste is making original and innovative jewelry pieces. She created the design of Amuleto bracelet and will continue working on other models in the future.

Edgar Zigis, iOS, Android Developer

Professional IT developer in multiple companies, mostly working with Android and iOS mobile applications. He also is an amateur athlete - middle and long distance runner and entomologist. Edgar made a perfectly working App for Amuleto. 

 

Risks -

There is some risk involved in the production of Amuleto on time. Depending on a quantity that will be needed to produce there might be some minor delays of components supply. To minimise the risk of mass production we already mad few sample from the production line. We did a lot of tests, therefore, are very confident of the quality of Bluetooth module as well as silver bracelet.

A pendant version of Amuleto is also available which is suitable for males and children. The pendant features a leather strap necklace.

 

Why not share Amuleto with your friends and family on social media and help spread the word of our product. Your help will help us carry on produce more Amuleto products in the future.

 

What happens if you accidently press the button?

First of all it is very difficult to press the button by accident. It needs to be pressed by finger rather hard and held for 2 sec. There also is a possibility to dismiss sending alert message within first 15 sec.

How many contacts can you add?

There is no limit to how many contacts you can add. However we are recommending adding at least 5 contacts to make sure someone could react very quick. We are also thinking of adding an optional function to share help alert message on social media networks.

How far does it work?

It has a working range of 70 meters.

What happens if Amuleto goes out of range or battery s down?

Amuleto will automatically send notification to you pre-selected contacts indication your last location before it happened.

 Can I wash hands with Amuleto on hand?

Yes. It is water resistant. We moulded the microchip into the silicon.

Can someone always see my location?

No. Your location is only shared after you press the button and it stops tracking you immediately after it is dismissed in your App.

How often do I have to charge?

You only need to charge it every 3-4 weeks using any micro USB charger.

How much is shipping?

We are shipping worldwide for 6 USD.

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

The backer is responsible, please check your country's import duties before purchasing.

Can I get a refund?

Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy here.
